Name: Ultimate Sun Active Sun Protection Set
Description:
Achieve high-level sun protection with this SPF-powered gift set, featuring a full-size Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+. A $83 value.
 
Begin by using Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream to address the appearance of eye area wrinkles and dark circles. Apply Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+ to protect and hydrate skin. Lastly, dissolve hard to remove impurities and buildup from water-proof and long wear formulas, while maintaining skin's moisture with Perfect Cleansing Oil.
product_title: Ultimate Sun Active Sun Protection Set
Text:
Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+:


	SynchroShieldRepair™ Technology: Protective veil becomes stronger with heat, water, and sweat*, and it re-smoothes the surface on its own.*
	Algae Complex: Helps to prevent dryness and hydrate skin.
	Hypotaurine: Helps protect skin from blue light.
	 Exclusive NatureSurge Complex: Comprised of Green Tea Extract, helps protect skin against pollution.


*The HeatForce technology is activated on hot days, after the formula is applied to the skin. To activate the WetForce technology, expose the applied area to water or perspiration for 30 minutes.

how_to_use:
- Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream: Use morning and evening. Dot a pearl-sized amount around the eye area and gently massage under the eye as well as around the lid and brow bone.
- Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+: Use daily as your last morning skincare step, before makeup application. Shake well and apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, and at least every 2 hours.
- Perfect Cleansing Oil: Use in the evening as the first step in your skincare routine. Pump twice into the palm of your hand and massage onto wet or dry skin using gentle, circular motions. Rinse thoroughly.

how_to_use:
- Clarifying Cleansing Foam: Use daily as your first skincare step. Wet skin and lather a pearl-sized amount between fingers. Massage over face with gentle circular motions, and rinse.
- Ultimune Power Infusing Serum: Use in the morning and evening after cleansing and before moisturizing. Dispense onto fingertips and smooth evenly over face and neck.
- Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Cream: In the morning and evening, dot the cream onto the 5 points of your face. Gently smooth outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck, and sweep the cream upward across your jawline.
- Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream: Use in the morning and evening. Dot a pearl-sized amount around the eye area and gently massage under the eye as well as around the lid and brow bone.
overview:
Visibly reduce wrinkles and diminish dark circles with this eye care gift set, featuring a full-size Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream. A $145 value.

Wash away impurities and makeup with Clarifying Cleansing Foam, help visibly correct signs of aging with Ultimune Power Infusing Serum, and get deeply hydrated, smoothing results with Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Cream. Lastly, visibly smooth and brighten the eye area with the best-selling, anti-aging Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream.

Set Includes:

- Clarifying Cleansing Foam, 15mL

- Ultimune Power Infusing Serum, 10mL

- Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Cream, 30mL

- Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream, 15mL (Full Size)

Name: Shiseido Men Ultimune Power Infusing Serum
Description: Inspired by 100 years of research on male skin. This advanced serum intensively targets visible sagging and addresses the unique signs of skin aging in men.
product_title: Shiseido Men Ultimune Power Infusing Serum
how_to_use:
- Use daily in the morning and evening. Apply after cleansing and/or shaving, and before moisturizer.
- Pump twice to dispense serum onto the palm of your hand, and smooth evenly over face and neck.
overview:
Inspired by 100 years of research on male skin. This advanced serum intensively targets visible sagging and addresses the unique signs of skin aging in men.

This total skincare solution visibly improves the appearance of dryness, dullness, pores, roughness, firmness, and fine lines. Formulated with Power Peptide and Triple Tsubaki GL Extract Technology, this face serum targets visible signs of aging and helps strengthen skin’s natural defenses. Developed specifically for male skin, which is more prone to excess oil, this serum also features Peppermint Extract to help control the appearance of sebum. Offers long-lasting hydration for 48 hours, for smooth, firm, and resilient results.

- Multi-functional serum visibly improves multiple male skin aging concerns such as dryness, dullness, visible pores, lack of firmness and fine lines

- Provides 48-hour moisture

- Dewy, hydrating serum feels comfortable while smoothing skin

- Suitable for all skin types including sensitive

- Dermatologist tested. Non-comedogenic. Paraben-free.
overview_summary: - Multi-functional serum visibly improves multiple male skin aging concerns such as dryness, dullness, visible pores, lack of firmness and fine lines - Provides 48-hour moisture - Dewy, hydrating serum

Name: Ultimate Active SPF Set ($100 value)
Description:
Experience invisible, lightweight sun protection with this suncare set, exclusive on Shiseido.com only, featuring a full-size Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+. A $100 value. 
​​
Whisk away impurities and cleanse skin with Clarifying Cleansing Foam, reveal firmer, brighter looking skin with Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Advanced Cream, and protect skin with breathable yet powerful Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+.
product_title: Ultimate Active SPF Set ($100 value)
Text:
Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+:


	​​SynchroShieldRepair™ Technology: Protection veil becomes stronger with contact to heat, water and sweat, and also self-repairs if the veil is thinned by movement or rubbing.
	​​Algae Complex: Helps to prevent dryness and hydrates skin.
	​​Licorice Root Extract: Known to help soothe break-out prone skin.


SHISEIDO ULTIMATE SUN PROTECTOR LOTION BROAD SPECTRUM SPF 60+
ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Purpose AVOBENZONE 2.3% ･････ Sunscreen HOMOSALATE 10.0% ･････ Sunscreen OCTISALATE 5.0% ･････ Sunscreen OCTOCRYLENE 5.0% ･････ Sunscreen 
INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: WATER･DIISOPROPYL SEBACATE･TALC･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･DIMETHICONE･PEG/PPG-9/2 DIMETHYL ETHER･ALCOHOL DENAT.･LAURYL PEG-9 POLYDIMETHYLSILOXYETHYL DIMETHICONE･GLYCERIN･DEXTRIN PALMITATE･SUCROSE TETRASTEARATE TRIACETATE･ISODODECANE･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE･SILICA･DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE･HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE･SODIUM CHLORIDE･DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE･AMINOETHANESULFINIC ACID･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･SAXIFRAGA SARMENTOSA EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･EUCHEUMA SERRA/GRATELOUPIA SPARSA/SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/ULVA LINZA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･SOPHORA ANGUSTIFOLIA ROOT EXTRACT･SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･PPG-17･PEG-9 POLYDIMETHYLSILOXYETHYL DIMETHICONE･CALCIUM STEARATE･ISOSTEARIC ACID･PALMITIC ACID･TRISODIUM EDTA･ALCOHOL･SILICA DIMETHYL SILYLATE･PEG-6･BHT･TOCOPHEROL･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･STEARIC ACID･SODIUM METABISULFITE･POLYGLYCERYL-6 POLYRICINOLEATE･BIS-BUTYLDIMETHICONE POLYGLYCERYL-3･SYZYGIUM JAMBOS LEAF EXTRACT･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE･RED 33･YELLOW 5･ <M112750-811> 

SHISEIDO CLARIFYING CLEANSING FOAM
INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･STEARIC ACID･PEG-8･MYRISTIC ACID･GLYCERIN･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･LAURIC ACID･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･SORBITOL･COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE･PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･SODIUM METHYL COCOYL TAURATE･PHYTOSTERYL MACADAMIATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･POLYQUATERNIUM-39･DISODIUM EDTA･ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) GERM OIL･LINALOOL･GERANIOL･CITRONELLOL･KAOLIN･SODIUM BENZOATE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･ACRYLATES COPOLYMER･BETAINE･SILK POWDER(SERICA/POUDRE DE SOIE)･TOCOPHEROL･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･ARTEMISIA PRINCEPS LEAF EXTRACT･SODIUM LAURYL SULFATE･<M082659-702>

SHISEIDO VITAL PERFECTION UPLIFTING AND FIRMING ADVANCED CREAM
INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･DIMETHICONE･ALCOHOL･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAETHYLHEXANOATE･CETEARYL ALCOHOL･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･PEG-100 STEARATE･SILICA･BIS-DIGLYCERYL POLYACYLADIPATE-2･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･MALTITOL･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER WATER･CAFFEINE･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･CRATAEGUS MONOGYNA FLOWER EXTRACT･LAMIUM ALBUM FLOWER/LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･PANAX GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･INOSITOL･CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) FLOWER EXTRACT･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER･STEARYL ALCOHOL･POLYVINYL ALCOHOL･ISOHEXADECANE･POLYSORBATE 80･SORBITAN TRISTEARATE･TRISODIUM EDTA･SODIUM CITRATE･SUCCINOGLYCAN･SORBITAN OLEATE･CITRIC ACID･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･LIMONENE･HEXYL CINNAMAL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･TOCOPHEROL･LINALOOL･CITRONELLOL･ALPINIA SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･<M110821-712>
how_to_use:
- Clarifying Cleansing Foam: Use daily as your first skincare step. Wet skin, dispense a dime-size amount, lather between fingers, massage over face in gentle motions, and rinse.
- ​​Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Advanced Cream: Use morning and evening after cleansing. Take 2 pearl-sized amounts, dot around face and neck, and smooth gently with upward pressure.
- ​​Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+: Shake well and apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, and at least every 2 hours.
overview:
Experience invisible, lightweight sun protection with this suncare set, exclusive on Shiseido.com only, featuring a full-size Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+. A $100 value.

​​

Whisk away impurities and cleanse skin with Clarifying Cleansing Foam, reveal firmer, brighter looking skin with Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Advanced Cream, and protect skin with breathable yet powerful Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+.

​​

Set Includes:

- Clarifying Cleansing Foam, 15mL

- Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Advanced Cream, 15mL

- Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+, 150mL (Full Size)

- Tote Bag

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･DIMETHICONE･ALCOHOL･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAETHYLHEXANOATE･CETEARYL ALCOHOL･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･PEG-100 STEARATE･SILICA･BIS-DIGLYCERYL POLYACYLADIPATE-2･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･MALTITOL･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER WATER･CAFFEINE･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･CRATAEGUS MONOGYNA FLOWER EXTRACT･LAMIUM ALBUM FLOWER/LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･PANAX GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･INOSITOL･CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) FLOWER EXTRACT･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER･STEARYL ALCOHOL･POLYVINYL ALCOHOL･ISOHEXADECANE･POLYSORBATE 80･SORBITAN TRISTEARATE･TRISODIUM EDTA･SODIUM CITRATE･SUCCINOGLYCAN･SORBITAN OLEATE･CITRIC ACID･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･LIMONENE･HEXYL CINNAMAL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･TOCOPHEROL･LINALOOL･CITRONELLOL･ALPINIA SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･<M110821-712>
how_to_use:
- Clarifying Cleansing Foam: Use daily as your first skincare step. Wet skin, dispense a dime-size amount, lather between fingers, massage over face in gentle motions, and rinse.
- ​​Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Advanced Cream: Use morning and evening after cleansing. Take 2 pearl-sized amounts, dot around face and neck, and smooth gently with upward pressure.
- ​​Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+: Shake well and apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying, and at least every 2 hours.
overview:
Experience invisible, lightweight sun protection with this suncare set, exclusive on Shiseido.com only, featuring a full-size Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+. A $100 value.

​​

Whisk away impurities and cleanse skin with Clarifying Cleansing Foam, reveal firmer, brighter looking skin with Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Advanced Cream, and protect skin with breathable yet powerful Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+.

​​

Set Includes:

- Clarifying Cleansing Foam, 15mL

- Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Advanced Cream, 15mL

- Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+, 150mL (Full Size)

- Tote Bag
overview_summary: ​​ Set Includes: - Clarifying Cleansing Foam, 15mL - Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Advanced Cream, 15mL - Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion SPF 60+, 150mL (Full Size) - Tote Bag

product_title: Future Solution LX Eye & Lip Care Set ($323 Value)

overview:
Luxuriate in revitalized and restored eye and lip areas with this premium skincare gift set inspired by 40 years of genetic research, featuring a full-size Future Solution LX Eye and Lip Contour Regenerating Cream, plus a full-size refill. A $323 value.

The rich, luxurious Future Solution LX Eye and Lip Contour Regenerating Cream visibly improves the appearance of wrinkles and sagging around the eye and lip areas, leaving skin looking and feeling more resilient, firm, and moisturized.

This limited-edition set features a full-size refill. Refills use up to 78% less plastic waste than regular packaging for the future beauty of our planet.

Name: Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Advanced Eye Cream
Description: A deeply hydrating eye cream that visibly reduces eye-area sagging and wrinkles in just 1 week.*
product_title: Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Advanced Eye Cream
Text:
•RetinolACE: Suitable for the delicate eye-area, it supports skin’s natural hyaluronic acid for greater resilience against signs of aging.

•SafflowerRED™: Exclusively grown in Japan, supports collagen network and helps to lift, firm and make skin more even-toned

•Hyaluronic Acid: Deeply hydrates and retains moisture.

•MicroVitalizer Technology: Targets the appearance of signs of fatigue including sagging and puffiness, to revitalize the eye area.

•4MSK: Promotes brightness and helps even skin tone.

INGREDIENTS: Water(Aqua/Eau)･Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate･Squalane･Butylene Glycol･Glycerin･Dipropylene Glycol･Behenyl Alcohol･Dimethicone･Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone･Myristyl Myristate･Potassium Methoxysalicylate･Hydrogenated Polyisobutene･Tocopheryl Acetate･Xanthan Gum･Rosa Damascena Flower Water･Retinyl Acetate･Caffeine･Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil･Glutamic Acid･Angelica Keiskei Leaf/Stem Extract･Crataegus Monogyna Flower Extract･Sanguisorba Officinalis Root Extract･Lamium Album Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract･Panax Ginseng Root Extract･Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract･Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate･Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Flower Extract･Pinus Sylvestris Cone Extract･Ziziphus Jujuba Fruit Extract･Bupleurum Falcatum Root Extract･Eucheuma Serra/Grateloupia Sparsa/Saccharina Angustata/Ulva Linza/Undaria Pinnatifida Extract･Saccharina Angustata/Undaria Pinnatifida Extract･Coix Lacryma-Jobi Ma-yuen Seed Extract･Stearyl Alcohol･Beheneth-20･Hydrogenated Palm Oil･Dimethicone/Phenyl Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer･Dimethylacrylamide/Sodium Acryloyldimethyltaurate Crosspolymer･Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Kernel Oil･Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil･Disodium EDTA･Sodium Citrate･Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil･BHT･Alcohol･Sodium Metabisulfite･Citric Acid･Sodium Metaphosphate･Tocopherol･Alpinia Speciosa Leaf Extract･Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract･Phenoxyethanol･Fragrance (Parfum)･Iron Oxides (CI 77492)･Iron Oxides (CI 77491)･Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes･Limonene･Hexyl Cinnamal･Citrus Aurantium Peel Oil･Citronellol･Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Peel Oil･Linalyl Acetate･ <M142657-712>
how_to_use:
- Use in the morning and evening as the last step in your skincare routine. For daytime use, follow with sunscreen.
- Use the flat surface of the enclosed massage roller and scoop up a pearl-sized amount for both eye areas.
- Smooth gently around the eye area with fingertips and then gently smooth the massage roller over the eye area.
overview:
A deeply hydrating eye cream that visibly reduces eye-area sagging and wrinkles in just 1 week.*

Features potent retinol technology designed for the delicate eye-area. RetinolACE and Hyaluronic Acid target multiple signs of aging, such as loss of resilience and dryness. MicroVitalizer Technology—with Caffeine and Chai Hu Extract—addresses visible signs of fatigue including sagging and puffiness, to revitalize the eye area. This advanced eye cream is clinically proven to improve under-eye bags, crow's feet, and dark circles in 1 week.*

Includes an exclusive massage roller tool that helps to enhance the eye cream's effectiveness in improving under-eye fine lines, upper eyelid sagging, and vertical lines between the eyebrows.

- Visibly reduces eye-area sagging, wrinkles, and dark circles in 1 week.*

- Features potent retinol technology designed for the delicate eye-area.

- Includes a massage roller tool to help enhance the eye cream's effectiveness.

- Provides 24-hour moisture.

- Paraben-free.

- Non-comedogenic. Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.

*Clinically tested by 32 women.
overview_summary: A deeply hydrating eye cream that visibly reduces eye-area sagging and wrinkles in just 1 week.* Features potent retinol technology designed for the delicate eye-area. *Clinically tested by 32 women.

overview:
A deeply hydrating eye cream that visibly reduces eye-area sagging and wrinkles in just 1 week.*

Features potent retinol technology designed for the delicate eye-area. RetinolACE and Hyaluronic Acid target multiple signs of aging, such as loss of resilience and dryness. MicroVitalizer Technology—with Caffeine and Chai Hu Extract—addresses visible signs of fatigue including sagging and puffiness, to revitalize the eye area. Includes an exclusive massage roller tool that helps to enhance the eye cream's effectiveness in improving under-eye fine lines, upper eyelid sagging, and vertical lines between the eyebrows.

- Visibly reduces eye-area sagging, wrinkles, and dark circles in 1 week.*

- Features potent retinol technology designed for the delicate eye-area.

- Includes a massage roller tool to help enhance the eye cream's effectiveness.

- Provides 24-hour moisture.

- Non-comedogenic. Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.

*Clinically tested by 32 women.

Name: Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Advanced Day Cream SPF 30
Description: A highly effective daily moisturizer with SPF 30 that delivers multiple age-defying benefits.
product_title: Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Advanced Day Cream SPF 30
how_to_use:
- Apply in the morning, after cleansing at least 15 minutes before sun exposure.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin).
- Smooth gently over the face, starting in the larger areas such as the cheeks and forehead. Spread from the center of the face outward, and then along the jawline.
- Apply upward pressure along the jawline with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat 6 times.
- Hold four fingers together, placing the pointer fingers along the nasolabial folds (laugh lines).
- Move upward toward the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds open, with palms flat on the cheeks. Lift, and repeat 6 times.
overview:
A highly effective daily moisturizer with SPF 30 that delivers multiple age-defying benefits.

This scientifically advanced face moisturizer for the daytime delivers comprehensive anti-aging benefits that help to improve firmness, sagging, dark spots, uneven skin tone and deep wrinkles. This cream strengthens your invisible nutrient network which helps maintain natural collagen for a stronger moisture barrier, and firmer, brighter skin. Powered by SafflowerRED™, exclusively grown in Japan, and Ginseng Root Extract. Now available in a refill size.

- Clinically proven to improve skin with multiple age-defying effects, targeting sagging, deep wrinkles, loss of firmness, dark spots, and uneven skin tone.

- Broad-spectrum SPF 30 sun protection against UVA/UVB rays

- Features SafflowerRED™ to support collagen network

- Provides 24-hour hydration

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Refill helps reduce plastic waste by up to 79% compared with a regular product

Name: Vital Perfection Intensive WrinkleSpot Treatment A+
Description: A targeted spot treatment that's clinically proven to visibly improve deep wrinkles and dark spots in just 1 week.* Concentrated benefits for an age-defiant, youthful look.
product_title: Vital Perfection Intensive WrinkleSpot Treatment A+
how_to_use:
- Apply morning and evening as the last step in your skincare routine. For daytime use, follow with sunscreen to ensure the effectiveness of the retinol.
- Take a pearl-sized drop onto fingertips and gently smooth onto areas of concern, such as around the eyes and the mouth, on the neck, and on wrinkles.
overview:
A targeted spot treatment that's clinically proven to visibly improve deep wrinkles and dark spots in just 1 week.* Concentrated benefits for an age-defiant, youthful look.

Powered by Pure Retinol Advanced, this dramatically effective treatment visibly improves wrinkles, firmness, and resilience for targeted areas. See improvements in deep wrinkles, crow's feet, nasolabial folds, marionette lines, neck wrinkles, and dark spots in as soon as one week, and dramatic results in four weeks.* This fast-absorbing formula can also be used to target visible pores. See smoother, firmer skin, with visibly faded dark spots.

- Clinically proven to visibly improve deep wrinkles and dark spots in 1 week.*

- Targeted spot treatment to address deep wrinkles, crow's feet, nasolabial folds, marionette lines, neck wrinkles, dark spots, and visible pores.

- Provides 24-hour moisture.

- Paraben-free.

- Non-comedogenic. Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.

*Clinically tested by 34 women

Name: Ultimune Power Infusing Serum
Description: A breakthrough face serum that slows the skin aging cycle.*¹
product_title: Ultimune Power Infusing Serum
Text:
Exclusive Power Fermented Camellia+ helps deliver 14 powerful amino acids, distilled through a proprietary Japanese bio-fermentation process with Ki-koji to penetrate deep*⁴ so skin looks rejuvenated.
Camellia Seed Extract supports collagen network to help improve elasticity.
Camellia Leaf Extract and Camellia Flower Extract help calm and support the skin barrier.
Camellia Seed Oil is known to increase moisturization.
Heart Leaf and Fermented Roselle Extracts help soothe and strengthen skin.
Reishi Mushroom and Iris Root Extracts support skin’s defense against external damaging factors to help maintain optimal skin condition.

*⁴Outermost layer of the skin.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･GLYCERIN･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･ALCOHOL DENAT.･DIMETHICONE･ DIGLYCERIN･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG-8･ISODECYL NEOPENTANOATE･TREHALOSE･AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/BEHENETH-25 METHACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER･PEG-14M･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER WATER･ECTOIN･XYLITOL･LAURYL BETAINE･ORIGANUM MAJORANA LEAF EXTRACT･HYDROXYPROLINE･CAMELLIA JAPONICA SEED OIL･CAMELLIA JAPONICA FLOWER EXTRACT･HOUTTUYNIA CORDATA EXTRACT･SODIUM CARBOXYMETHYL BETA-GLUCAN･CAMELLIA JAPONICA LEAF EXTRACT･CAMELLIA JAPONICA SEED EXTRACT･LACTOBACILLUS/HIBISCUS SABDARIFFA FLOWER FERMENT FILTRATE･IRIS FLORENTINA ROOT EXTRACT･GANODERMA LUCIDUM (MUSHROOM) STEM EXTRACT･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER･ALCOHOL･DISODIUM EDTA･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･SILICA･ISOCETETH-10･ LINALOOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･CITRONELLOL･ASPERGILLUS FERMENT･BHT･SODIUM BICARBONATE･ TOCOPHEROL･PHENOXYETHANOL･CHLORPHENESIN･SODIUM BENZOATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･
how_to_use:
- Use twice daily, morning and evening.
- Apply after cleanser and softener or essence, but before other serums or moisturizer.
- Pump twice and smooth evenly over face and neck.
- For Refill: Save the pump and cap from your original bottle. Insert the pump into the refill, then close cap.*
*Only compatible with latest packaging.
overview:
A breakthrough face serum that slows the skin aging cycle.*¹

Inspired by over 30 years of skin immunity research. Clinical tests show this innovative serum helps prevent and visibly correct signs of aging,*² promoting a youthful, radiant appearance. 95% saw improved radiance and texture with less visible wrinkles in 1 week.*³

This potent formula is fueled by Exclusive Power Fermented Camellia+ technology, featuring the Camellia Flower, a dynamic plant that flourishes despite its harsh surrounding environment in the Goto Islands of Nagasaki, Japan.

Utilizing the Camellia in its entirety – from its seeds, to its petals and leaves – this revolutionary serum harnesses the flower’s regenerative properties to penetrate deep*⁴ so skin looks rejuvenated. After extracting the Camellia Oil, the remaining leaves are carefully fermented through a proprietary bio-fermentation process, helping to deliver 14 powerful amino acids that help nourish and strengthen skin.

This advanced serum is packed with skincare benefits. Clinical tests show this serum helps prevent and visibly correct signs of aging*² including uneven skin tone, dullness, redness, pores, roughness, fine lines, wrinkles, smile lines, firmness, and elasticity for a smoother, vibrant complexion. The fast-absorbing formula strengthens skin’s barrier for a healthy, vibrant look. Tap into your ultimate beauty potential now, and over time.

- Slows the skin aging cycle.*¹

- 95% saw improved radiance and texture with less visible wrinkles in 1 week.*³

- Clinical tests show this serum helps prevent and visibly correct signs of aging including uneven skin tone, dullness, redness, pores, roughness, fine lines, wrinkles, smile lines, firmness, and elasticity.*²

- Fresh, fast-absorbing texture.

- For all skin types, including sensitive.

- Paraben-free. Mineral oil-free.

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Refill helps reduce plastic waste by 93% compared to a regular product.

*¹Cycle that leads to skin aging such as fine lines & wrinkles, started from dryness.
*²Clinically tested on 32 women.
*³Consumer tested on 107 women.
*⁴Outermost layer of the skin.

This potent formula is fueled by Exclusive Power Fermented Camellia+ technology, featuring the Camellia Flower, a dynamic plant that flourishes despite its harsh surrounding environment in the Goto Islands of Nagasaki, Japan.

Utilizing the Camellia in its entirety – from its seeds, to its petals and leaves – this revolutionary serum harnesses the flower’s regenerative properties to penetrate deep*⁴ so skin looks rejuvenated. After extracting the Camellia Oil, the remaining leaves are carefully fermented through a proprietary bio-fermentation process, helping to deliver 14 powerful amino acids that help nourish and strengthen skin.

This advanced serum is packed with skincare benefits. Clinical tests show this serum helps prevent and visibly correct signs of aging*² including uneven skin tone, dullness, redness, pores, roughness, fine lines, wrinkles, smile lines, firmness, and elasticity for a smoother, vibrant complexion. The fast-absorbing formula strengthens skin’s barrier for a healthy, vibrant look. Tap into your ultimate beauty potential now, and over time.

- Slows the skin aging cycle.*¹

- 95% saw improved radiance and texture with less visible wrinkles in 1 week.*³

- Clinical tests show this serum helps prevent and visibly correct signs of aging including uneven skin tone, dullness, redness, pores, roughness, fine lines, wrinkles, smile lines, firmness, and elasticity.*²

- Fresh, fast-absorbing texture.

- For all skin types, including sensitive.

- Paraben-free. Mineral oil-free.

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Refill helps reduce plastic waste by 93% compared to a regular product.

*¹Cycle that leads to skin aging such as fine lines & wrinkles, started from dryness.
*²Clinically tested on 32 women.
*³Consumer tested on 107 women.
*⁴Outermost layer of the skin.

Name: Bio-Performance Micro-Click Concentrate
Description: A futuristic innovation in skincare technology inspired by aesthetic procedures. This next-generation targeted serum delivers Niacinamide with micro-level precision while providing gentle physical stimulation, helping to firm and hydrate the skin while visibly reducing fine lines and dullness. Shiseido's unique and ultra-advanced 18 micro-point applicator with PreciseDelivery Technology enables skin to receive effective ingredients more precisely through mechanical stimulation for intensified benefits.
product_title: Bio-Performance Micro-Click Concentrate
Text:
Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Helps strengthen the skin barrier, smooth texture, reduce dullness, and visibly refine pores for a healthier-looking complexion.
	Exclusive applicator ensures targeted delivery of Niacinamide to the deeper layers of the skin* to help visibly improve sagging and dullness. (*stratum corneum)
	Barrier Fill Complex: Helps to rapidly replenish moisture and strengthens the skin’s barrier.
	Red Clover Extract: Helps to support renewed skin condition.
	Cinnamon Extract: Helps support skin’s natural purification process.


INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･ALCOHOL DENAT.･GLYCERIN･NIACINAMIDE･XYLITOL･LACTOBACILLUS/RICE FERMENT･DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE･ALPHA-GLUCAN OLIGOSACCHARIDE･SODIUM HYALURONATE･TRIFOLIUM PRATENSE (CLOVER) FLOWER EXTRACT (TRIFOLIUM PRATENSE FLOWER EXTRACT)･PHELLODENDRON AMURENSE BARK EXTRACT･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･SODIUM CITRATE･DISODIUM EDTA･ALCOHOL･CITRIC ACID･SODIUM METABISULFITE･CINNAMOMUM CASSIA BARK EXTRACT･PHENOXYETHANOL<M135957-712>
how_to_use:
Use at night, after cleanser and essence or softener.
For first time use: Apply every two days (6 applications over 12 days)
For ongoing use: Apply once a week to maintain results (6 applications over 6 weeks)
Contents:
1 blue pouch containing:
• 1 clickable container filled with serum (6 applications)
• 1 clickable container cap
6 silver pouches, each containing:
• 1 micro-point applicator (disposable, including cap)
Preparation:
Assembly
1. Twist the clickable container cap off.
2. Remove the micro-point applicator from the silver pouch. Use within 30 minutes, as micro-point applicator tips are vulnerable to humidity. Twist the clickable container onto the applicator.
3. Pull the cap off.
Before using, to deliver serum to your skin, first drain air from the container by holding it upward with the micro-point applicator on top, and clicking the pushbutton about 30-40 times.
Important: Drain air from the applicator before each use (about 30 clicks).
Usage
Press the micro-point applicator firmly against your skin, so it is pushed slightly inward. Click the button to deliver the serum. Move the position of the applicator little by little, clicking each time. Repeat on different areas, for a total of 50 clicks. Do not click more than 50 times per use. Blend remaining serum on the skin surface into your skin.
After Usage
Cap the micro-point applicator and discard after use.
Re-place cap onto clickable container.
For micro-point applicator:
Use with clean hands.
Use applicator immediately after removing from pouch. Do not leave out.
Discard after use. Do not reuse.
Caution:
Do not use on eyelids, eyelid lining, or eye surface.
Store away from direct sunlight and high temperatures.
Use on facial skin only.
Keep out of reach of children.
See frequently asked questions here

Shiseido's unique and ultra-advanced 18 micro-point applicator with PreciseDelivery Technology enables skin to receive effective ingredients more precisely through mechanical stimulation for intensified benefits.

Niacinamide intensively targets age-related concerns. Feel the firm resilience of youthful looking skin*¹ with less visible sagging*¹, smile lines*², fine lines around the eyes*¹, dullness*³, and pores*³ in 12 days.

- Maximizes the effectiveness of Niacinamide with exclusive PreciseDelivery Technology applicator. The applicator has 18 micro-points that are each spaced 3mm apart for precise delivery.​​

- Recommended for fine lines around eyes, nasolabial folds (smile lines), sagging, and pores.

- Suitable for all skin types.

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.

*¹Based on a consumer study on 101 women.

*²Based on a clinical study on 33 women.

*³Based on a clinical study on 34 women.

Do not use on eyelids, eyelid lining, or eye surface.
Store away from direct sunlight and high temperatures.
Use on facial skin only.
Keep out of reach of children.

overview:
A futuristic innovation in skincare technology inspired by aesthetic procedures. This next-generation targeted serum delivers Niacinamide with micro-level precision while providing gentle physical stimulation, helping to firm and hydrate the skin while visibly reducing fine lines and dullness. Shiseido's unique and ultra-advanced 18 micro-point applicator with PreciseDelivery Technology enables skin to receive effective ingredients more precisely through mechanical stimulation for intensified benefits.

Niacinamide intensively targets age-related concerns. Feel the firm resilience of youthful looking skin*¹ with less visible sagging*¹, smile lines*², fine lines around the eyes*¹, dullness*³, and pores*³ in 12 days.

- Maximizes the effectiveness of Niacinamide with exclusive PreciseDelivery Technology applicator. The applicator has 18 micro-points that are each spaced 3mm apart for precise delivery.​​

- Recommended for fine lines around eyes, nasolabial folds (smile lines), sagging, and pores.

- Suitable for all skin types.

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.

*¹Based on a consumer study on 101 women.

*²Based on a clinical study on 33 women.

*³Based on a clinical study on 34 women.
overview_summary: The applicator has 18 micro-points that are each spaced 3mm apart for precise delivery.​​ - Recommended for fine lines around eyes, nasolabial folds (smile lines), sagging, and pores. Ophthalmologist-tested.

Name: Bio-Performance Micro-Click Concentrate
Description: A futuristic innovation in skincare technology inspired by aesthetic procedures. product_title: Bio-Performance Micro-Click Concentrate
Text:
Niacinamide (Vitamin B3): Helps strengthen the skin barrier, smooth texture, reduce dullness, and visibly refine pores for a healthier-looking complexion.
	Exclusive applicator ensures targeted delivery of Niacinamide to the deeper layers of the skin* to help visibly improve sagging and dullness. (*stratum corneum)
	Barrier Fill Complex: Helps to rapidly replenish moisture and strengthens the skin’s barrier.
	Red Clover Extract: Helps to support renewed skin condition.
	Cinnamon Extract: Helps support skin’s natural purification process.


INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･ALCOHOL DENAT.･GLYCERIN･NIACINAMIDE･XYLITOL･LACTOBACILLUS/RICE FERMENT･DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE･ALPHA-GLUCAN OLIGOSACCHARIDE･SODIUM HYALURONATE･TRIFOLIUM PRATENSE (CLOVER) FLOWER EXTRACT (TRIFOLIUM PRATENSE FLOWER EXTRACT)･PHELLODENDRON AMURENSE BARK EXTRACT･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･SODIUM CITRATE･DISODIUM EDTA･ALCOHOL･CITRIC ACID･SODIUM METABISULFITE･CINNAMOMUM CASSIA BARK EXTRACT･PHENOXYETHANOL<M135957-712>
how_to_use:
Use at night, after cleanser and essence or softener.
For first time use: Apply every two days (6 applications over 12 days)
For ongoing use: Apply once a week to maintain results (6 applications over 6 weeks)
Contents:
1 blue pouch containing:
• 1 clickable container filled with serum (6 applications)
• 1 clickable container cap
6 silver pouches, each containing:
• 1 micro-point applicator (disposable, including cap)
Preparation:
Assembly
1. Twist the clickable container cap off.
2. Remove the micro-point applicator from the silver pouch. Use within 30 minutes, as micro-point applicator tips are vulnerable to humidity. Twist the clickable container onto the applicator.
3. Pull the cap off.
Before using, to deliver serum to your skin, first drain air from the container by holding it upward with the micro-point applicator on top, and clicking the pushbutton about 30-40 times.
Important: Drain air from the applicator before each use (about 30 clicks).
Usage
Press the micro-point applicator firmly against your skin, so it is pushed slightly inward. Click the button to deliver the serum. Move the position of the applicator little by little, clicking each time. Repeat on different areas, for a total of 50 clicks. Do not click more than 50 times per use. Blend remaining serum on the skin surface into your skin.
After Usage
Cap the micro-point applicator and discard after use.
Re-place cap onto clickable container.
For micro-point applicator:
Use with clean hands.
Use applicator immediately after removing from pouch. Do not leave out.
Discard after use. Do not reuse.
Caution:
Do not use on eyelids, eyelid lining, or eye surface.
Store away from direct sunlight and high temperatures.
Use on facial skin only.
Keep out of reach of children.
See frequently asked questions here

Name: Vital Perfection Concentrated Supreme Cream
Description: A rich, comprehensive anti-aging cream that defies the look of progressive skin sagging. 90% saw more lifted, firmer and even-toned skin with improved sagging in 2 weeks.*
product_title: Vital Perfection Concentrated Supreme Cream
Text:
Exclusive Sculpturist Technology powered by Burnet Extract improves the appearance of skin sagging.
2x concentration of SafflowerRED™, exclusively grown in Japan, supports collagen network and intensively boosts multiple age-defying effects to help lift, firm and make skin more even-toned.
Ginseng Root Extract, known to help boost natural collagen production, leaves skin firmer and brighter while strengthening skin’s moisture barrier.
Ziziphus Jujuba Fruit Extract helps to improve elasticity and firmness while addressing hyperpigmentation.
Caffeine, an antioxidant, helps energize the skin and reduce dullness.
Squalane hydrates and supports skin’s moisture barrier while smoothing fine lines.
Vitamin E helps maintain skin barrier and defend against pollutants and environmental stressors.  

WATER(AQUA/EAU)･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･DIMETHICONE･ALCOHOL･PROPANEDIOL･PHYTOSTERYL MACADAMIATE･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･SILICA･SQUALANE･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･CETEARYL ALCOHOL･PEG-100 STEARATE･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER WATER･CAFFEINE･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･SAPINDUS MUKOROSSI PEEL EXTRACT･CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) FLOWER EXTRACT･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･CRATAEGUS MONOGYNA FLOWER EXTRACT･SANGUISORBA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT･LAMIUM ALBUM FLOWER/LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･PANAX GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･INOSITOL･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･PYROLA INCARNATA EXTRACT･POTENTILLA ERECTA ROOT EXTRACT･CHLORELLA VULGARIS EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER･STEARYL ALCOHOL･SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER･COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX(COPERNICIA CERIFERA CERA/CIRE DE CARNAUBA)･HYDROGENATED PALM OIL･ISOHEXADECANE･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) KERNEL OIL･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) OIL･POLYSORBATE 80･SORBITAN TRISTEARATE･DISODIUM EDTA･SUCCINOGLYCAN･SODIUM CITRATE･SORBITAN OLEATE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･CITRIC ACID･LIMONENE･TOCOPHEROL･HEXYL CINNAMAL･LINALOOL･CITRONELLOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･ALPINIA SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･
how_to_use:
- Apply morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin).
- Smooth gently over the face, starting in the larger areas such as the cheeks and forehead. Spread from the center of the face outward, and then along the jawline.
- Apply upward pressure along the jawline with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat 6 times.
- Hold four fingers together, placing the pointer fingers along the nasolabial folds (laugh lines).
- Move upward toward the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds open, with palms flat on the cheeks. Lift, and repeat 6 times.
For Refill:
- Open the cap. Hold the jar with one hand and use the other to gently pull out the refill by holding the two tabs.
- Insert the new refill, pushing it firmly into the jar.
- Discard the inner sticker and close the cap firmly.

2x concentration of SafflowerRED™, exclusively grown in Japan, supports collagen network and intensively boosts multiple age-defying effects to help lift, firm and make skin more even-toned.
Ginseng Root Extract, known to help boost natural collagen production, leaves skin firmer and brighter while strengthening skin’s moisture barrier.
Ziziphus Jujuba Fruit Extract helps to improve elasticity and firmness while addressing hyperpigmentation.
Caffeine, an antioxidant, helps energize the skin and reduce dullness.
Squalane hydrates and supports skin’s moisture barrier while smoothing fine lines.
Vitamin E helps maintain skin barrier and defend against pollutants and environmental stressors.  

WATER(AQUA/EAU)･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･DIMETHICONE･ALCOHOL･PROPANEDIOL･PHYTOSTERYL MACADAMIATE･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･SILICA･SQUALANE･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･CETEARYL ALCOHOL･PEG-100 STEARATE･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER WATER･CAFFEINE･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･SAPINDUS MUKOROSSI PEEL EXTRACT･CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) FLOWER EXTRACT･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･CRATAEGUS MONOGYNA FLOWER EXTRACT･SANGUISORBA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT･LAMIUM ALBUM FLOWER/LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･PANAX GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･INOSITOL･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･PYROLA INCARNATA EXTRACT･POTENTILLA ERECTA ROOT EXTRACT･CHLORELLA VULGARIS EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER･STEARYL ALCOHOL･SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER･COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX(COPERNICIA CERIFERA CERA/CIRE DE CARNAUBA)･HYDROGENATED PALM OIL･ISOHEXADECANE･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) KERNEL OIL･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) OIL･POLYSORBATE 80･SORBITAN TRISTEARATE･DISODIUM EDTA･SUCCINOGLYCAN･SODIUM CITRATE･SORBITAN OLEATE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･CITRIC ACID･LIMONENE･TOCOPHEROL･HEXYL CINNAMAL･LINALOOL･CITRONELLOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･ALPINIA SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･
how_to_use:
- Apply morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin).
- Smooth gently over the face, starting in the larger areas such as the cheeks and forehead. Spread from the center of the face outward, and then along the jawline.
- Apply upward pressure along the jawline with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat 6 times.
- Hold four fingers together, placing the pointer fingers along the nasolabial folds (laugh lines).
- Move upward toward the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds open, with palms flat on the cheeks. Lift, and repeat 6 times.
For Refill:
- Open the cap. Hold the jar with one hand and use the other to gently pull out the refill by holding the two tabs.
- Insert the new refill, pushing it firmly into the jar.
- Discard the inner sticker and close the cap firmly.
overview:
A rich, comprehensive anti-aging cream that defies the look of progressive skin sagging. 90% saw more lifted, firmer and even-toned skin with improved sagging in 2 weeks.*

This daily face moisturizer works on comprehensive anti-aging benefits leaving skin looking more sculpted, lifted, firmer and even-toned. Exclusive Sculpturist Technology powered by Burnet Extract improves the appearance of skin sagging. Now available in a refill size.

- 90% saw more lifted, firmer and even-toned skin with improved sagging in 2 weeks.*

- Exclusive Sculpturist Technology powered by Burnet Extract visibly improves skin sagging

- Rich, velvety cream texture

- Provides 24-hour moisture

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Paraben-free

*Consumer tested by 110 individuals.
overview_summary: 90% saw more lifted, firmer and even-toned skin with improved sagging in 2 weeks.* - Exclusive Sculpturist Technology powered by Burnet Extract visibly improves skin sagging -

Name: Bio-Performance Advanced Super Revitalizing Cream
Description: Address signs of aging with this comprehensive advanced revitalizing face cream that visibly refines and restores skin’s youthful vitality.
product_title: Bio-Performance Advanced Super Revitalizing Cream
Text:
Super Bio-Hyaluronic Acid: Provides intense moisture to help maintain healthy and youthful-looking skin.
Raspberry Extract & Rose Apple Leaf Extract: Helps maintain skin’s elasticity and protects skin from external stressors.


INGREDIENTS: WATER (AQUA), GLYCERIN, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, ISODODECANE, ISOHEXADECANE, DIMETHICONE, CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE, HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE, DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE, PEG-9 POLYDIMETHYLSILOXYETHYL DIMETHICONE, PEG-150, PEG-8 DIISOSTEARATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, METHYLPARABEN, ETHYLPARABEN, PHYTOSTERYL MACADAMIATE, SODIUM CITRATE, FRAGRANCE (PARFUM), TRISODIUM EDTA, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, STEARYL GLYCYRRHETINATE, HYDROXYPROLINE, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE, BENZYL BENZOATE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BUTYLPHENYL METHYLPROPIONAL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, LINALOOL, LIMONENE, SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE, CITRONELLOL, GERANIOL, SACCHAROMYCES FERMENT LYSATE FILTRATE, RUBUS IDAEUS (RASPBERRY) FRUIT EXTRACT, IRON OXIDES (CI 77492), SYZYGIUM JAMBOS LEAF EXTRACT, IRON OXIDES (CI 77491), TOCOPHEROL
how_to_use:
- Apply in the morning and evening as the last step in your skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the 5 points of your face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount for your neck, and sweep the cream upward from neck to jawline.
overview:
Address signs of aging with this comprehensive advanced revitalizing face cream that visibly refines and restores skin’s youthful vitality.

Take preventative measures against signs of aging with this multi-action moisturizer. Infused with high-performing Super Bio-Hyaluronic Acid, this rich-textured cream quickly melts into skin and minimizes the appearance of fine lines. Delivers long-lasting moisture for beautifully resilient, soft and dewy skin.

- Minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

- Visibly refines skin for a youthful look

- Delivers long-lasting moisture

- Dermatologist-tested
overview_summary: Minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles - Visibly refines skin for a youthful look - Delivers long-lasting moisture - Dermatologist-tested

INGREDIENTS: WATER (AQUA), GLYCERIN, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, ISODODECANE, ISOHEXADECANE, DIMETHICONE, CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE, HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE, DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE, PEG-9 POLYDIMETHYLSILOXYETHYL DIMETHICONE, PEG-150, PEG-8 DIISOSTEARATE, PHENOXYETHANOL, METHYLPARABEN, ETHYLPARABEN, PHYTOSTERYL MACADAMIATE, SODIUM CITRATE, FRAGRANCE (PARFUM), TRISODIUM EDTA, TOCOPHERYL ACETATE, STEARYL GLYCYRRHETINATE, HYDROXYPROLINE, CITRIC ACID, SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE, BENZYL BENZOATE, ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE, BUTYLPHENYL METHYLPROPIONAL, HEXYL CINNAMAL, LINALOOL, LIMONENE, SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE, CITRONELLOL, GERANIOL, SACCHAROMYCES FERMENT LYSATE FILTRATE, RUBUS IDAEUS (RASPBERRY) FRUIT EXTRACT, IRON OXIDES (CI 77492), SYZYGIUM JAMBOS LEAF EXTRACT, IRON OXIDES (CI 77491), TOCOPHEROL
how_to_use:
- Apply in the morning and evening as the last step in your skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the 5 points of your face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount for your neck, and sweep the cream upward from neck to jawline.

Name: Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream
Description: Our best-selling anti-aging eye cream visibly reduces wrinkles and diminishes the appearance of dark circles.
product_title: Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Eye Cream
Text:
Peptides: Boost collagen to reduce wrinkles around the eyes.
Squalane: Hydrates and protects skin's moisture barrier while smoothing fine lines.
Ginseng Extract: Brightens eyes and reduces dark circles.
Vitamin E: Helps maintain skin's barrier and defends against pollutants and environmental stressors.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･MINERAL OIL(PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM/HUILE MINERALE)･GLYCERIN･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･PARAFFIN･MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX(CERA MICROCRISTALLINA/CIRE MICROCRISTALLINE)･POLYGLYCERYL-2 DIISOSTEARATE･SQUALANE･GLYCERYL OLEATE･SODIUM GLUTAMATE･SODIUM PCA･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･CARNOSINE･BEESWAX(CERA ALBA/CIRE D'ABEILLE)･POLYETHYLENE･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･CAFFEINE･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･SAPINDUS MUKOROSSI PEEL EXTRACT･UNCARIA GAMBIR EXTRACT･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･CRATAEGUS MONOGYNA FLOWER EXTRACT･SANGUISORBA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT･PANAX GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･EUCHEUMA SERRA/GRATELOUPIA SPARSA/SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/ULVA LINZA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･SODIUM LACTATE･CURCUMA LONGA (TURMERIC) RHIZOME EXTRACT･SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･CHLORELLA VULGARIS EXTRACT･ALCOHOL･TRISODIUM EDTA･TOCOPHEROL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･LINALOOL･LIMONENE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･BHT･ALPINIA SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･CARBOMER･POLYSORBATE 20･PALMITOYL TRIPEPTIDE-1･PALMITOYL TETRAPEPTIDE-7･ETHYLPARABEN･METHYLPARABEN･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･
how_to_use:
- Use in the morning before applying moisturizer with SPF. In the evening, make it the last step in your skincare routine.
- Dot a rice grain-sized amount around the eye area, from the orbital bone to the brow bone.
- Use your ring finger to gently massage the cream in a circle, starting under the eye and around the lid and brow bone.
overview:
Our best-selling anti-aging eye cream visibly reduces wrinkles and diminishes the appearance of dark circles.

Smooth and brighten eyes with our best-selling anti-aging eye cream. After just 7 days, 96% saw reduced wrinkles and diminished dark circles.* Powerful Peptides and Squalane smooth the appearance of fine lines and target 5 types of eye area wrinkles—including inner corner, under eye, crow's feet, around eye, and frown lines—plus priority concerns, dark circles and eye bag puffiness. Ginseng Extract, Caffeine and a blend of Japanese Botanicals help to brighten eyes and reduce dark circles.

- Visibly reduces wrinkles and diminishes the appearance of dark circles

- Targets 5 types of eye area wrinkles—inner corner, under eye, crow's feet, around eye, frown lines—plus priority concerns, dark circles and eye bag puffiness

- Provides deep hydration around the eyes

- Velvety, rich cream texture

- Good for all skin types

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.

*Consumer tested by 110 women.
overview_summary: Visibly reduces wrinkles and diminishes the appearance of dark circles - Targets 5 types of eye area wrinkles—inner corner, under eye, crow's feet, around eye, frown lines—plus

- Use in the morning before applying moisturizer with SPF. In the evening, make it the last step in your skincare routine.
- Dot a rice grain-sized amount around the eye area, from the orbital bone to the brow bone.

overview:
Our best-selling anti-aging eye cream visibly reduces wrinkles and diminishes the appearance of dark circles.

Smooth and brighten eyes with our best-selling anti-aging eye cream. After just 7 days, 96% saw reduced wrinkles and diminished dark circles.* Powerful Peptides and Squalane smooth the appearance of fine lines and target 5 types of eye area wrinkles—including inner corner, under eye, crow's feet, around eye, and frown lines—plus priority concerns, dark circles and eye bag puffiness. Ginseng Extract, Caffeine and a blend of Japanese Botanicals help to brighten eyes and reduce dark circles.

- Visibly reduces wrinkles and diminishes the appearance of dark circles

- Targets 5 types of eye area wrinkles—inner corner, under eye, crow's feet, around eye, frown lines—plus priority concerns, dark circles and eye bag puffiness

- Provides deep hydration around the eyes

- Velvety, rich cream texture

- Good for all skin types

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.

*Consumer tested by 110 women.

Name: Ultimate Sun Protector Cream SPF 50
Description: A smooth, hydrating face sunscreen with powerful SPF 50 protection that's ideal for active, outdoor activities.
product_title: Ultimate Sun Protector Cream SPF 50
Text:
Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers, attracts, and retains moisture.
5 Types of Algae: Helps to prevent dryness and hydrates skin.
Licorice Root Extract: Known to help soothe break-out prone skin.
Hypotaurine: Helps protect skin from blue light.
Antioxidant-Packed Botanicals: Help prevent damage caused by UV rays that lead to wrinkles and dark spots.
NEW SynchroShieldRepair™ Technology: Protection veil becomes stronger with contact to heat, water and sweat, and also self-repairs if the veil is thinned by movement or rubbing.
SuperVeil-UV 360™ Technology: Creates an even layer of protection against UVA/UVB rays.

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS:
OCTISALATE 3.0% ･････ Sunscreen
OCTOCRYLENE 3.0% ･････ Sunscreen
ZINC OXIDE  19.4% ･････ Sunscreen
INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: WATER･DIISOPROPYL SEBACATE･ISOPROPYL MYRISTATE･ALCOHOL DENAT.･PEG/PPG-9/2 DIMETHYL ETHER･GLYCERIN･ALCOHOL･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･TALC･POLYGLYCERYL-6 POLYRICINOLEATE･SILICA･DEXTRIN PALMITATE･DEXTRIN PALMITATE/ETHYLHEXANOATE･ACRYLAMIDES/DMAPA ACRYLATES/METHOXY PEG METHACRYLATE COPOLYMER･DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE･AMINOETHANESULFINIC ACID･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･SAXIFRAGA SARMENTOSA EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･EUCHEUMA SERRA/GRATELOUPIA SPARSA/SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/ULVA LINZA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･SODIUM HYALURONATE･SOPHORA ANGUSTIFOLIA ROOT EXTRACT･SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE･DIMETHYLACRYLAMIDE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE CROSSPOLYMER･HYDROXYPROPYL METHYLCELLULOSE STEAROXY ETHER･SUCCINOGLYCAN･TOCOPHEROL･BHT･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･STEARIC ACID･SODIUM METABISULFITE･PEG-6･BIS-BUTYLDIMETHICONE POLYGLYCERYL-3･SYZYGIUM JAMBOS LEAF EXTRACT･CHLORPHENESIN･FRAGRANCE･
how_to_use:
- Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure.
- Reapply every 2 hours, or after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, and immediately after towel drying.
overview:
A smooth, hydrating face sunscreen with powerful SPF 50 protection that's ideal for active, outdoor activities.

This moisturizing facial sunscreen provides powerful yet lightweight sun protection with SPF 50. This cream is infused with 80% skincare ingredients, including Hyaluronic Acid, to deeply hydrate and visibly improve fine lines, smoothness, and even skin tone in 4 weeks.* Formulated with NEW SynchroShieldRepair™ Technology, a protective veil that’s strengthened by heat, water, and sweat, and now self-repairs when thinned by movement or rubbing for an even, consistent layer of coverage that lasts.**

Powered by over 100 years of UV research and Japanese suncare innovation.

- Smooth, hydrating cream for face

- Broad-spectrum SPF 50 protects against UVA/UVB rays

- Protective veil becomes stronger with contact to heat, water and sweat** and self-repairs if veil is thinned by movement or rubbing

- Visibly improves fine lines, smoothness and even skin tone in 4 weeks*

- Maintains 4-hour hydration

- Made up of 80% skincare ingredients

- Water-resistant for 80 minutes

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Free of Oxybenzone and Octinoxate

*Clinically tested by 32 women.

**The HeatForce technology is activated on hot days, after the formula is applied to the skin. To activate the WetForce technology, expose the applied area to water or perspiration for 30 minutes.

This cream is infused with 80% skincare ingredients, including Hyaluronic Acid, to deeply hydrate and visibly improve fine lines, smoothness, and even skin tone in 4 weeks.* Formulated with NEW SynchroShieldRepair™ Technology, a protective veil that’s strengthened by heat, water, and sweat, and now self-repairs when thinned by movement or rubbing for an even, consistent layer of coverage that lasts.**

Powered by over 100 years of UV research and Japanese suncare innovation.

- Smooth, hydrating cream for face

- Broad-spectrum SPF 50 protects against UVA/UVB rays

- Protective veil becomes stronger with contact to heat, water and sweat** and self-repairs if veil is thinned by movement or rubbing

- Visibly improves fine lines, smoothness and even skin tone in 4 weeks*

- Maintains 4-hour hydration

- Made up of 80% skincare ingredients

- Water-resistant for 80 minutes

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Free of Oxybenzone and Octinoxate

*Clinically tested by 32 women.

**The HeatForce technology is activated on hot days, after the formula is applied to the skin. To activate the WetForce technology, expose the applied area to water or perspiration for 30 minutes.

Name: Future Solution LX Total Regenerating Cream
Description: Wake up to supple skin with this luxurious, anti-aging night cream that visibly improves loss of resilience, wrinkles, dullness and pores.
product_title: Future Solution LX Total Regenerating Cream
Text:
Exclusive LonGenevity Complex™: Made up of newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P – a proprietary amino acid derivative – helps optimize skin's condition at any age. This powerful formula helps improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth. 
Sakura (Cherry Blossom Leaf) Extract and Peach Leaf Extract: Helps to prevent degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure. 
Licorice Extract, Rosemary Extract and Okra Extract: Firms, tightens and renews skin. 

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･XYLITOL･PIPERIDINEPROPIONIC ACID･PETROLATUM･MINERAL OIL(PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM/HUILE MINERALE)･DIMETHICONE･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･BEHENETH-20･STEARYL ALCOHOL･DIISOSTEARYL MALATE･DIPENTAERYTHRITYL HEXAHYDROXYSTEARATE･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･CARNOSINE･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･XANTHAN GUM･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･IRIS FLORENTINA ROOT EXTRACT･SANGUISORBA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･GLYCYRRHIZA GLABRA (LICORICE) ROOT EXTRACT･HIBISCUS ESCULENTUS FRUIT EXTRACT･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･CHAENOMELES SINENSIS FRUIT EXTRACT･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･TREMELLA FUCIFORMIS POLYSACCHARIDE･HOUTTUYNIA CORDATA EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･PRUNUS PERSICA (PEACH) LEAF EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED SILK･MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX(CERA MICROCRISTALLINA/CIRE MICROCRISTALLINE)･BATYL ALCOHOL･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER･HYDROGENATED PALM OIL･ISOHEXADECANE･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) KERNEL OIL･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) OIL･SODIUM CITRATE･POLYSORBATE 80･SODIUM METHYL STEAROYL TAURATE･BHT･TRISODIUM EDTA･ALCOHOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･CITRIC ACID･SORBITAN OLEATE･LINALOOL･LIMONENE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･BENZYL BENZOATE･TOCOPHEROL･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･
how_to_use:
- Apply as the last step in your nightly skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot on the five points of the face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face.
- Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck and sweep the cream upward from neck to jawline.
- For Refill: Hook fingers around the two protrusions on the sides of the jar and gently pull out the empty container. Insert refill pod, pushing it firmly into the jar. Remove the freshness seal and replace the cap of the container. Discard empty container.
overview:
Wake up to supple skin with this luxurious, anti-aging night cream that visibly improves loss of resilience, wrinkles, dullness and pores.

Inspired by 40 years of genetic research, this face moisturizer provides exceptional anti-aging care. Clinically proven to improve 6 signs of aging – sagging, wrinkles, firmness, volume, elasticity and radiance – in 1 week.*

Formulated with our exclusive LonGenevity Complex™ — infused with newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P, a proprietary amino acid derivative – this cream helps to optimize skin while you sleep, when it is naturally in its resting state, improving daytime damage like loss of resilience, wrinkles, and dullness.

*Clinically tested by 33 women.

- Helps to improve skin barrier function and provides powerful brightening benefits

- Visibly firms, tightens and renews skin

- Helps restore skin function while it's naturally at rest, optimizing nighttime recovery

- Helps to support collagen and visibly diminish wrinkles with powerful Peptides

- Formulated with Super Hyaluronic Acid to provide 24-hour moisture

- Includes tray made of special Tatami-beri fabric, used to protect and reinforce the edge of the Tatami mat, a rich piece of Japanese tradition

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.
overview_summary: Helps to improve skin barrier function and provides powerful brightening benefits - Visibly firms, tightens and renews skin - Helps restore skin function while it's naturally at

how_to_use:
- Apply as the last step in your nightly skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot on the five points of the face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face.
- Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck and sweep the cream upward from neck to jawline.
- For Refill: Hook fingers around the two protrusions on the sides of the jar and gently pull out the empty container. Insert refill pod, pushing it firmly into the jar. Remove the freshness seal and replace the cap of the container. Discard empty container.

how_to_use:
- Apply as the last step in your nightly skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot on the five points of the face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face.
- Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck and sweep the cream upward from neck to jawline.
- For Refill: Hook fingers around the two protrusions on the sides of the jar and gently pull out the empty container. Insert refill pod, pushing it firmly into the jar. Remove the freshness seal and replace the cap of the container. Discard empty container.
overview:

Inspired by 40 years of genetic research, this face moisturizer provides exceptional anti-aging care. Clinically proven to improve 6 signs of aging – sagging, wrinkles, firmness, volume, elasticity and radiance – in 1 week.*

*Clinically tested by 33 women.

- Helps to improve skin barrier function and provides powerful brightening benefits

- Visibly firms, tightens and renews skin

- Helps restore skin function while it's naturally at rest, optimizing nighttime recovery

- Helps to support collagen and visibly diminish wrinkles with powerful Peptides

- Formulated with Super Hyaluronic Acid to provide 24-hour moisture

- Includes tray made of special Tatami-beri fabric, used to protect and reinforce the edge of the Tatami mat, a rich piece of Japanese tradition

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

Name: Vital Perfection Uplifting & Firming Advanced Cream
Description: A highly effective daily moisturizer that delivers multiple age-defying benefits. Clinically proven: 100% showed a firmer, brighter, more lifted look in 1 just week.*
product_title: Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Advanced Cream
Text:
This cream strengthens your invisible nutrient network with powerful, age-defying ingredients:
SafflowerRED™: Exclusively grown in Japan, helps to lift, firm and make skin more even-toned.
Ginseng Root Extract: Known to help boost natural collagen production, leaves skin firmer and brighter while strengthening skin's moisture barrier.
Ziziphus Jujuba Fruit Extract: Helps to improve elasticity and firmness while addressing hyperpigmentation.
Caffeine: Helps to brighten skin and reduce wrinkles.

- Apply morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin).
- Smooth gently over the face, starting in the larger areas such as the cheeks and forehead. Spread from the center of the face outward, and then along the jawline.
- Apply upward pressure along the jawline with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat 6 times.

- Apply morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin).
- Smooth gently over the face, starting in the larger areas such as the cheeks and forehead. Spread from the center of the face outward, and then along the jawline.
- Apply upward pressure along the jawline with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat 6 times.

- Apply morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin).
- Smooth gently over the face, starting in the larger areas such as the cheeks and forehead. Spread from the center of the face outward, and then along the jawline.
- Apply upward pressure along the jawline with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat 6 times.

- Apply morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin).
- Smooth gently over the face, starting in the larger areas such as the cheeks and forehead. Spread from the center of the face outward, and then along the jawline.
- Apply upward pressure along the jawline with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat 6 times.

- Apply morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin).
- Smooth gently over the face, starting in the larger areas such as the cheeks and forehead. Spread from the center of the face outward, and then along the jawline.
- Apply upward pressure along the jawline with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat 6 times.

- Move upward toward the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds open, with palms flat on the cheeks. Lift, and repeat 6 times.

- Apply morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin).
- Smooth gently over the face, starting in the larger areas such as the cheeks and forehead. Spread from the center of the face outward, and then along the jawline.
- Apply upward pressure along the jawline with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat 6 times.

- Move upward toward the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds open, with palms flat on the cheeks. Lift, and repeat 6 times.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･DIMETHICONE･ALCOHOL･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAETHYLHEXANOATE･CETEARYL ALCOHOL･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･PEG-100 STEARATE･SILICA･BIS-DIGLYCERYL POLYACYLADIPATE-2･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･MALTITOL･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER WATER･CAFFEINE･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･CRATAEGUS MONOGYNA FLOWER EXTRACT･LAMIUM ALBUM FLOWER/LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･PANAX GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･INOSITOL･CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) FLOWER EXTRACT･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER･STEARYL ALCOHOL･POLYVINYL ALCOHOL･ISOHEXADECANE･POLYSORBATE 80･SORBITAN TRISTEARATE･TRISODIUM EDTA･SODIUM CITRATE･SUCCINOGLYCAN･SORBITAN OLEATE･CITRIC ACID･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･LIMONENE･HEXYL CINNAMAL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･TOCOPHEROL･LINALOOL･CITRONELLOL･ALPINIA SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･
how_to_use:
- Apply morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin).
- Smooth gently over the face, starting in the larger areas such as the cheeks and forehead. Spread from the center of the face outward, and then along the jawline.
- Apply upward pressure along the jawline with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat 6 times.
- Hold four fingers together, placing the pointer fingers along the nasolabial folds (laugh lines).
- Move upward toward the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds open, with palms flat on the cheeks. Lift, and repeat 6 times.
overview:
A highly effective daily moisturizer that delivers multiple age-defying benefits. Clinically proven: 100% showed a firmer, brighter, more lifted look in 1 just week.*

This scientifically advanced face moisturizer delivers comprehensive anti-aging benefits that help to improve firmness, sagging, dark spots, uneven skin tone and deep wrinkles. This cream strengthens your invisible nutrient network which helps maintain the natural production of collagen for a stronger moisture barrier, firmer and brighter skin. Powered by new SafflowerRED™, exclusively grown in Japan, and Ginseng Root Extract. Now available in a refill size.

- Clinically proven: 100% showed a firmer, brighter, more lifted look in 1 week*

- Features SafflowerRED™ to support collagen network

- Works on comprehensive anti-aging benefits that help to improve firmness, sagging, dark spots, uneven skin tone and deep wrinkles

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Refill helps reduce plastic waste by up to 79% compared with a regular product

*Clinically tested by 33 women.

Description: A breakthrough face serum that slows the skin aging cycle.*¹
product_title: Ultimune Power Infusing Serum
Text:
Exclusive Power Fermented Camellia+ helps deliver 14 powerful amino acids, distilled through a proprietary Japanese bio-fermentation process with Ki-koji to penetrate deep*⁴ so skin looks rejuvenated.
Camellia Seed Extract supports collagen network to help improve elasticity.

*⁴Outermost layer of the skin.

how_to_use:
- Use twice daily, morning and evening.
- Apply after cleanser and softener or essence, but before other serums or moisturizer.
- Pump twice and smooth evenly over face and neck.
- For Refill: Save the pump and cap from your original bottle. Insert the pump into the refill, then close cap.*
*Only compatible with latest packaging.
overview:
A breakthrough face serum that slows the skin aging cycle.*¹

Inspired by over 30 years of skin immunity research. Clinical tests show this innovative serum helps prevent and visibly correct signs of aging,*² promoting a youthful, radiant appearance. 95% saw improved radiance and texture with less visible wrinkles in 1 week.*³

This potent formula is fueled by Exclusive Power Fermented Camellia+ technology, featuring the Camellia Flower, a dynamic plant that flourishes despite its harsh surrounding environment in the Goto Islands of Nagasaki, Japan.

Utilizing the Camellia in its entirety – from its seeds, to its petals and leaves – this revolutionary serum harnesses the flower’s regenerative properties to penetrate deep*⁴ so skin looks rejuvenated. After extracting the Camellia Oil, the remaining leaves are carefully fermented through a proprietary bio-fermentation process, helping to deliver 14 powerful amino acids that help nourish and strengthen skin.

This advanced serum is packed with skincare benefits. Clinical tests show this serum helps prevent and visibly correct signs of aging*² including uneven skin tone, dullness, redness, pores, roughness, fine lines, wrinkles, smile lines, firmness, and elasticity for a smoother, vibrant complexion. The fast-absorbing formula strengthens skin’s barrier for a healthy, vibrant look. Tap into your ultimate beauty potential now, and over time.

- Slows the skin aging cycle.*¹

- 95% saw improved radiance and texture with less visible wrinkles in 1 week.*³

- Clinical tests show this serum helps prevent and visibly correct signs of aging including uneven skin tone, dullness, redness, pores, roughness, fine lines, wrinkles, smile lines, firmness, and elasticity.*²

- Fresh, fast-absorbing texture.

- For all skin types, including sensitive.

- Paraben-free. Mineral oil-free.

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Refill helps reduce plastic waste by 93% compared to a regular product.

*¹Cycle that leads to skin aging such as fine lines & wrinkles, started from dryness.
*²Clinically tested on 32 women.
*³Consumer tested on 107 women.
*⁴Outermost layer of the skin.

Name: Ultimate Sun Protector Clear Stick SPF 60+
Description: An invisible SPF 60+ sunscreen stick for active and everyday protection on-the-go that reapplies effortlessly over or under makeup.
product_title: Ultimate Sun Protector Clear Stick SPF 60+
Text:
ProfenseCL™: Exclusive complex of Licorice Extract and Soy Lecithin helps to improve uneven skin tone.

Argan Oil: Nourishes and helps hydrate skin.

SynchroShield™ Technology:*


	WetForce™ Technology: Negative ions in the formula combine with positive ions in perspiration and water to create an additional layer of invisible sun protection. As you continue to sweat and get wet, the product becomes more effective.
	HeatForce™ Technology: A heat-sensing essence becomes activated by external heat, forming a stronger protective barrier.


*The HeatForce™ technology is activated on hot days, after the formula is applied to the skin. To activate the WetForce™ technology, expose the applied area to water or perspiration for 30 minutes.

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: 
Avobenzone 2.5% ･････ Sunscreen 
Homosalate 11.0% ･････ Sunscreen 
Octisalate 5.0% ･････ Sunscreen 
Octocrylene 9.0% ･････ Sunscreen 

INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone･Mineral Oil･Hydroxystearic Acid･Triethylhexanoin･PEG/PPG-9/2 Dimethyl Ether･Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer･Dibutyl Lauroyl Glutamide･C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate･Polyamide-8･Silica Dimethyl Silylate･Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil･Stearyl Glycyrrhetinate･Tocopheryl Acetate･PEG/PPG-14/7 Dimethyl Ether･Lecithin･Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract･PPG-17･Castor Oil/IPDI Copolymer･Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride･BHT･Simethicone･PEG-6･Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate･Silica･Fragrance･ <M146552-811>
how_to_use:
- Apply liberally to face, neck, and body at least 15 minutes before sun exposure.
- Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, and immediately after towel drying.
- Reapply at least every 2 hours.
- Product can be applied and re-applied over and under makeup.
overview:
An invisible SPF 60+ sunscreen stick for active and everyday protection on-the-go that reapplies effortlessly over or under makeup.

The #1 Sunscreen Stick in the US*¹ is now upgraded. Now with increased broad-spectrum SPF 60+ protection and provides 8-hours of hydration for a transparent, naturally glowing finish. Powered by SynchroShield™ technology, the sunscreen's protective veil is strengthened with exposure to heat, water, and sweat.*² It provides comfortable defense against UVA/UVB rays, micro-dust, and dryness. The innovative formula is composed of naturally-derived skincare ingredients that help to improve uneven skin tone and smoothness. This lightweight formula features Licorice Extract & Soy Lecithin to help improve uneven skin tone, while Argan Oil helps hydrate skin. This clear, weightless sunscreen glides on smoothly for a completely invisible finish on all skin tones. Suitable for all skin types, from dry to oily.

Clinically proven to improve plumpness and even tone in 2 weeks, appearance of fine lines and smoothness in 4 weeks.*³

Now available in regular and jumbo sizes for easy, on-the-go application for both face and body.

Daily sunscreen use helps prevent signs of premature skin aging caused by sun exposure such as fine lines, dark spots and uneven tone.

- High SPF 60+ protects against UVA/UVB rays

- Lightweight formula protects against micro-dust and dryness

- Ultra-convenient, mess-free, and applies over and under makeup

- Invisible, naturally glowing finish

- Skincare ingredients help to improve uneven skin tone and smoothness

- Sunscreen's protective veil is strengthened with exposure to heat, water and sweat*²

- Water-resistant for up to 80 minutes•Good for all skin types and skin tones on face and body

- Free of oxybenzone, octinoxate, and parabens

- Dermatologist-tested, ophthalmologist-tested and non-comedogenic

*¹Source: Circana, LLC, US Prestige Beauty Total Department/Specialty, Face In Sun Product Dollar and Unit Sales, 0.7 oz size, Based on Skincare Form/Texture, January – December 2024, Shiseido Clear Sunscreen Stick SPF 50+.

*²The HeatForce™ technology is activated on hot days, after the formula is applied to the skin. To activate the WetForce™ technology, expose the applied area to water or perspiration for 30 minutes.

*³Clinically tested by 30 women."
overview_summary: High SPF 60+ protects against UVA/UVB rays - Lightweight formula protects against micro-dust and dryness - Ultra-convenient, mess-free, and applies over and under makeup - Invisible, naturally

overview:
