INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone･Mineral Oil･Hydroxystearic Acid･Triethylhexanoin･PEG/PPG-9/2 Dimethyl Ether･Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer･Dibutyl Lauroyl Glutamide･C12-15 Alkyl Benzoate･Polyamide-8･Silica Dimethyl Silylate･Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil･Stearyl Glycyrrhetinate･Tocopheryl Acetate･PEG/PPG-14/7 Dimethyl Ether･Lecithin･Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract･PPG-17･Castor Oil/IPDI Copolymer･Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride･BHT･Simethicone･PEG-6･Pentaerythrityl Tetra-di-t-butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate･Silica･Fragrance･ <M146552-811>
how_to_use:
- Apply liberally to face, neck, and body at least 15 minutes before sun exposure.
- Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, and immediately after towel drying.
- Reapply at least every 2 hours.
- Product can be applied and re-applied over and under makeup.
overview:
An invisible SPF 60+ sunscreen stick for active and everyday protection on-the-go that reapplies effortlessly over or under makeup.

The #1 Sunscreen Stick in the US*¹ is now upgraded. Now with increased broad-spectrum SPF 60+ protection and provides 8-hours of hydration for a transparent, naturally glowing finish. Powered by SynchroShield™ technology, the sunscreen's protective veil is strengthened with exposure to heat, water, and sweat.*² It provides comfortable defense against UVA/UVB rays, micro-dust, and dryness. The innovative formula is composed of naturally-derived skincare ingredients that help to improve uneven skin tone and smoothness. This lightweight formula features Licorice Extract & Soy Lecithin to help improve uneven skin tone, while Argan Oil helps hydrate skin. This clear, weightless sunscreen glides on smoothly for a completely invisible finish on all skin tones. Suitable for all skin types, from dry to oily.

Clinically proven to improve plumpness and even tone in 2 weeks, appearance of fine lines and smoothness in 4 weeks.*³

Now available in regular and jumbo sizes for easy, on-the-go application for both face and body.

Daily sunscreen use helps prevent signs of premature skin aging caused by sun exposure such as fine lines, dark spots and uneven tone.

- High SPF 60+ protects against UVA/UVB rays

- Lightweight formula protects against micro-dust and dryness

- Ultra-convenient, mess-free, and applies over and under makeup

- Invisible, naturally glowing finish

- Skincare ingredients help to improve uneven skin tone and smoothness

- Sunscreen's protective veil is strengthened with exposure to heat, water and sweat*²

- Water-resistant for up to 80 minutes•Good for all skin types and skin tones on face and body

- Free of oxybenzone, octinoxate, and parabens

- Dermatologist-tested, ophthalmologist-tested and non-comedogenic

*¹Source: Circana, LLC, US Prestige Beauty Total Department/Specialty, Face In Sun Product Dollar and Unit Sales, 0.7 oz size, Based on Skincare Form/Texture, January – December 2024, Shiseido Clear Sunscreen Stick SPF 50+.

*²The HeatForce™ technology is activated on hot days, after the formula is applied to the skin. To activate the WetForce™ technology, expose the applied area to water or perspiration for 30 minutes.

*³Clinically tested by 30 women."
overview_summary: High SPF 60+ protects against UVA/UVB rays - Lightweight formula protects against micro-dust and dryness - Ultra-convenient, mess-free, and applies over and under makeup - Invisible, naturally

Name: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion Mineral SPF 60+
Description: A sheer, 100% mineral sunscreen lotion with SPF 60+ for all skin types, including sensitive skin.
product_title: Ultimate Sun Protector Lotion Mineral SPF 60+
Text:
5 Types of Algae: Helps to prevent dryness and hydrates skin.

Licorice Root Extract: Known to help soothe break-out prone skin.

Antioxidant-Packed Botanicals: Help prevent damage caused by UV rays that lead to wrinkles.

WetForce Technology: Negative ions in the formula combine with positive ions in perspiration and water to create an additional layer of invisible sun protection. As you continue to sweat and get wet, the product becomes more effective without any white cast.

SuperVeil-UV 360™ Technology: Creates an even layer of protection against UVA/UVB rays.

TITANIUM DIOXIDE 5.7% ･････ Sunscreen
ZINC OXIDE  5.9% ･････ Sunscreen

how_to_use:
- Shake well before use.
- Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure.
- Reapply every 2 hours, or after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, and immediately after towel drying.
overview:
A sheer, 100% mineral sunscreen lotion with SPF 60+ for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

This mineral-based face and body sunscreen provides superior protection with SPF 60+, keeping pace with active, outdoor lifestyles. This gentle lotion is infused with 85% skincare ingredients to hydrate skin and visibly improve fine lines, smoothness and even skin tone in 2 weeks.* Powered by WetForce technology, the protective veil becomes stronger with contact to water and sweat.** Experience higher-level innovation in sun protection.

Powered by over 100 years of UV research and Japanese suncare innovation.

- Mineral-based, sheer lotion for face and body

- Good for all skin types, including sensitive skin

- Higher-level, broad-spectrum SPF 60+ protects against UVA/UVB rays

- Protective veil becomes stronger with contact to water and sweat**

- Visibly improves fine lines, smoothness and even skin tone in 2 weeks*

- Maintains 8-hour hydration

- Made up of 85% skincare ingredients

- Water-resistant for 80 minutes

- Fragrance-free

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

*Clinically tested by 33 women.

**To activate the WetForce technology, expose the applied area to water or perspiration for 30 minutes.

Licorice Root Extract: Known to help soothe break-out prone skin.

Antioxidant-Packed Botanicals: Help prevent damage caused by UV rays that lead to wrinkles.

WetForce Technology: Negative ions in the formula combine with positive ions in perspiration and water to create an additional layer of invisible sun protection. As you continue to sweat and get wet, the product becomes more effective without any white cast.

SuperVeil-UV 360™ Technology: Creates an even layer of protection against UVA/UVB rays.

TITANIUM DIOXIDE 5.7% ･････ Sunscreen
ZINC OXIDE  5.9% ･････ Sunscreen
INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: WATER･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･DIMETHICONE･CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE･TRISILOXANE･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･BUTYLOCTYL SALICYLATE･BIS-BUTYLDIMETHICONE POLYGLYCERYL-3･SILICA･PEG-9 POLYDIMETHYLSILOXYETHYL DIMETHICONE･PEG-10 DIMETHICONE･DEXTRIN PALMITATE･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･PHENETHYL BENZOATE･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE･SCUTELLARIA BAICALENSIS ROOT EXTRACT･HIBISCUS SABDARIFFA FLOWER EXTRACT･CITRUS DEPRESSA PEEL EXTRACT･RUBUS IDAEUS (RASPBERRY) FRUIT EXTRACT･HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL) LEAF EXTRACT･ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･THYMUS SERPYLLUM EXTRACT･EUCHEUMA SERRA/GRATELOUPIA SPARSA/SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/ULVA LINZA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE･HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE･ISOSTEARIC ACID･TRISODIUM EDTA･CALOPHYLLUM INOPHYLLUM SEED OIL･TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE･SODIUM CITRATE･CITRIC ACID･STEARIC ACID･SODIUM METABISULFITE･GLUCOSYLRUTIN･SYZYGIUM JAMBOS LEAF EXTRACT･TOCOPHEROL･PHENOXYETHANOL･
how_to_use:
- Shake well before use.
- Apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure.
- Reapply every 2 hours, or after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, and immediately after towel drying.
overview:
A sheer, 100% mineral sunscreen lotion with SPF 60+ for all skin types, including sensitive skin.

This mineral-based face and body sunscreen provides superior protection with SPF 60+, keeping pace with active, outdoor lifestyles. This gentle lotion is infused with 85% skincare ingredients to hydrate skin and visibly improve fine lines, smoothness and even skin tone in 2 weeks.* Powered by WetForce technology, the protective veil becomes stronger with contact to water and sweat.** Experience higher-level innovation in sun protection.

Powered by over 100 years of UV research and Japanese suncare innovation.

- Mineral-based, sheer lotion for face and body

- Good for all skin types, including sensitive skin

- Higher-level, broad-spectrum SPF 60+ protects against UVA/UVB rays

- Protective veil becomes stronger with contact to water and sweat**

- Visibly improves fine lines, smoothness and even skin tone in 2 weeks*

- Maintains 8-hour hydration

- Made up of 85% skincare ingredients

- Water-resistant for 80 minutes

- Fragrance-free

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

*Clinically tested by 33 women.

**To activate the WetForce technology, expose the applied area to water or perspiration for 30 minutes.

Name: Future Solution LX Eye and Lip Contour Regenerating Cream
Description: A restoring eye and lip cream that visibly improves wrinkles and sagging of the eye and mouth areas.
product_title: Future Solution LX Eye and Lip Contour Regenerating Cream
Text:
Exclusive LonGenevity Complex™: Made up of newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P – a proprietary amino acid derivative – helps optimize skin's condition at any age. This powerful formula helps improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth. 
Sakura (Cherry Blossom Leaf) Extract and Peach Leaf Extract: Helps to prevent degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure. 
Licorice Extract, Watercress Extract and Okra Extract: Supports skin's collagen to diminish the appearance of lines and wrinkles. 

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･GLYCERIN･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE･XYLITOL･DIMETHICONE･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･SILICA･GLYCERYL STEARATE･STEARYL ALCOHOL･BEESWAX(CERA ALBA/CIRE D'ABEILLE)･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PIPERIDINEPROPIONIC ACID･AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/BEHENETH-25 METHACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER･XANTHAN GUM･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･GLYCYRRHIZA GLABRA (LICORICE) ROOT EXTRACT･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･CITRUS DEPRESSA PEEL EXTRACT･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･CHAENOMELES SINENSIS FRUIT EXTRACT･RUBUS SUAVISSIMUS (RASPBERRY) LEAF EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･HIBISCUS ESCULENTUS FRUIT EXTRACT･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･PRUNUS PERSICA (PEACH) LEAF EXTRACT･NASTURTIUM OFFICINALE LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED SILK･BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER･ISOSTEARIC ACID･HYDROGENATED PALM OIL･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) KERNEL OIL･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) OIL･ALCOHOL･ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･DISODIUM EDTA･SODIUM METABISULFITE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･LINALOOL･LIMONENE･ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･BENZYL BENZOATE･TOCOPHEROL･CITRIC ACID･PHENOXYETHANOL･CHLORPHENESIN･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･
how_to_use:
- Apply twice daily, in the morning and evening.
- Scoop two rice-sized amounts and blend between ring fingers. Smooth the cream around your entire eye and lip areas.
- Use your ring fingers to gently massage the cream in a circular motion around each eye. Repeat 6 times.
- For added benefits: Glide your fingers lightly over and under eyelids and toward temples. Repeat 6 times. Then, place your fingers above your lips and stretch the upper lip outward. Next, place your fingers below the lips and pull up on the corners of the lower lips. Lift and repeat 6 times.
- For Refill: Hook fingers around the two protrusions on the sides of the jar and gently pull out the empty container. Insert refill pod, pushing it firmly into the jar. Remove the freshness seal and replace the cap of the container. Discard empty container.
overview:
A restoring eye and lip cream that visibly improves wrinkles and sagging of the eye and mouth areas.

Inspired by 40 years of genetic research, this rich cream visibly improves the appearance of wrinkles and sagging around the eye and mouth – areas that are particularly susceptible to damage. Skin is left feeling more resilient, firm, and deeply moisturized.

Formulated with our exclusive LonGenevity Complex™ — powered by the newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P — a proprietary amino acid derivative. This powerful formula helps to improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth.

- Diminishes the look of wrinkles, sagging, and puffiness

- Reduces the appearance of dark circles, sagging eyelids and crow's feet

- Rich, hydrating texture melts into skin instantly

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.
overview_summary: Diminishes the look of wrinkles, sagging, and puffiness - Reduces the appearance of dark circles, sagging eyelids and crow's feet - Rich, hydrating texture melts into skin

Name: Future Solution LX Eye and Lip Contour Regenerating Cream
Description: A restoring eye and lip cream that visibly improves wrinkles and sagging of the eye and mouth areas.
product_title: Future Solution LX Eye and Lip Contour Regenerating Cream
Text:
Exclusive LonGenevity Complex™: Made up of newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P – a proprietary amino acid derivative – helps optimize skin's condition at any age. This powerful formula helps improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth. 
Sakura (Cherry Blossom Leaf) Extract and Peach Leaf Extract: Helps to prevent degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure. 
Licorice Extract, Watercress Extract and Okra Extract: Supports skin's collagen to diminish the appearance of lines and wrinkles. 

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･GLYCERIN･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE･XYLITOL･DIMETHICONE･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･SILICA･GLYCERYL STEARATE･STEARYL ALCOHOL･BEESWAX(CERA ALBA/CIRE D'ABEILLE)･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PIPERIDINEPROPIONIC ACID･AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/BEHENETH-25 METHACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER･XANTHAN GUM･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･GLYCYRRHIZA GLABRA (LICORICE) ROOT EXTRACT･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･CITRUS DEPRESSA PEEL EXTRACT･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･CHAENOMELES SINENSIS FRUIT EXTRACT･RUBUS SUAVISSIMUS (RASPBERRY) LEAF EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･HIBISCUS ESCULENTUS FRUIT EXTRACT･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･PRUNUS PERSICA (PEACH) LEAF EXTRACT･NASTURTIUM OFFICINALE LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED SILK･BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER･ISOSTEARIC ACID･HYDROGENATED PALM OIL･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) KERNEL OIL･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) OIL･ALCOHOL･ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･DISODIUM EDTA･SODIUM METABISULFITE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･LINALOOL･LIMONENE･ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･BENZYL BENZOATE･TOCOPHEROL･CITRIC ACID･PHENOXYETHANOL･CHLORPHENESIN･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･
how_to_use:
- Apply twice daily, in the morning and evening.
- Scoop two rice-sized amounts and blend between ring fingers. Smooth the cream around your entire eye and lip areas.
- Use your ring fingers to gently massage the cream in a circular motion around each eye. Repeat 6 times.
- For added benefits: Glide your fingers lightly over and under eyelids and toward temples. Repeat 6 times. Then, place your fingers above your lips and stretch the upper lip outward. Next, place your fingers below the lips and pull up on the corners of the lower lips. Lift and repeat 6 times.
- For Refill: Hook fingers around the two protrusions on the sides of the jar and gently pull out the empty container. Insert refill pod, pushing it firmly into the jar. Remove the freshness seal and replace the cap of the container. Discard empty container.
overview:
A restoring eye and lip cream that visibly improves wrinkles and sagging of the eye and mouth areas.

Inspired by 40 years of genetic research, this rich cream visibly improves the appearance of wrinkles and sagging around the eye and mouth – areas that are particularly susceptible to damage. Skin is left feeling more resilient, firm, and deeply moisturized.

Formulated with our exclusive LonGenevity Complex™ — powered by the newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P — a proprietary amino acid derivative. This powerful formula helps to improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth.

- Rich, hydrating texture melts into skin instantly

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.
overview_summary: Diminishes the look of wrinkles, sagging, and puffiness - Reduces the appearance of dark circles, sagging eyelids and crow's feet - Rich, hydrating texture melts into skin

Name: Urban Environment Mineral Clear Sunscreen SPF 50
Description: A daily, lightweight, clear mineral sunscreen for face with SPF 50.
product_title: Urban Environment Mineral Clear Sunscreen SPF 50
Text:
Hyaluronic Acid: Known to deliver, attract, and retain moisture.
Vitamin E: Offers antioxidant properties to support healthy looking skin.
Ginkgo Leaf Extract: Antioxidant-packed botanical helps to protect skin and defend against external aggressors.
Spirulina Essence M Complex: Helps support skin barrier function and hydration.
Hypotaurine: Helps protect skin from blue light.

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS:
Purpose TITANIUM DIOXIDE 4.5% ･････ Sunscreen 
ZINC OXIDE  17.2% ･････ Sunscreen 

INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: DIMETHICONE･WATER･DIISOPROPYL SEBACATE･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･SORBITAN SESQUIISOSTEARATE･POLYHYDROXYSTEARIC ACID･LAURYL PEG-9 POLYDIMETHYLSILOXYETHYL DIMETHICONE･SILICA･AMINOETHANESULFINIC ACID･THIOTAURINE･SCUTELLARIA BAICALENSIS ROOT EXTRACT･PAEONIA ALBIFLORA ROOT EXTRACT･SODIUM HYALURONATE･DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE･GINKGO BILOBA LEAF EXTRACT･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･ONONIS SPINOSA ROOT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA JAPONICA FLOWER EXTRACT･GARCINIA MANGOSTANA BARK EXTRACT･TREHALOSE･SPIRULINA PLATENSIS EXTRACT･SOLUBLE COLLAGEN･ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE･TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE･STEARIC ACID･DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･TRISODIUM EDTA･ISOSTEARIC ACID･SODIUM CITRATE･CITRIC ACID･SODIUM METABISULFITE･PRUNUS YEDOENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･SYZYGIUM JAMBOS LEAF EXTRACT･TOCOPHEROL･MICA･DISODIUM PHOSPHATE･RIBOFLAVIN･ERGOTHIONEINE･SODIUM PHOSPHATE･PHENOXYETHANOL･BENZOIC ACID･TITANIUM DIOXIDE･
how_to_use:
- Apply daily as the final step in your morning skincare routine before makeup application.
- Shake well before use to ensure even distribution of mineral filters.
- Apply generously and evenly to face and neck at least 15 minutes before sun exposure.
- The formula dispenses white due to 100% mineral filters. Blend thoroughly until it transforms from sheer to clear.
- Can be worn alone or under makeup.
overview:
A daily, lightweight, clear mineral sunscreen for face with SPF 50.

This 100% mineral sunscreen offers broad-spectrum sun protection for all skin types, including sensitive skin, shielding against harmful UV rays without irritation. This mineral sunscreen*¹ features world-first technology*² that reduces the white cast after application, for a clear finish. The innovative formula blends effortlessly into skin with a breathable, lightweight feel. Infused with 65% skincare ingredients, including Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, and Ginkgo Leaf Extract, this everyday formula delivers 12-hour hydration while nourishing and soothing skin. Clinically proven to improve uneven skin tone and radiance in just 2 weeks, wrinkles and firmness in 4 weeks.*³

- Proprietary IFSCC-awarded Mineral i-shield™ technology transforms formula from sheer to clear when blended

- Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive and breakout-prone skin

- Broad-spectrum SPF 50 protects from UVA/UVB rays

- Clinically proven to improve uneven skin tone and radiance in just 2 weeks, wrinkles and firmness in 4 weeks*³

- Provides long-lasting, 12-hour hydration

- Water resistant for 40 minutes

- Fragrance-free. Alcohol-free. Paraben-free.

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested. Non-comedogenic

*¹A formulation that provides UV protection using only UV scattering agents.

*²The world's first technology that improves the dispersibility of powder through the evaporation of volatile components after application in a suncare formulation using only UV scattering agents. (Based on Clarivate Analytics Japan survey, August 2024)

*³Clinically tested by 32 women.
overview_summary: Clinically proven to improve uneven skin tone and radiance in just 2 weeks, wrinkles and firmness in 4 weeks.*³ Proprietary IFSCC-awarded Mineral i-shield™ technology transforms formula from

how_to_use:
- Apply daily as the final step in your morning skincare routine before makeup application.
- Shake well before use to ensure even distribution of mineral filters.
- Apply generously and evenly to face and neck at least 15 minutes before sun exposure.
- The formula dispenses white due to 100% mineral filters. Blend thoroughly until it transforms from sheer to clear.
- Can be worn alone or under makeup.
overview:
A daily, lightweight, clear mineral sunscreen for face with SPF 50.

This 100% mineral sunscreen offers broad-spectrum sun protection for all skin types, including sensitive skin, shielding against harmful UV rays without irritation. This mineral sunscreen*¹ features world-first technology*² that reduces the white cast after application, for a clear finish. The innovative formula blends effortlessly into skin with a breathable, lightweight feel. Infused with 65% skincare ingredients, including Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, and Ginkgo Leaf Extract, this everyday formula delivers 12-hour hydration while nourishing and soothing skin. Clinically proven to improve uneven skin tone and radiance in just 2 weeks, wrinkles and firmness in 4 weeks.*³

- Proprietary IFSCC-awarded Mineral i-shield™ technology transforms formula from sheer to clear when blended

- Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive and breakout-prone skin

- Broad-spectrum SPF 50 protects from UVA/UVB rays

- Clinically proven to improve uneven skin tone and radiance in just 2 weeks, wrinkles and firmness in 4 weeks*³

- Provides long-lasting, 12-hour hydration

- Water resistant for 40 minutes

- Fragrance-free. Alcohol-free. Paraben-free.

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested. Non-comedogenic

*¹A formulation that provides UV protection using only UV scattering agents.

*²The world's first technology that improves the dispersibility of powder through the evaporation of volatile components after application in a suncare formulation using only UV scattering agents. (Based on Clarivate Analytics Japan survey, August 2024)

*³Clinically tested by 32 women.

INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: DIMETHICONE･WATER･DIISOPROPYL SEBACATE･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･SORBITAN SESQUIISOSTEARATE･POLYHYDROXYSTEARIC ACID･LAURYL PEG-9 POLYDIMETHYLSILOXYETHYL DIMETHICONE･SILICA･AMINOETHANESULFINIC ACID･THIOTAURINE･SCUTELLARIA BAICALENSIS ROOT EXTRACT･PAEONIA ALBIFLORA ROOT EXTRACT･SODIUM HYALURONATE･DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE･GINKGO BILOBA LEAF EXTRACT･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･ONONIS SPINOSA ROOT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA JAPONICA FLOWER EXTRACT･GARCINIA MANGOSTANA BARK EXTRACT･TREHALOSE･SPIRULINA PLATENSIS EXTRACT･SOLUBLE COLLAGEN･ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE･TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE･STEARIC ACID･DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･TRISODIUM EDTA･ISOSTEARIC ACID･SODIUM CITRATE･CITRIC ACID･SODIUM METABISULFITE･PRUNUS YEDOENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･SYZYGIUM JAMBOS LEAF EXTRACT･TOCOPHEROL･MICA･DISODIUM PHOSPHATE･RIBOFLAVIN･ERGOTHIONEINE･SODIUM PHOSPHATE･PHENOXYETHANOL･BENZOIC ACID･TITANIUM DIOXIDE･
how_to_use:
- Apply daily as the final step in your morning skincare routine before makeup application.
- Shake well before use to ensure even distribution of mineral filters.
- Apply generously and evenly to face and neck at least 15 minutes before sun exposure.
- The formula dispenses white due to 100% mineral filters. Blend thoroughly until it transforms from sheer to clear.
- Can be worn alone or under makeup.
overview:
A daily, lightweight, clear mineral sunscreen for face with SPF 50.

This 100% mineral sunscreen offers broad-spectrum sun protection for all skin types, including sensitive skin, shielding against harmful UV rays without irritation. This mineral sunscreen*¹ features world-first technology*² that reduces the white cast after application, for a clear finish. The innovative formula blends effortlessly into skin with a breathable, lightweight feel. Infused with 65% skincare ingredients, including Hyaluronic Acid, Vitamin E, and Ginkgo Leaf Extract, this everyday formula delivers 12-hour hydration while nourishing and soothing skin. Clinically proven to improve uneven skin tone and radiance in just 2 weeks, wrinkles and firmness in 4 weeks.*³

- Proprietary IFSCC-awarded Mineral i-shield™ technology transforms formula from sheer to clear when blended

- Suitable for all skin types, including sensitive and breakout-prone skin

- Broad-spectrum SPF 50 protects from UVA/UVB rays

- Clinically proven to improve uneven skin tone and radiance in just 2 weeks, wrinkles and firmness in 4 weeks*³

- Provides long-lasting, 12-hour hydration

- Water resistant for 40 minutes

- Fragrance-free. Alcohol-free. Paraben-free.

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested. Non-comedogenic

*¹A formulation that provides UV protection using only UV scattering agents.

*²The world's first technology that improves the dispersibility of powder through the evaporation of volatile components after application in a suncare formulation using only UV scattering agents. (Based on Clarivate Analytics Japan survey, August 2024)

*³Clinically tested by 32 women.

Name: Future Solution LX Extra Rich Cleansing Foam
Description: Wash away impurities with this purifying, foaming facial cleanser for hydrated, smooth and refined skin.
product_title: Future Solution LX Extra Rich Cleansing Foam
Text:
Japanese Enmei Herb Extract: This powerful botanical enhances skin's condition to purify while preserving essential moisture.
NMT (N-Methyltaurine): Removes impurities and attracts moisture for smoother looking skin.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･MYRISTIC ACID･GLYCERIN･STEARIC ACID･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･SORBITOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･LAURIC ACID･PEG-20 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･PEG-6･PEG-32･SODIUM METHYL COCOYL TAURATE･GLYCOL DISTEARATE･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･POLYQUATERNIUM-7･ACRYLATES COPOLYMER･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･PRUNUS LANNESIANA FLOWER EXTRACT･TRISODIUM EDTA･SODIUM METHYLTAURATE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･LINALOOL･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･LIMONENE･SODIUM METABISULFITE･COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE･SODIUM LAURYL SULFATE･SODIUM BENZOATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･
how_to_use:
- Apply twice daily, in the morning and evening.
- Wet skin with warm water and dispense a pearl-sized amount of cleanser onto dampened hands.
- Rub hands together to create a lather.
- Massage over face with gentle circular motions, then rinse thoroughly with warm water.
overview:
Wash away impurities with this purifying, foaming facial cleanser for hydrated, smooth and refined skin.

Inspired by 40 years of genetic research, our most luxurious cleanser preps and envelops skin in a rich lather and super fine bubbles to remove impurities while preserving skin's essential moisture. This nourishing, luxurious foam promotes resilience and leaves skin smooth and clarified.

- Removes impurities while maintaining skin's moisture

- Leaves skin with a smoother look and feel

- Moisture-absorbing ingredients create a protective, hydrating veil

- Preps skin to better absorb products that follow

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

Name: Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Advanced Day Cream SPF 30
Description: A highly effective daily moisturizer with SPF 30 that delivers multiple age-defying benefits.
product_title: Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Advanced Day Cream SPF 30
how_to_use:
- Apply in the morning, after cleansing at least 15 minutes before sun exposure.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin).
- Smooth gently over the face, starting in the larger areas such as the cheeks and forehead. Spread from the center of the face outward, and then along the jawline.
- Apply upward pressure along the jawline with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat 6 times.
- Hold four fingers together, placing the pointer fingers along the nasolabial folds (laugh lines).
- Move upward toward the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds open, with palms flat on the cheeks. Lift, and repeat 6 times.
overview:
A highly effective daily moisturizer with SPF 30 that delivers multiple age-defying benefits.

This scientifically advanced face moisturizer for the daytime delivers comprehensive anti-aging benefits that help to improve firmness, sagging, dark spots, uneven skin tone and deep wrinkles. This cream strengthens your invisible nutrient network which helps maintain natural collagen for a stronger moisture barrier, and firmer, brighter skin. Powered by SafflowerRED™, exclusively grown in Japan, and Ginseng Root Extract. Now available in a refill size.

- Clinically proven to improve skin with multiple age-defying effects, targeting sagging, deep wrinkles, loss of firmness, dark spots, and uneven skin tone.

- Broad-spectrum SPF 30 sun protection against UVA/UVB rays

- Features SafflowerRED™ to support collagen network

- Provides 24-hour hydration

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Refill helps reduce plastic waste by up to 79% compared with a regular product

Name: Future Solution LX Total Regenerating Cream
Description: Wake up to supple skin with this luxurious, anti-aging night cream that visibly improves loss of resilience, wrinkles, dullness and pores.
product_title: Future Solution LX Total Regenerating Cream
Text:
Exclusive LonGenevity Complex™: Made up of newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P – a proprietary amino acid derivative – helps optimize skin's condition at any age. This powerful formula helps improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth. 
Sakura (Cherry Blossom Leaf) Extract and Peach Leaf Extract: Helps to prevent degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure. 
Licorice Extract, Rosemary Extract and Okra Extract: Firms, tightens and renews skin.

- Apply as the last step in your nightly skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot on the five points of the face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face.
- Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck and sweep the cream upward from neck to jawline.

how_to_use:
- Apply as the last step in your nightly skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot on the five points of the face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face.
- Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck and sweep the cream upward from neck to jawline.
- For Refill: Hook fingers around the two protrusions on the sides of the jar and gently pull out the empty container. Insert refill pod, pushing it firmly into the jar. Remove the freshness seal and replace the cap of the container. Discard empty container.

Name: Future Solution LX Concentrated Brightening Softener
Description: A daily hydrating softener that brings out skin's clarity and radiance while refining texture.
product_title: Future Solution LX Concentrated Brightening Softener
Text:
Exclusive LonGenevity Complex™: Made up of newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P – a proprietary amino acid derivative – helps optimize skin's condition at any age. This powerful formula helps improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth. 
Sakura (Cherry Blossom Leaf) Extract and Peach Leaf Extract: Helps to prevent degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure. 
4MSK and Rosa Fruit Extract: Provides powerful brightening benefits to address dark spots. 

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･GLYCERIN･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･BETAINE･DIMETHICONE･CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE･PEG-20･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･PIPERIDINEPROPIONIC ACID･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･ERYTHRITOL･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･LAURYL BETAINE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･XANTHAN GUM･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･CHAENOMELES SINENSIS FRUIT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･ROSA MULTIFLORA FRUIT EXTRACT･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･PRUNUS PERSICA (PEACH) LEAF EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED SILK･SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER･CARBOMER･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･ISOSTEARIC ACID･ISOHEXADECANE･PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･ALCOHOL･PEG-10 DIMETHICONE･POLYSORBATE 80･ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER･SORBITAN OLEATE･TRISODIUM EDTA･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･LINALOOL･LIMONENE･SODIUM METABISULFITE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･BENZYL BENZOATE･TOCOPHEROL･PHENOXYETHANOL･SODIUM BENZOATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･
how_to_use:
- Apply in morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Pump twice onto a cotton pad. Starting from the center of the face, use outward strokes to smooth on softener:
- Across the forehead
- From nose to cheeks
- Around lips
- Along the jawline
- Upward from the base of the neck to the jaw
- For Refill: Remove refill cap. Twist and remove empty, inner bottle from reusable outer bottle. Insert refill into the outer container, and twist until firmly in place. Discard refill cap.
overview:
A daily hydrating softener that brings out skin's clarity and radiance while refining texture.

Inspired by 40 years of genetic research, this luxurious, anti-aging solution absorbs effortlessly to address concerns such as dryness, dark spots, and enlarged pores, leaving skin more hydrated and smooth.

Formulated with our exclusive LonGenevity Complex™ — powered by newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P — a proprietary amino acid derivative. This powerful formula helps to improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth.

- Optimizes skin by helping to improve skin barrier function

- Helps to prevent the degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure, leaving skin resilient and plump

- Provides powerful brightening benefits to address dark spots with renowned Shiseido 4MSK technology and Rosa Fruit Extract

- Infuses skin with moisture for 24-hour hydration

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.
overview_summary: Optimizes skin by helping to improve skin barrier function - Helps to prevent the degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure, leaving skin resilient and plump

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･GLYCERIN･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･BETAINE･DIMETHICONE･CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE･PEG-20･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･PIPERIDINEPROPIONIC ACID･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･ERYTHRITOL･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･LAURYL BETAINE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･XANTHAN GUM･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･CHAENOMELES SINENSIS FRUIT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･ROSA MULTIFLORA FRUIT EXTRACT･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･PRUNUS PERSICA (PEACH) LEAF EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED SILK･SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER･CARBOMER･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･ISOSTEARIC ACID･ISOHEXADECANE･PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･ALCOHOL･PEG-10 DIMETHICONE･POLYSORBATE 80･ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER･SORBITAN OLEATE･TRISODIUM EDTA･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･LINALOOL･LIMONENE･SODIUM METABISULFITE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･BENZYL BENZOATE･TOCOPHEROL･PHENOXYETHANOL･SODIUM BENZOATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･
how_to_use:
- Apply in morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Pump twice onto a cotton pad. Starting from the center of the face, use outward strokes to smooth on softener:
- Across the forehead
- From nose to cheeks
- Around lips
- Along the jawline
- Upward from the base of the neck to the jaw
- For Refill: Remove refill cap. Twist and remove empty, inner bottle from reusable outer bottle. Insert refill into the outer container, and twist until firmly in place. Discard refill cap.
overview:
A daily hydrating softener that brings out skin's clarity and radiance while refining texture.

Inspired by 40 years of genetic research, this luxurious, anti-aging solution absorbs effortlessly to address concerns such as dryness, dark spots, and enlarged pores, leaving skin more hydrated and smooth.

Formulated with our exclusive LonGenevity Complex™ — powered by newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P — a proprietary amino acid derivative. This powerful formula helps to improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth.

- Optimizes skin by helping to improve skin barrier function

- Helps to prevent the degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure, leaving skin resilient and plump

- Provides powerful brightening benefits to address dark spots with renowned Shiseido 4MSK technology and Rosa Fruit Extract

- Infuses skin with moisture for 24-hour hydration

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

Name: Future Solution LX Eye and Lip Contour Regenerating Cream
Description: A restoring eye and lip cream that visibly improves wrinkles and sagging of the eye and mouth areas.
product_title: Future Solution LX Eye and Lip Contour Regenerating Cream
Text:
Exclusive LonGenevity Complex™: Made up of newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P – a proprietary amino acid derivative – helps optimize skin's condition at any age. This powerful formula helps improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth. 
Sakura (Cherry Blossom Leaf) Extract and Peach Leaf Extract: Helps to prevent degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure. 
Licorice Extract, Watercress Extract and Okra Extract: Supports skin's collagen to diminish the appearance of lines and wrinkles. 

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･GLYCERIN･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE･XYLITOL･DIMETHICONE･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･SILICA･GLYCERYL STEARATE･STEARYL ALCOHOL･BEESWAX(CERA ALBA/CIRE D'ABEILLE)･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PIPERIDINEPROPIONIC ACID･AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/BEHENETH-25 METHACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER･XANTHAN GUM･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･GLYCYRRHIZA GLABRA (LICORICE) ROOT EXTRACT･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･CITRUS DEPRESSA PEEL EXTRACT･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･CHAENOMELES SINENSIS FRUIT EXTRACT･RUBUS SUAVISSIMUS (RASPBERRY) LEAF EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･HIBISCUS ESCULENTUS FRUIT EXTRACT･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･PRUNUS PERSICA (PEACH) LEAF EXTRACT･NASTURTIUM OFFICINALE LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED SILK･BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER･ISOSTEARIC ACID･HYDROGENATED PALM OIL･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) KERNEL OIL･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) OIL･ALCOHOL･ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･DISODIUM EDTA･SODIUM METABISULFITE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･LINALOOL･LIMONENE･ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･BENZYL BENZOATE･TOCOPHEROL･CITRIC ACID･PHENOXYETHANOL･CHLORPHENESIN･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･
how_to_use:
- Apply twice daily, in the morning and evening.
- Scoop two rice-sized amounts and blend between ring fingers. Smooth the cream around your entire eye and lip areas.
- Use your ring fingers to gently massage the cream in a circular motion around each eye. Repeat 6 times.
- For added benefits: Glide your fingers lightly over and under eyelids and toward temples. Repeat 6 times. Then, place your fingers above your lips and stretch the upper lip outward. Next, place your fingers below the lips and pull up on the corners of the lower lips. Lift and repeat 6 times.

how_to_use:
- Apply twice daily, in the morning and evening.
- Scoop two rice-sized amounts and blend between ring fingers. Smooth the cream around your entire eye and lip areas.
- Use your ring fingers to gently massage the cream in a circular motion around each eye. Repeat 6 times.
- For added benefits: Glide your fingers lightly over and under eyelids and toward temples. Repeat 6 times. Then, place your fingers above your lips and stretch the upper lip outward. Next, place your fingers below the lips and pull up on the corners of the lower lips. Lift and repeat 6 times.
- For Refill: Hook fingers around the two protrusions on the sides of the jar and gently pull out the empty container. Insert refill pod, pushing it firmly into the jar. Remove the freshness seal and replace the cap of the container. Discard empty container.

Name: Future Solution LX Intensive Firming Brilliance Serum
Description: A rich, dewy serum with firming benefits for a brighter complexion.
product_title: Future Solution LX Intensive Firming Brilliance Serum
Text:
Exclusive LonGenevity Complex™: Made up of newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P – a proprietary amino acid derivative – helps optimize skin's condition at any age. This powerful formula helps improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth. 
Sakura (Cherry Blossom Leaf) Extract and Peach Leaf Extract: Helps to prevent degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure. 
Chai Hu Extract, Rubus Leaf Extract and Pine Extract: Helps support collagen for firm, resilient skin.  
4MSK: A renowned Shiseido ingredient that provides powerful brightening benefits. 

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･GLYCERIN･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER･DIMETHICONE･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･PIPERIDINEPROPIONIC ACID･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･XANTHAN GUM･SODIUM POLYACRYLATE･LAURYL BETAINE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･VP/VA COPOLYMER･PYRUS CYDONIA SEED EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･CHAENOMELES SINENSIS FRUIT EXTRACT･RUBUS SUAVISSIMUS (RASPBERRY) LEAF EXTRACT･PINUS SYLVESTRIS CONE EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･PRUNUS PERSICA (PEACH) LEAF EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED SILK･PEG-12 DIMETHICONE･ISOHEXADECANE･ISOSTEARIC ACID･ALCOHOL･POLYSORBATE 80･CARBOMER･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･SORBITAN OLEATE･POLYVINYL ALCOHOL･SODIUM METHYL STEAROYL TAURATE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･DISODIUM EDTA･LINALOOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･LIMONENE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･BENZYL BENZOATE･TOCOPHEROL･PHENOXYETHANOL･SODIUM BENZOATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･
how_to_use:
>
- Apply twice daily, in morning and evening.
- Place one pump of serum into the palm of your hand and blend into the skin, starting in the center of the face and using upward strokes.
- Dispense another pump into hands and sweep upward from the base of the neck to the jawline.
- For added benefits: Gently smooth the serum outward over the face and then along your jawline. Place both thumbs under the jawline and apply upward pressure starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat this motion 6 times. Then, holding 4 fingers together, press the pointer fingers parallel to your nasolabial folds—or laugh lines. Then tilt fingers so they lie flat onto skin and sweep them upward towards the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds taut. Lift and repeat 6 times.
- For Refill: Remove refill cap. Twist and remove empty, inner bottle from reusable outer bottle. Insert refill into the outer container, and twist until firmly in place. Discard refill cap.
overview:
A rich, dewy serum with firming benefits for a brighter complexion.

Inspired by 40 years of genetic research, this powerful firming serum transforms the face and neck areas by boosting firmness and resilience for a more defined, tightened look, and increases skin's clarity for a brighter complexion. Enhance effects with facial massage to lift and tone skin.

Formulated with our exclusive LonGenevity Complex™ — powered by the newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P — a proprietary amino acid derivative. This powerful formula helps to improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth.

- Delivers skin-tightening, defining, and contouring benefits

- Features unique LiftNet technology to seal in moisture, leaving skin feeling bouncy and resilient

- Minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

- Infuses skin with moisture for 24-hour hydration

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.
overview_summary: Delivers skin-tightening, defining, and contouring benefits - Features unique LiftNet technology to seal in moisture, leaving skin feeling bouncy and resilient - Minimizes the appearance of fine

Name: Future Solution LX Intensive Firming Brilliance Serum
Description: A rich, dewy serum with firming benefits for a brighter complexion.
product_title: Future Solution LX Intensive Firming Brilliance Serum
Text:
Exclusive LonGenevity Complex™: Made up of newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P – a proprietary amino acid derivative – helps optimize skin's condition at any age. This powerful formula helps improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth. 
Sakura (Cherry Blossom Leaf) Extract and Peach Leaf Extract: Helps to prevent degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure. 
Chai Hu Extract, Rubus Leaf Extract and Pine Extract: Helps support collagen for firm, resilient skin.  
4MSK: A renowned Shiseido ingredient that provides powerful brightening benefits. 

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･GLYCERIN･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER･DIMETHICONE･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･PIPERIDINEPROPIONIC ACID･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･XANTHAN GUM･SODIUM POLYACRYLATE･LAURYL BETAINE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･VP/VA COPOLYMER･PYRUS CYDONIA SEED EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･CHAENOMELES SINENSIS FRUIT EXTRACT･RUBUS SUAVISSIMUS (RASPBERRY) LEAF EXTRACT･PINUS SYLVESTRIS CONE EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･PRUNUS PERSICA (PEACH) LEAF EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED SILK･PEG-12 DIMETHICONE･ISOHEXADECANE･ISOSTEARIC ACID･ALCOHOL･POLYSORBATE 80･CARBOMER･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･SORBITAN OLEATE･POLYVINYL ALCOHOL･SODIUM METHYL STEAROYL TAURATE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･DISODIUM EDTA･LINALOOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･LIMONENE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･BENZYL BENZOATE･TOCOPHEROL･PHENOXYETHANOL･SODIUM BENZOATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･
how_to_use:
>
- Apply twice daily, in morning and evening.
- Place one pump of serum into the palm of your hand and blend into the skin, starting in the center of the face and using upward strokes.
- Dispense another pump into hands and sweep upward from the base of the neck to the jawline.
- For added benefits: Gently smooth the serum outward over the face and then along your jawline. Place both thumbs under the jawline and apply upward pressure starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat this motion 6 times. Then, holding 4 fingers together, press the pointer fingers parallel to your nasolabial folds—or laugh lines. Then tilt fingers so they lie flat onto skin and sweep them upward towards the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds taut. Lift and repeat 6 times.
- For Refill: Remove refill cap. Twist and remove empty, inner bottle from reusable outer bottle. Insert refill into the outer container, and twist until firmly in place. Discard refill cap.
overview:
A rich, dewy serum with firming benefits for a brighter complexion.

Inspired by 40 years of genetic research, this powerful firming serum transforms the face and neck areas by boosting firmness and resilience for a more defined, tightened look, and increases skin's clarity for a brighter complexion. Enhance effects with facial massage to lift and tone skin.

Formulated with our exclusive LonGenevity Complex™ — powered by the newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P — a proprietary amino acid derivative. This powerful formula helps to improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth.

- Delivers skin-tightening, defining, and contouring benefits

- Features unique LiftNet technology to seal in moisture, leaving skin feeling bouncy and resilient

- Minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

- Infuses skin with moisture for 24-hour hydration

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.
overview_summary: Delivers skin-tightening, defining, and contouring benefits - Features unique LiftNet technology to seal in moisture, leaving skin feeling bouncy and resilient - Minimizes the appearance of fine

Name: Future Solution LX Concentrated Brightening Softener
Description: A daily hydrating softener that brings out skin's clarity and radiance while refining texture.
product_title: Future Solution LX Concentrated Brightening Softener
Text:
Exclusive LonGenevity Complex™: Made up of newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P – a proprietary amino acid derivative – helps optimize skin's condition at any age. This powerful formula helps improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth. 
Sakura (Cherry Blossom Leaf) Extract and Peach Leaf Extract: Helps to prevent degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure. 
4MSK and Rosa Fruit Extract: Provides powerful brightening benefits to address dark spots. 

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･GLYCERIN･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･BETAINE･DIMETHICONE･CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE･PEG-20･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･PIPERIDINEPROPIONIC ACID･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･ERYTHRITOL･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･LAURYL BETAINE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･XANTHAN GUM･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･CHAENOMELES SINENSIS FRUIT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･ROSA MULTIFLORA FRUIT EXTRACT･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･PRUNUS PERSICA (PEACH) LEAF EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED SILK･SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER･CARBOMER･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･ISOSTEARIC ACID･ISOHEXADECANE･PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･ALCOHOL･PEG-10 DIMETHICONE･POLYSORBATE 80･ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER･SORBITAN OLEATE･TRISODIUM EDTA･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･LINALOOL･LIMONENE･SODIUM METABISULFITE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･BENZYL BENZOATE･TOCOPHEROL･PHENOXYETHANOL･SODIUM BENZOATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･
how_to_use:
- Apply in morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Pump twice onto a cotton pad. Starting from the center of the face, use outward strokes to smooth on softener:
- Across the forehead
- From nose to cheeks
- Around lips
- Along the jawline
- Upward from the base of the neck to the jaw
- For Refill: Remove refill cap. Twist and remove empty, inner bottle from reusable outer bottle. Insert refill into the outer container, and twist until firmly in place. Discard refill cap.
overview:
A daily hydrating softener that brings out skin's clarity and radiance while refining texture.

Inspired by 40 years of genetic research, this luxurious, anti-aging solution absorbs effortlessly to address concerns such as dryness, dark spots, and enlarged pores, leaving skin more hydrated and smooth.

Formulated with our exclusive LonGenevity Complex™ — powered by newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P — a proprietary amino acid derivative. This powerful formula helps to improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth.

- Optimizes skin by helping to improve skin barrier function

- Helps to prevent the degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure, leaving skin resilient and plump

- Provides powerful brightening benefits to address dark spots with renowned Shiseido 4MSK technology and Rosa Fruit Extract

- Infuses skin with moisture for 24-hour hydration

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.
overview_summary: Optimizes skin by helping to improve skin barrier function - Helps to prevent the degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure, leaving skin resilient and plump

- Apply in morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Pump twice onto a cotton pad. Starting from the center of the face, use outward strokes to smooth on softener:
- Across the forehead
- From nose to cheeks
- Around lips
- Along the jawline
- Upward from the base of the neck to the jaw
- For Refill: Remove refill cap. Twist and remove empty, inner bottle from reusable outer bottle. Insert refill into the outer container, and twist until firmly in place. Discard refill cap.

Inspired by 40 years of genetic research, this luxurious, anti-aging solution absorbs effortlessly to address concerns such as dryness, dark spots, and enlarged pores, leaving skin more hydrated and smooth.

Formulated with our exclusive LonGenevity Complex™ — powered by newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P — a proprietary amino acid derivative. This powerful formula helps to improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth.

- Optimizes skin by helping to improve skin barrier function

- Helps to prevent the degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure, leaving skin resilient and plump

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

Name: Future Solution LX Total Protective Cream SPF 30
Description: A daily face cream that provides protection against external aggressors, leaving skin more smooth, plump and resilient with all-day hydration.
product_title: Future Solution LX Total Protective Cream SPF 30
Text:
Exclusive LonGenevity Complex: Made up of newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P – a proprietary amino acid derivative – helps optimize skin’s condition at any age. This powerful formula helps improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth. 
Sakura (Cherry Blossom Leaf) Extract and Peach Leaf Extract: Helps to prevent degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin’s structure. 
Vitamin E: Helps defends skin from environmental stressors.  

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: 
AVOBENZONE 2.3% ･････ Sunscreen 
HOMOSALATE 10.0% ･････ Sunscreen 
OCTISALATE 4.5% ･････ Sunscreen 
OCTOCRYLENE 5.0% ･････ Sunscreen 
INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: WATER･GLYCERIN･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･SILICA･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･ALCOHOL DENAT.･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･DIMETHICONE･ISODODECANE･STEARYL ALCOHOL･PHYTOSTERYL MACADAMIATE･PEG-6･PEG-32･TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE･HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･PIPERIDINEPROPIONIC ACID･XANTHAN GUM･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･SCUTELLARIA BAICALENSIS ROOT EXTRACT･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･CHAENOMELES SINENSIS FRUIT EXTRACT･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･PRUNUS PERSICA (PEACH) LEAF EXTRACT･ZANTHOXYLUM PIPERITUM PEEL EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED SILK･BEHENETH-20･ALCOHOL･SUCCINOGLYCAN･TRISODIUM EDTA･SODIUM CITRATE･TOCOPHEROL･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･BHT･CITRIC ACID･SODIUM METABISULFITE･MICA･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE･IRON OXIDES･TITANIUM DIOXIDE･
how_to_use:
- Apply as the last step in your morning skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the five points of the face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face.
- Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck, and sweep the cream upward from neck to jawline.
- For Refill: Hook fingers around the two protrusions on the sides of the jar and gently pull out the empty container. Insert refill pod, pushing it firmly into the jar. Remove the freshness seal and replace the cap of the container. Discard empty container.
overview:
A daily face cream that provides protection against external aggressors, leaving skin more smooth, plump and resilient with all-day hydration.

Inspired by 40 years of genetic research, this rich daytime moisturizer – infused with SPF 30 – contains an ultra-luxurious anti-aging formula with a hydrating yet lightweight texture, defending against UV rays and external aggressors for smooth and plump skin.

Formulated with our exclusive LonGenevity Complex — powered by the newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P — a proprietary amino acid derivative. This powerful formula helps to improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth.

- Defends skin from environmental stressors

- Infuses skin with all day 12-hour hydration

- Broad-spectrum SPF 30 sun protection

- Includes tray made of special Tatami-beri fabric, used to protect and reinforce the edge of the Tatami mat, a rich piece of Japanese tradition

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.
overview_summary: Defends skin from environmental stressors - Infuses skin with all day 12-hour hydration - Broad-spectrum SPF 30 sun protection - Includes tray made of special Tatami-beri fabric,

Exclusive LonGenevity Complex: Made up of newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P – a proprietary amino acid derivative – helps optimize skin’s condition at any age. This powerful formula helps improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth. 
Sakura (Cherry Blossom Leaf) Extract and Peach Leaf Extract: Helps to prevent degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin’s structure. 
Vitamin E: Helps defends skin from environmental stressors.

AVOBENZONE 2.3% ･････ Sunscreen 
HOMOSALATE 10.0% ･････ Sunscreen

OCTOCRYLENE 5.0% ･････ Sunscreen

how_to_use:
- Apply as the last step in your morning skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the five points of the face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face.
- Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck, and sweep the cream upward from neck to jawline.
- For Refill: Hook fingers around the two protrusions on the sides of the jar and gently pull out the empty container. Insert refill pod, pushing it firmly into the jar. Remove the freshness seal and replace the cap of the container. Discard empty container.

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

Name: Vital Perfection LiftDefine Radiance Night Concentrate
Description: Inspired by world-leading research on the look of sagging, this advanced and highly effective anti-aging night serum intensively cares for your skin while you sleep to create a lifted, sculpted, and defined look. Wake up to skin that is visibly tighter, firmer, and more even-toned.
product_title: Vital Perfection LiftDefine Radiance Night Concentrate
Text:
Exclusive LiftDynamic 4D Technology with Licorice Root Extract: based on advanced world-leading research, helps strengthen skin's own anti-gravity system to resist and improve sagging.
Watercress Extract and Iris Root Extract: help support skin's natural collagen production, leaving skin firmer.   
Exclusive 4MSK and Vitamin C Ethyl: help improve the look of dark spots, uneven skin tone, and dull skin.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)・DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL・GLYCERIN・DIMETHICONE・BUTYLENE GLYCOL・BEHENYL ALCOHOL・MALTITOL・TRIETHYLHEXANOIN・POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE・PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER・TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE・PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE・TOCOPHERYL ACETATE・ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER WATER・2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID・CAFFEINE・ECTOIN・LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL・GLYCYRRHIZA GLABRA (LICORICE) ROOT EXTRACT・ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT・ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT・OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) LEAF EXTRACT・IRIS FLORENTINA ROOT EXTRACT・SANGUISORBA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT・LAMIUM ALBUM FLOWER/LEAF/STEM EXTRACT・CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT・INOSITOL・CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) FLOWER EXTRACT・PINUS SYLVESTRIS CONE EXTRACT・ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT・ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)・BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT・ACHILLEA MILLEFOLIUM EXTRACT・NASTURTIUM OFFICINALE LEAF/STEM EXTRACT・POLYVINYL ALCOHOL・BATYL ALCOHOL・BEHENIC ACID・PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE・PEG-10 DIMETHICONE・MYRISTYL MYRISTATE・POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE・DISODIUM EDTA・SODIUM CITRATE・ALCOHOL・CITRIC ACID・SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE・PPG-3 DIPIVALATE・LIMONENE・HEXYL CINNAMAL・LINALOOL・TOCOPHEROL・CITRONELLOL・SODIUM METABISULFITE・CINNAMOMUM CASSIA BARK EXTRACT・ALPINIA SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT・CELLULOSE・PHENOXYETHANOL・FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)・IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)・IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)・
how_to_use:
- Apply at night as your last skincare step.
- Pump the dispenser once and slowly massage onto face and neck.
overview:
Inspired by world-leading research on the look of sagging, this advanced and highly effective anti-aging night serum intensively cares for your skin while you sleep to create a lifted, sculpted, and defined look. Wake up to skin that is visibly tighter, firmer, and more even-toned.

- Improves the look of dark spots, uneven skin tone, and dull skin.

- Helps target sagging caused by aging.

- Helps support skin's natural collagen production.

- Uniquely formulated as the final step of your skincare routine to be used over creams.

- Paraben-free, mineral oil-free.

- Dermatologist-tested.
overview_summary: Inspired by world-leading research on the look of sagging, this advanced and highly effective anti-aging night serum intensively cares for your skin while you sleep to create a lifted, sculpted,

- Apply at night as your last skincare step.
- Pump the dispenser once and slowly massage onto face and neck.
overview:
Inspired by world-leading research on the look of sagging, this advanced and highly effective anti-aging night serum intensively cares for your skin while you sleep to create a lifted, sculpted, and defined look. Wake up to skin that is visibly tighter, firmer, and more even-toned.

- Improves the look of dark spots, uneven skin tone, and dull skin.

- Helps target sagging caused by aging.

- Helps support skin's natural collagen production.

- Uniquely formulated as the final step of your skincare routine to be used over creams.

- Paraben-free, mineral oil-free.

- Dermatologist-tested.

Name: Future Solution LX Intensive Firming Brilliance Serum
Description: A rich, dewy serum with firming benefits for a brighter complexion.
product_title: Future Solution LX Intensive Firming Brilliance Serum
Text:
Exclusive LonGenevity Complex™: Made up of newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P – a proprietary amino acid derivative – helps optimize skin's condition at any age. This powerful formula helps improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth. 
Sakura (Cherry Blossom Leaf) Extract and Peach Leaf Extract: Helps to prevent degradation of elastin and to strengthen skin's structure. 
Chai Hu Extract, Rubus Leaf Extract and Pine Extract: Helps support collagen for firm, resilient skin.  
4MSK: A renowned Shiseido ingredient that provides powerful brightening benefits. 

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･GLYCERIN･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER･DIMETHICONE･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･PIPERIDINEPROPIONIC ACID･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･XANTHAN GUM･SODIUM POLYACRYLATE･LAURYL BETAINE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･VP/VA COPOLYMER･PYRUS CYDONIA SEED EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･CHAENOMELES SINENSIS FRUIT EXTRACT･RUBUS SUAVISSIMUS (RASPBERRY) LEAF EXTRACT･PINUS SYLVESTRIS CONE EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･PRUNUS PERSICA (PEACH) LEAF EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED SILK･PEG-12 DIMETHICONE･ISOHEXADECANE･ISOSTEARIC ACID･ALCOHOL･POLYSORBATE 80･CARBOMER･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･SORBITAN OLEATE･POLYVINYL ALCOHOL･SODIUM METHYL STEAROYL TAURATE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･DISODIUM EDTA･LINALOOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･LIMONENE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･BENZYL BENZOATE･TOCOPHEROL･PHENOXYETHANOL･SODIUM BENZOATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･
how_to_use:
>
- Apply twice daily, in morning and evening.
- Place one pump of serum into the palm of your hand and blend into the skin, starting in the center of the face and using upward strokes.
- Dispense another pump into hands and sweep upward from the base of the neck to the jawline.
- For added benefits: Gently smooth the serum outward over the face and then along your jawline. Place both thumbs under the jawline and apply upward pressure starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat this motion 6 times. Then, holding 4 fingers together, press the pointer fingers parallel to your nasolabial folds—or laugh lines. Then tilt fingers so they lie flat onto skin and sweep them upward towards the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds taut. Lift and repeat 6 times.
- For Refill: Remove refill cap. Twist and remove empty, inner bottle from reusable outer bottle. Insert refill into the outer container, and twist until firmly in place. Discard refill cap.
overview:
A rich, dewy serum with firming benefits for a brighter complexion.

Inspired by 40 years of genetic research, this powerful firming serum transforms the face and neck areas by boosting firmness and resilience for a more defined, tightened look, and increases skin's clarity for a brighter complexion. Enhance effects with facial massage to lift and tone skin.

Formulated with our exclusive LonGenevity Complex™ — powered by the newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P — a proprietary amino acid derivative. This powerful formula helps to improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth.

- Delivers skin-tightening, defining, and contouring benefits

- Features unique LiftNet technology to seal in moisture, leaving skin feeling bouncy and resilient

- Minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

- Infuses skin with moisture for 24-hour hydration

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.
overview_summary: Delivers skin-tightening, defining, and contouring benefits - Features unique LiftNet technology to seal in moisture, leaving skin feeling bouncy and resilient - Minimizes the appearance of fine

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･GLYCERIN･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER･DIMETHICONE･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･PIPERIDINEPROPIONIC ACID･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･XANTHAN GUM･SODIUM POLYACRYLATE･LAURYL BETAINE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･VP/VA COPOLYMER･PYRUS CYDONIA SEED EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･CHAENOMELES SINENSIS FRUIT EXTRACT･RUBUS SUAVISSIMUS (RASPBERRY) LEAF EXTRACT･PINUS SYLVESTRIS CONE EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･PRUNUS PERSICA (PEACH) LEAF EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED SILK･PEG-12 DIMETHICONE･ISOHEXADECANE･ISOSTEARIC ACID･ALCOHOL･POLYSORBATE 80･CARBOMER･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･SORBITAN OLEATE･POLYVINYL ALCOHOL･SODIUM METHYL STEAROYL TAURATE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･DISODIUM EDTA･LINALOOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･LIMONENE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･BENZYL BENZOATE･TOCOPHEROL･PHENOXYETHANOL･SODIUM BENZOATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･
how_to_use:
>
- Apply twice daily, in morning and evening.
- Place one pump of serum into the palm of your hand and blend into the skin, starting in the center of the face and using upward strokes.
- Dispense another pump into hands and sweep upward from the base of the neck to the jawline.
- For added benefits: Gently smooth the serum outward over the face and then along your jawline. Place both thumbs under the jawline and apply upward pressure starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat this motion 6 times. Then, holding 4 fingers together, press the pointer fingers parallel to your nasolabial folds—or laugh lines. Then tilt fingers so they lie flat onto skin and sweep them upward towards the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds taut. Lift and repeat 6 times.
- For Refill: Remove refill cap. Twist and remove empty, inner bottle from reusable outer bottle. Insert refill into the outer container, and twist until firmly in place. Discard refill cap.
overview:
A rich, dewy serum with firming benefits for a brighter complexion.

Inspired by 40 years of genetic research, this powerful firming serum transforms the face and neck areas by boosting firmness and resilience for a more defined, tightened look, and increases skin's clarity for a brighter complexion. Enhance effects with facial massage to lift and tone skin.

Formulated with our exclusive LonGenevity Complex™ — powered by the newly-enhanced Enmei Herb, Vitamin C, Green Tea and Skingenecell 1P — a proprietary amino acid derivative. This powerful formula helps to improve skin barrier function, leaving skin more bright, plump and smooth.

- Delivers skin-tightening, defining, and contouring benefits

- Features unique LiftNet technology to seal in moisture, leaving skin feeling bouncy and resilient

- Minimizes the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles

- Infuses skin with moisture for 24-hour hydration

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.
overview_summary: Delivers skin-tightening, defining, and contouring benefits - Features unique LiftNet technology to seal in moisture, leaving skin feeling bouncy and resilient - Minimizes the appearance of fine

Name: Future Solution LX Universal Defense SPF 50
Description: A luxurious, daily broad-spectrum SPF 50 face sunscreen cream that defends against multiple daytime aggressors and infuses skin with 12-hour hydration.
product_title: Future Solution LX Universal Defense SPF 50
Text:
Japanese Enmei Herb Extract: Powerful botanical supports skin’s condition while preserving essential moisture
Golden Mushroom Complex: Promotes an antioxidant effect to help protect skin from external aggressors
Japanese Botanicals (Cherry Blossom Leaf, Peach Leaf, and Quince Fruit Extracts): Help to visibly improve skin firmness and smoothness


ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: 
OCTISALATE 2.5% ･････ Sunscreen 
OCTOCRYLENE 2.5% ･････ Sunscreen 
ZINC OXIDE  16.9% ･････ Sunscreen 

INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: WATER･DIISOPROPYL SEBACATE･ISOPROPYL MYRISTATE･ALCOHOL DENAT.･ALCOHOL･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･CAPRYLYL METHICONE･DEXTRIN PALMITATE/ETHYLHEXANOATE･POLYHYDROXYSTEARIC ACID･ACRYLAMIDES/DMAPA ACRYLATES/METHOXY PEG METHACRYLATE COPOLYMER･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･GINKGO BILOBA LEAF EXTRACT･SCUTELLARIA BAICALENSIS ROOT EXTRACT･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･CHAENOMELES SINENSIS FRUIT EXTRACT･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･ECTOIN･CAMELLIA JAPONICA SEED EXTRACT･PRUNUS PERSICA (PEACH) LEAF EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED SILK･ROSA ROXBURGHII FRUIT EXTRACT･POLYQUATERNIUM-51･PEG-100 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL･HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE･SILICA･DIMETHYLACRYLAMIDE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE CROSSPOLYMER･HYDROXYPROPYL METHYLCELLULOSE STEAROXY ETHER･SUCCINOGLYCAN･HYDROGENATED PALM OIL･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) KERNEL OIL･TOCOPHEROL･BHT･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) OIL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･PEG-12 DIMETHICONE･DISODIUM PHOSPHATE･MICA･ERGOTHIONEINE･SODIUM PHOSPHATE･CITRIC ACID･TIN OXIDE･CHLORPHENESIN･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE･TITANIUM DIOXIDE･RED 33･YELLOW 6･YELLOW 5･
how_to_use:
- Use as the last step of your morning skincare routine.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops and smooth over face.
- Apply 15 minutes before sun exposure.
- Reapply at least every 2 hours or after 40 minutes of swimming or sweating, and immediately after towel drying.
overview:
A luxurious, daily broad-spectrum SPF 50 face sunscreen cream that defends against multiple daytime aggressors and infuses skin with 12-hour hydration.

This dewy sunscreen protects skin from UV rays and shields from the effects of air pollution and dust. Provides long-lasting hydration, leaving a plump and radiant finish without greasiness. Formulated with Japanese Enmei Herb Extract and Golden Mushroom Complex to support skin's condition and defend against multiple environmental stressors. With continued use, skin's look of resilience and brilliance is improved and fine lines are visibly reduced.

- Broad-spectrum SPF 50 protects from UVA/UVB rays

- Shields from environmental stressors such as dryness, dust and pollution

- Provides 12-hour hydration

- Non-greasy, comfortable texture for daily use

- Dewy, radiant finish

- Water-resistant for 40 minutes

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

Name: Clarifying Cleansing Foam
Description: Whisk away makeup, impurities and skin-dulling surface cells with this foaming facial cleanser to reveal smooth, radiant results.
product_title: Clarifying Cleansing Foam
Text:
White Clay: Absorbs excess sebum and impurities.
Yomogi Extract: Prevents skin roughness and promotes radiance.

INGREDIENTS: WATER (AQUA/EAU)･STEARIC ACID･PEG-8･MYRISTIC ACID･GLYCERIN･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･LAURIC ACID･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･SORBITOL･COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE･PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･SODIUM METHYL COCOYL TAURATE･PHYTOSTERYL MACADAMIATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･POLYQUATERNIUM-39･DISODIUM EDTA･WATER (AQUA)･ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) GERM OIL･LINALOOL･GERANIOL･CITRONELLOL･KAOLIN･SODIUM BENZOATE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･ACRYLATES COPOLYMER･BETAINE･SILK POWDER(SERICA/POUDRE DE SOIE)･TOCOPHEROL･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･ARTEMISIA PRINCEPS LEAF EXTRACT･SODIUM LAURYL SULFATE･
how_to_use:
- Use daily, in the morning and evening as the first step in your skincare routine.
- Wet skin with lukewarm water. Dispense a pearl-sized amount of cleanser onto dampened hands and rub hands together to create a lather.
- Massage over face with gentle circular motions, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
overview:
Whisk away makeup, impurities and skin-dulling surface cells with this foaming facial cleanser to reveal smooth, radiant results.

Cleanse and balance skin with this daily foaming face wash infused with signature Japanese ingredients. White Clay absorbs excess oil, Yomogi Extract prevents roughness, Rice Germ Oil softens and pure Kirishima Mineral Spring Water helps supplement skin's essential minerals.

- Clarifies and balances skin

- Removes dirt and pollutants without stripping skin of essential moisture

- Promotes skin radiance

- Lathers and rinses off easily

- Good for all skin types

- Dermatologist-tested
overview_summary: White Clay absorbs excess oil, Yomogi Extract prevents roughness, Rice Germ Oil softens and pure Kirishima Mineral Spring Water helps supplement skin's essential minerals.

Name: Eudermine Activating Essence
Description: Shiseido's first skincare innovation, Eudermine Activating Essence infuses skin with two types of Hyaluronic Acid for 24 hours of deep hydration, while targeting dark spots with Vitamin C. In just 4 weeks, pores, blemishes, and dullness become less visible.*
product_title: Eudermine Activating Essence
Text:
Two types of Hyaluronic Acid: Infuses skin with moisture for 24 hours, while supporting moisture retention and protecting skin.
Vitamin C: A potent and stable form of the vitamin, Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, boosts radiance for a bright, even-toned complexion.
Fermented Kefir Extract: This exclusive prebiotic promotes skin's turnover cycle while strengthening the barrier function.
Yuzu Extract: Recharges skin's moisture. 

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･ALCOHOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･DIGLYCERIN･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･LACTOBACILLUS/RICE FERMENT･PEG-60 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･ERYTHRITOL･DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE･XANTHAN GUM･SODIUM POLYACRYLATE･CITRUS JUNOS FRUIT EXTRACT･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･SODIUM HYALURONATE･HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL) LEAF EXTRACT･CARBOMER･POLYGLYCERYL-2 DIISOSTEARATE･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･DISODIUM EDTA･ISOSTEARYL ALCOHOL･ISOSTEARIC ACID･SODIUM CITRATE･CITRIC ACID･LINALOOL･GERANIOL･HEXYL CINNAMAL･CITRONELLOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･LIMONENE･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･RED 33 (CI 17200)･YELLOW 5 (CI 19140)･
how_to_use:
- Apply daily, in the morning and evening after cleansing.
- Apply with Shiseido's 100% natural Japanese Facial Cotton for additional exfoliation and absorption allowing for maximum benefits.
- Saturate Shiseido Facial Cotton with a quarter-sized amount of essence.
- Smooth gently over skin. For an even more effective application, tap gently into skin with your fingers to increase activation.
- For Refill: Remove cap. Remove ring part from reusable outer bottle. Then pull up the ring from the used inner bottle. Keeping ring level, push it down onto new refill bottle until it clicks in place. Insert refill into the outer container. Remove the refill cap and replace with outer bottle cap.
overview:
Shiseido's first skincare innovation, Eudermine Activating Essence infuses skin with two types of Hyaluronic Acid for 24 hours of deep hydration, while targeting dark spots with Vitamin C. In just 4 weeks, pores, blemishes, and dullness become less visible.*

Created in 1897 and rooted in Japanese Beauty rituals, Eudermine was a favorite of geishas who used it to protect skin under heavy makeup. With a double dose of Hyaluronic Acid, this ultra-hydrating formula drenches skin in moisture, while Vitamin C brightens and evens complexion. The lightweight texture revitalizes, nourishes, and softens skin—an essential step in any Japanese Beauty skincare routine.

- Infuses skin with two types of Hyaluronic Acid to stay moisturized for 24 hours

- Targets dark spots and brightens skin with Vitamin C

- Promotes skin's turnover cycle while strengthening the barrier function with exclusive prebiotic Fermented Kefir Extract

- Recharges moisture with Yuzu Extract

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Revolutionary packaging combines the bottle forming and filling process into one step, helping reduce CO2**

- Refill system helps reduce plastic by 92% compared with a regular product

*Clinically tested by 33 women.

**Compared to other manufacturing methods.
overview_summary: Infuses skin with two types of Hyaluronic Acid to stay moisturized for 24 hours - Targets dark spots and brightens skin with Vitamin C - Promotes skin's
