- Apply with Shiseido's 100% natural Japanese Facial Cotton for additional exfoliation and absorption allowing for maximum benefits.
- Saturate Shiseido Facial Cotton with a quarter-sized amount of essence.
- Smooth gently over skin. For an even more effective application, tap gently into skin with your fingers to increase activation.
- For Refill: Remove cap. Remove ring part from reusable outer bottle. Then pull up the ring from the used inner bottle. Keeping ring level, push it down onto new refill bottle until it clicks in place. Insert refill into the outer container. Remove the refill cap and replace with outer bottle cap.
overview:
Shiseido's first skincare innovation, Eudermine Activating Essence infuses skin with two types of Hyaluronic Acid for 24 hours of deep hydration, while targeting dark spots with Vitamin C. In just 4 weeks, pores, blemishes, and dullness become less visible.*

Created in 1897 and rooted in Japanese Beauty rituals, Eudermine was a favorite of geishas who used it to protect skin under heavy makeup. With a double dose of Hyaluronic Acid, this ultra-hydrating formula drenches skin in moisture, while Vitamin C brightens and evens complexion. The lightweight texture revitalizes, nourishes, and softens skin—an essential step in any Japanese Beauty skincare routine.

- Infuses skin with two types of Hyaluronic Acid to stay moisturized for 24 hours

- Targets dark spots and brightens skin with Vitamin C

- Promotes skin's turnover cycle while strengthening the barrier function with exclusive prebiotic Fermented Kefir Extract

- Recharges moisture with Yuzu Extract

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Revolutionary packaging combines the bottle forming and filling process into one step, helping reduce CO2**

- Refill system helps reduce plastic by 92% compared with a regular product

*Clinically tested by 33 women.

**Compared to other manufacturing methods.

product_title: Eudermine Activating Essence
Text:
Two types of Hyaluronic Acid: Infuses skin with moisture for 24 hours, while supporting moisture retention and protecting skin.
Vitamin C: A potent and stable form of the vitamin, Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, boosts radiance for a bright, even-toned complexion.
Fermented Kefir Extract: This exclusive prebiotic promotes skin's turnover cycle while strengthening the barrier function.
Yuzu Extract: Recharges skin's moisture.

Name: Benefiance Overnight Wrinkle Resisting Cream
Description: A rich, restorative night cream that visibly improves wrinkles overnight.* Deeply hydrates featuring Hyaluronic Acid while smoothing and restoring skin while you sleep.
product_title: Benefiance Overnight Wrinkle Resisting Cream
Text:
TENCHA R.E.M, composed of Super Bio-Hyaluronic Acid, Rubus Leaf Extract, and Yarrow Extract, supports the natural skin repairing process during the night to help prevent and improve the appearance of wrinkles caused by lack of sleep.
ReNeura Technology+™ features Natsume and Active Response Powder Ashitaba to help improve skin receptivity to awaken and maintain the effectiveness of your treatment over time.
KOMBU-Bounce Complex: Formulated with green, brown, and red algae which helps address the look of wrinkles.
Niacinamide: Fortifies skin's barrier and smooths skin's texture.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･GLYCERIN･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAETHYLHEXANOATE･NIACINAMIDE･MINERAL OIL(PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM/HUILE MINERALE)･MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX(CERA MICROCRISTALLINA/CIRE MICROCRISTALLINE)･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･DIMETHICONE･LIMNANTHES ALBA (MEADOWFOAM) SEED OIL･TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE･GLYCERYL STEARATE･STEARYL ALCOHOL･PEG-6･PEG-32･ISODODECANE･PARAFFIN･PHENOXYETHANOL･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･ALCOHOL･TRISODIUM EDTA･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･SODIUM CITRATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･XANTHAN GUM･CAFFEINE･CITRIC ACID･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･SODIUM METABISULFITE･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･LINALOOL･TOCOPHEROL･SAPINDUS MUKOROSSI PEEL EXTRACT･LIMONENE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･RUBUS SUAVISSIMUS (RASPBERRY) LEAF EXTRACT･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･CITRUS JUNOS SEED EXTRACT･BHT･UNCARIA GAMBIR EXTRACT･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･CHLORELLA VULGARIS EXTRACT･ACHILLEA MILLEFOLIUM EXTRACT･EUCHEUMA SERRA/GRATELOUPIA SPARSA/SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/ULVA LINZA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･CURCUMA LONGA (TURMERIC) RHIZOME EXTRACT･SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･CELLULOSE･
how_to_use:
- Use in the evening as the last step of your skincare routine.
- Scoop two pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on face (cheeks, forehead, nose, chin).
- Smooth from the center outward, starting from the wider areas like the cheeks and the forehead, and apply to the entire face. Repeat 2-3 times for each area.
overview:
A rich, restorative night cream that visibly improves wrinkles overnight.* Deeply hydrates featuring Hyaluronic Acid while smoothing and restoring skin while you sleep.

Specifically formulated for the nighttime, this moisturizing cream helps correct the appearance of and prevent wrinkles. TENCHA R.E.M. works to visibly improve the look of wrinkles that are caused by a lack of sleep. ReNeura Technology+ and KOMBU-Bounce Complex help strengthen skin's ability to correct and target the appearance of wrinkles. Wake up to smooth, radiant and rested looking skin.

- Visibly improves wrinkles overnight*

- Specifically formulated for nighttime

- Ideal for normal to dry skin types

- Dermatologist-tested

*Consumer tested by 103 women.
overview_summary: TENCHA R.E.M. Visibly improves wrinkles overnight* - Specifically formulated for nighttime - Ideal for normal to dry skin types - Dermatologist-tested *Consumer tested by 103 women.

Name: Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Day Cream SPF 23
Description: Our best-selling, daily anti-aging face cream offers broad-spectrum SPF 23 sun protection, lasting hydration and visible wrinkle correction.
product_title: Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Day Cream SPF 23
Text:
KOMBU-Bounce Complex: Green, Brown, and Red Algae plus Chlorella Extract fortifies skin's barrier to help prevent and minimize the appearance of wrinkles.
Turmeric Extract: Offers potent antioxidant and soothing properties to help minimize wrinkles and improve skin elasticity.

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: 
AVOBENZONE 2.0% ･････ Sunscreen 
HOMOSALATE 5.0% ･････ Sunscreen 
OCTINOXATE 7.4% ･････ Sunscreen 
OCTOCRYLENE 3.0% ･････ Sunscreen 
OXYBENZONE 1.5% ･････ Sunscreen 

INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: WATER･GLYCERIN･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･SD ALCOHOL 40-B･SILICA･DIMETHICONE･ISODODECANE･ISOHEXADECANE･SORBITOL･BEHENETH-20･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･PHYTOSTERYL MACADAMIATE･ERYTHRITOL･XANTHAN GUM･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･CAFFEINE･SAPINDUS MUKOROSSI PEEL EXTRACT･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･CITRUS JUNOS SEED EXTRACT･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･EUCHEUMA SERRA/GRATELOUPIA SPARSA/SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/ULVA LINZA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･CURCUMA LONGA (TURMERIC) RHIZOME EXTRACT･POLYQUATERNIUM-51･SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･CHLORELLA VULGARIS EXTRACT･PPG-17･STEARYL ALCOHOL･BEHENETH-30･ALCOHOL･CARBOMER･CELLULOSE GUM･TRISODIUM EDTA･HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER･SODIUM CITRATE･BHT･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･CITRIC ACID･TOCOPHEROL･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･SODIUM METABISULFITE･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE･IRON OXIDES･
how_to_use:
- Apply in the morning as the last step in your skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the 5 points of the face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck, and sweep the cream upward to your jawline.
overview:
Our best-selling, daily anti-aging face cream offers broad-spectrum SPF 23 sun protection, lasting hydration and visible wrinkle correction.

Get fast wrinkle-diminishing results with this daytime moisturizer. KOMBU-Bounce Complex (Green, Brown, and Red Algae plus Chlorella Extract) helps correct existing wrinkles, as antioxidant-rich Turmeric Extract soothes and improves elasticity. Skin feels smooth and resilient with 24-hour moisture.

- Visibly improves the appearance of wrinkles

- Deeply hydrates for 24 hours

- Broad-spectrum SPF 23 sun protection against UVA/UVB rays

- Silky, smooth cream texture

- Good for all skin types

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.
overview_summary: Visibly improves the appearance of wrinkles - Deeply hydrates for 24 hours - Broad-spectrum SPF 23 sun protection against UVA/UVB rays - Silky, smooth cream texture -

- Apply in the morning as the last step in your skincare routine.

Purified & Micronized Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers, attracts, and retains moisture.
Ginseng Root Extract: Offers energizing and soothing properties to support the natural production of Hyaluronic Acid and strengthens skin's moisture barrier.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･DIMETHICONE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･ALCOHOL DENAT.･BETAINE･GLYCERIN･ISOHEXADECANE･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･SILICA･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･STEARYL ALCOHOL･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･POLYSORBATE 60･PEG-100 STEARATE･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･PHENOXYETHANOL･DIMETHYLACRYLAMIDE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE CROSSPOLYMER･TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)･SORBITAN TRISTEARATE･ERYTHRITOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･ALCOHOL･AMINOPROPYL DIMETHICONE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･CARBOMER･TRISODIUM EDTA･XANTHAN GUM･CAFFEINE･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･ISOSTEARIC ACID･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE･LINALOOL･TOCOPHEROL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･LIMONENE･CITRUS UNSHIU PEEL EXTRACT･SODIUM HYALURONATE･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･PANAX GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･SCUTELLARIA BAICALENSIS ROOT EXTRACT･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･ALPINIA SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･SANGUISORBA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT･PYROLA INCARNATA EXTRACT･
how_to_use:
- Apply in the morning and evening, as the last step of your skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the 5 points of your face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount on your neck, and sweep the cream upward from throat to jawline.
- For Refill: Hold the jar with one hand and place your fingers on the protrusions on the mouth of the cap and lift out the pod. Set the new refill in place and firmly push into the jar. Peel off the inner sticker and firmly close the cap.
overview:
A fast-absorbing face cream that supports skin's natural production of Hyaluronic Acid for deep, intense hydration that lasts 24 hours.

Achieve soft, supple skin with this daily moisturizer featuring Ginseng Root Extract and our proprietary Hyaluronic Acid that strengthens skin's moisture barrier. This cream visibly reduces the appearance of pores and fine lines in 4 weeks.*

- Deep, intense hydration that lasts 24-hours

- Supports skin's natural production of Hyaluronic Acid

- Strengthens skin's moisture barrier

- Visibly reduces the appearance of pores and fine lines in 4 weeks*

- Good for all skin types

- Refill helps reduce plastic waste by up to 81% compared with a regular product

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

*Clinically tested by 34 women.

Name: Shiseido Men Energizing Moisturizer Extra Light Fluid
Description: A lightweight, 32-hour hydrating face moisturizer that helps reduce the look of fine lines, dullness and dry skin.
product_title: Shiseido Men Energizing Moisturizer Extra Light Fluid
how_to_use:
- Apply after cleansing and after serum.
- Pump twice and smooth evenly over the face.
overview:
A lightweight, 32-hour hydrating face moisturizer that helps reduce the look of fine lines, dullness and dry skin.

Formulated for men’s unique needs, this non-greasy, extra-light moisturizer absorbs immediately to hydrate skin for 32 hours of continuous moisture*.

Combats the look of lines, dullness, and dehydration for a youthful, invigorated appearance—and multi-tasks as an eye cream.

*Tested on 20 participants, aged 20–70, in France.

how_to_use:
- Apply after cleansing and after serum.
- Pump twice and smooth evenly over the face.
overview:
A lightweight, 32-hour hydrating face moisturizer that helps reduce the look of fine lines, dullness and dry skin.

Formulated for men’s unique needs, this non-greasy, extra-light moisturizer absorbs immediately to hydrate skin for 32 hours of continuous moisture*.

Combats the look of lines, dullness, and dehydration for a youthful, invigorated appearance—and multi-tasks as an eye cream.

*Tested on 20 participants, aged 20–70, in France.
overview_summary: Formulated for men’s unique needs, this non-greasy, extra-light moisturizer absorbs immediately to hydrate skin for 32 hours of continuous moisture*. *Tested on 20 participants, aged 20–70, in France.

Name: Treatment Softener Enriched
Description: A smoothing and hydrating softener that visibly plumps skin.
product_title: Treatment Softener Enriched (for normal, dry and very dry skin)
Text:
Signature Japanese Ingredients:
Kirishima Mineral Spring Water: Helps supplement skin's essential minerals.
Japanese Yuzu Seed Extract: Helps improve skin's moisture.
Evening Primrose Oil: Provides a rich, soothing effect.
InternalPowerResist technology (featuring ImuCalm Compound™):  Helps to strengthen the skin barrier while Hamamelis Extract provides an antioxidant effect.

INGREDIENTS:WATER(AQUA/EAU)･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･DIGLYCERIN･PEG-6･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･BETAINE･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG-60 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL･PHENOXYETHANOL･POLYGLYCERYL-2 DIISOSTEARATE･ISODECYL NEOPENTANOATE･METHYLPARABEN･DISODIUM EDTA･WATER (AQUA)･SODIUM CITRATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･ALCOHOL･ERYTHRITOL･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･TREMELLA FUCIFORMIS POLYSACCHARIDE･POTASSIUM COCOYL GLUTAMATE･CITRIC ACID･LINALOOL･SAPINDUS MUKOROSSI PEEL EXTRACT･SODIUM METABISULFITE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･MAGNESIUM CHLORIDE･OENOTHERA BIENNIS (EVENING PRIMROSE) OIL･CALCIUM CHLORIDE･SERINE･HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL) LEAF EXTRACT･TOCOPHEROL･ZINGIBER AROMATICUS EXTRACT･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･CITRUS JUNOS SEED EXTRACT･
how_to_use:
- After cleansing, pump 3 times to saturate a Shiseido Facial Cotton pad and wipe gently over face.
- Recommended Pairings: Clarifying Cleansing Foam
overview:
A smoothing and hydrating softener that visibly plumps skin.

A hydrating softener enriched with effective ingredients to visibly plump and moisturize skin. Skin is left healthy-looking and hydrated, making it receptive to further skincare treatment.

Exclusive InternalPowerResist technology helps to strengthen and defend skin while signature Japanese ingredients provide moisturizing benefits. This softener helps to target dryness, making it ideal for normal, dry, and very dry skin types.

- Hydrates and visibly plumps skin

- Helps improve skin's radiance and clarity

- Good for normal, dry, and very dry skin types

- Provides 24-hour moisture

- Dermatologist-tested
overview_summary: Hydrates and visibly plumps skin - Helps improve skin's radiance and clarity - Good for normal, dry, and very dry skin types - Provides 24-hour moisture -

Name: Shiseido Men Face Cleanser
Description: A rich, fine-textured 2-in-1 foaming face wash that doubles as a shaving cream to clean, refresh, and energize the skin. Get a clean start on your day with the refreshing benefits of this 2-in-1, foaming daily face wash. Efficient and energizing, it effectively removes dirt, oil, and debris, doing double duty as a shaving cream too.
product_title: Shiseido Men Face Cleanser
how_to_use:
- Take a dime-size amount of cleanser onto the palm of your hand.
- Add small amounts of cold or lukewarm water to work up a rich lather.
- Apply the foam onto face using gentle circular motions to clean.
- Rinse thoroughly.
category: Face Wash & Shaving Cream for Men

Name: Essential Energy Hydrating Cream
Description: A fast-absorbing face cream that supports skin's natural production of Hyaluronic Acid for deep, intense hydration that lasts 24 hours.
product_title: Essential Energy Hydrating Cream
Text:
Purified & Micronized Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers, attracts, and retains moisture.
Ginseng Root Extract: Offers energizing and soothing properties to support the natural production of Hyaluronic Acid and strengthens skin's moisture barrier.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･DIMETHICONE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･ALCOHOL DENAT.･BETAINE･GLYCERIN･ISOHEXADECANE･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･SILICA･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･STEARYL ALCOHOL･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･POLYSORBATE 60･PEG-100 STEARATE･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･PHENOXYETHANOL･DIMETHYLACRYLAMIDE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE CROSSPOLYMER･TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)･SORBITAN TRISTEARATE･ERYTHRITOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･ALCOHOL･AMINOPROPYL DIMETHICONE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･CARBOMER･TRISODIUM EDTA･XANTHAN GUM･CAFFEINE･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･ISOSTEARIC ACID･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE･LINALOOL･TOCOPHEROL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･LIMONENE･CITRUS UNSHIU PEEL EXTRACT･SODIUM HYALURONATE･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･PANAX GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･SCUTELLARIA BAICALENSIS ROOT EXTRACT･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･ALPINIA SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･SANGUISORBA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT･PYROLA INCARNATA EXTRACT･
how_to_use:
- Apply in the morning and evening, as the last step of your skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the 5 points of your face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount on your neck, and sweep the cream upward from throat to jawline.
- For Refill: Hold the jar with one hand and place your fingers on the protrusions on the mouth of the cap and lift out the pod. Set the new refill in place and firmly push into the jar. Peel off the inner sticker and firmly close the cap.
overview:
A fast-absorbing face cream that supports skin's natural production of Hyaluronic Acid for deep, intense hydration that lasts 24 hours.

Achieve soft, supple skin with this daily moisturizer featuring Ginseng Root Extract and our proprietary Hyaluronic Acid that strengthens skin's moisture barrier. This cream visibly reduces the appearance of pores and fine lines in 4 weeks.*

- Deep, intense hydration that lasts 24-hours

- Supports skin's natural production of Hyaluronic Acid

- Strengthens skin's moisture barrier

- Visibly reduces the appearance of pores and fine lines in 4 weeks*

- Good for all skin types

- Refill helps reduce plastic waste by up to 81% compared with a regular product

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

*Clinically tested by 34 women.
overview_summary: This cream visibly reduces the appearance of pores and fine lines in 4 weeks.* Deep, intense hydration that lasts 24-hours - Supports skin's natural production of Hyaluronic

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･DIMETHICONE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･ALCOHOL DENAT.･BETAINE･GLYCERIN･ISOHEXADECANE･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･SILICA･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･STEARYL ALCOHOL･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･POLYSORBATE 60･PEG-100 STEARATE･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･PHENOXYETHANOL･DIMETHYLACRYLAMIDE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE CROSSPOLYMER･TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)･SORBITAN TRISTEARATE･ERYTHRITOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･ALCOHOL･AMINOPROPYL DIMETHICONE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･CARBOMER･TRISODIUM EDTA･XANTHAN GUM･CAFFEINE･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･ISOSTEARIC ACID･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE･LINALOOL･TOCOPHEROL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･LIMONENE･CITRUS UNSHIU PEEL EXTRACT･SODIUM HYALURONATE･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･PANAX GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･SCUTELLARIA BAICALENSIS ROOT EXTRACT･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･ALPINIA SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･SANGUISORBA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT･PYROLA INCARNATA EXTRACT･
how_to_use:
- Apply in the morning and evening, as the last step of your skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the 5 points of your face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount on your neck, and sweep the cream upward from throat to jawline.
- For Refill: Hold the jar with one hand and place your fingers on the protrusions on the mouth of the cap and lift out the pod. Set the new refill in place and firmly push into the jar. Peel off the inner sticker and firmly close the cap.
overview:
A fast-absorbing face cream that supports skin's natural production of Hyaluronic Acid for deep, intense hydration that lasts 24 hours.

Achieve soft, supple skin with this daily moisturizer featuring Ginseng Root Extract and our proprietary Hyaluronic Acid that strengthens skin's moisture barrier. This cream visibly reduces the appearance of pores and fine lines in 4 weeks.*

- Deep, intense hydration that lasts 24-hours

- Supports skin's natural production of Hyaluronic Acid

- Strengthens skin's moisture barrier

- Visibly reduces the appearance of pores and fine lines in 4 weeks*

- Good for all skin types

- Refill helps reduce plastic waste by up to 81% compared with a regular product

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

*Clinically tested by 34 women.

Name: Eudermine Activating Essence
Description: Shiseido's first skincare innovation, Eudermine Activating Essence infuses skin with two types of Hyaluronic Acid for 24 hours of deep hydration, while targeting dark spots with Vitamin C. In just 4 weeks, pores, blemishes, and dullness become less visible.*
product_title: Eudermine Activating Essence
Text:
Two types of Hyaluronic Acid: Infuses skin with moisture for 24 hours, while supporting moisture retention and protecting skin.
Vitamin C: A potent and stable form of the vitamin, Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, boosts radiance for a bright, even-toned complexion.
Fermented Kefir Extract: This exclusive prebiotic promotes skin's turnover cycle while strengthening the barrier function.
Yuzu Extract: Recharges skin's moisture. 

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･ALCOHOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･DIGLYCERIN･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･LACTOBACILLUS/RICE FERMENT･PEG-60 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･ERYTHRITOL･DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE･XANTHAN GUM･SODIUM POLYACRYLATE･CITRUS JUNOS FRUIT EXTRACT･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･SODIUM HYALURONATE･HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL) LEAF EXTRACT･CARBOMER･POLYGLYCERYL-2 DIISOSTEARATE･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･DISODIUM EDTA･ISOSTEARYL ALCOHOL･ISOSTEARIC ACID･SODIUM CITRATE･CITRIC ACID･LINALOOL･GERANIOL･HEXYL CINNAMAL･CITRONELLOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･LIMONENE･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･RED 33 (CI 17200)･YELLOW 5 (CI 19140)･
how_to_use:
- Apply daily, in the morning and evening after cleansing.
- Apply with Shiseido's 100% natural Japanese Facial Cotton for additional exfoliation and absorption allowing for maximum benefits.
- Saturate Shiseido Facial Cotton with a quarter-sized amount of essence.
- Smooth gently over skin. For an even more effective application, tap gently into skin with your fingers to increase activation.
- For Refill: Remove cap. Remove ring part from reusable outer bottle. Then pull up the ring from the used inner bottle. Keeping ring level, push it down onto new refill bottle until it clicks in place. Insert refill into the outer container. Remove the refill cap and replace with outer bottle cap.
overview:
Shiseido's first skincare innovation, Eudermine Activating Essence infuses skin with two types of Hyaluronic Acid for 24 hours of deep hydration, while targeting dark spots with Vitamin C. In just 4 weeks, pores, blemishes, and dullness become less visible.*

Created in 1897 and rooted in Japanese Beauty rituals, Eudermine was a favorite of geishas who used it to protect skin under heavy makeup. With a double dose of Hyaluronic Acid, this ultra-hydrating formula drenches skin in moisture, while Vitamin C brightens and evens complexion. The lightweight texture revitalizes, nourishes, and softens skin—an essential step in any Japanese Beauty skincare routine.

- Infuses skin with two types of Hyaluronic Acid to stay moisturized for 24 hours

- Targets dark spots and brightens skin with Vitamin C

- Promotes skin's turnover cycle while strengthening the barrier function with exclusive prebiotic Fermented Kefir Extract

- Recharges moisture with Yuzu Extract

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Revolutionary packaging combines the bottle forming and filling process into one step, helping reduce CO2**

- Refill system helps reduce plastic by 92% compared with a regular product

*Clinically tested by 33 women.

**Compared to other manufacturing methods.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･ALCOHOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･DIGLYCERIN･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･LACTOBACILLUS/RICE FERMENT･PEG-60 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･ERYTHRITOL･DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE･XANTHAN GUM･SODIUM POLYACRYLATE･CITRUS JUNOS FRUIT EXTRACT･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･SODIUM HYALURONATE･HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL) LEAF EXTRACT･CARBOMER･POLYGLYCERYL-2 DIISOSTEARATE･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･DISODIUM EDTA･ISOSTEARYL ALCOHOL･ISOSTEARIC ACID･SODIUM CITRATE･CITRIC ACID･LINALOOL･GERANIOL･HEXYL CINNAMAL･CITRONELLOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･LIMONENE･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･RED 33 (CI 17200)･YELLOW 5 (CI 19140)･
how_to_use:
- Apply daily, in the morning and evening after cleansing.
- Apply with Shiseido's 100% natural Japanese Facial Cotton for additional exfoliation and absorption allowing for maximum benefits.
- Saturate Shiseido Facial Cotton with a quarter-sized amount of essence.
- Smooth gently over skin. For an even more effective application, tap gently into skin with your fingers to increase activation.
- For Refill: Remove cap. Remove ring part from reusable outer bottle. Then pull up the ring from the used inner bottle. Keeping ring level, push it down onto new refill bottle until it clicks in place. Insert refill into the outer container. Remove the refill cap and replace with outer bottle cap.
overview:
Shiseido's first skincare innovation, Eudermine Activating Essence infuses skin with two types of Hyaluronic Acid for 24 hours of deep hydration, while targeting dark spots with Vitamin C. In just 4 weeks, pores, blemishes, and dullness become less visible.*

Created in 1897 and rooted in Japanese Beauty rituals, Eudermine was a favorite of geishas who used it to protect skin under heavy makeup. With a double dose of Hyaluronic Acid, this ultra-hydrating formula drenches skin in moisture, while Vitamin C brightens and evens complexion. The lightweight texture revitalizes, nourishes, and softens skin—an essential step in any Japanese Beauty skincare routine.

- Infuses skin with two types of Hyaluronic Acid to stay moisturized for 24 hours

- Targets dark spots and brightens skin with Vitamin C

- Promotes skin's turnover cycle while strengthening the barrier function with exclusive prebiotic Fermented Kefir Extract

- Recharges moisture with Yuzu Extract

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Revolutionary packaging combines the bottle forming and filling process into one step, helping reduce CO2**

- Refill system helps reduce plastic by 92% compared with a regular product

*Clinically tested by 33 women.

**Compared to other manufacturing methods.
overview_summary: Infuses skin with two types of Hyaluronic Acid to stay moisturized for 24 hours - Targets dark spots and brightens skin with Vitamin C - Promotes skin's

Name: Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Cream Enriched
Description: Our best-selling, daily anti-aging face cream for dry skin offers intense hydration and visible wrinkle correction.
product_title: Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Cream Enriched
Text:
KOMBU-Bounce Complex: Green, Brown, and Red Algae plus Chlorella Extract fortifies skin's barrier to help prevent and minimize the appearance of wrinkles.
Turmeric Extract: Offers potent antioxidant and soothing properties to help minimize the look of wrinkles and improve elasticity.
Niacinamide: Fortifies skin's barrier and smooths skin's texture.
Yuzu Seed Extract: Supports collagen production for visibly resilient, vibrant skin.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE･GLYCERIN･NIACINAMIDE･NYLON-12･CETEARYL ALCOHOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･SD ALCOHOL 40-B (ALCOHOL DENAT.)･CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE･PHYTOSTERYL MACADAMIATE･GLYCERYL STEARATE･DIMETHICONE･DIISOSTEARYL MALATE･BEHENETH-20･PHENOXYETHANOL･ALCOHOL･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･ERYTHRITOL･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER･CARBOMER･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･SODIUM CITRATE･TRISODIUM EDTA･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･CITRIC ACID･CAFFEINE･XANTHAN GUM･SODIUM METABISULFITE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･LINALOOL･TOCOPHEROL･SAPINDUS MUKOROSSI PEEL EXTRACT･LIMONENE･CITRONELLOL･SILICA･GERANIOL･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･CITRUS JUNOS SEED EXTRACT･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･EUCHEUMA SERRA/GRATELOUPIA SPARSA/SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/ULVA LINZA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･CURCUMA LONGA (TURMERIC) RHIZOME EXTRACT･SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･CHLORELLA VULGARIS EXTRACT･
how_to_use:
- Use daily, in the morning and evening, as the last step of your skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the five points of your face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream from the center outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck, and sweep the cream upward to your jawline.
overview:
Our best-selling, daily anti-aging face cream for dry skin offers intense hydration and visible wrinkle correction.

Get fast wrinkle-diminishing results for dry to very dry skin with this daily moisturizer. KOMBU-Bounce Complex (Green, Brown, and Red Algae plus Chlorella Extract) helps correct existing wrinkles, as antioxidant-rich Turmeric Extract soothes and improves elasticity. Niacinamide fortifies skin's barrier, helping to minimize lines and wrinkles. Skin feels smooth and resilient with 24-hour moisture.

- Visibly improves the appearance of wrinkles

- Delivers 24 hours of intense hydration

- Rich, velvety cream texture

- Good for dry and very dry skin types

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.
overview_summary: Visibly improves the appearance of wrinkles - Delivers 24 hours of intense hydration - Rich, velvety cream texture - Good for dry and very dry skin types

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE･GLYCERIN･NIACINAMIDE･NYLON-12･CETEARYL ALCOHOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･SD ALCOHOL 40-B (ALCOHOL DENAT.)･CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE･PHYTOSTERYL MACADAMIATE･GLYCERYL STEARATE･DIMETHICONE･DIISOSTEARYL MALATE･BEHENETH-20･PHENOXYETHANOL･ALCOHOL･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･ERYTHRITOL･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER･CARBOMER･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･SODIUM CITRATE･TRISODIUM EDTA･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･CITRIC ACID･CAFFEINE･XANTHAN GUM･SODIUM METABISULFITE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･LINALOOL･TOCOPHEROL･SAPINDUS MUKOROSSI PEEL EXTRACT･LIMONENE･CITRONELLOL･SILICA･GERANIOL･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･CITRUS JUNOS SEED EXTRACT･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･EUCHEUMA SERRA/GRATELOUPIA SPARSA/SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/ULVA LINZA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･CURCUMA LONGA (TURMERIC) RHIZOME EXTRACT･SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･CHLORELLA VULGARIS EXTRACT･
how_to_use:
- Use daily, in the morning and evening, as the last step of your skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the five points of your face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream from the center outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck, and sweep the cream upward to your jawline.
overview:
Our best-selling, daily anti-aging face cream for dry skin offers intense hydration and visible wrinkle correction.

Get fast wrinkle-diminishing results for dry to very dry skin with this daily moisturizer. KOMBU-Bounce Complex (Green, Brown, and Red Algae plus Chlorella Extract) helps correct existing wrinkles, as antioxidant-rich Turmeric Extract soothes and improves elasticity. Niacinamide fortifies skin's barrier, helping to minimize lines and wrinkles. Skin feels smooth and resilient with 24-hour moisture.

- Visibly improves the appearance of wrinkles

- Delivers 24 hours of intense hydration

- Rich, velvety cream texture

- Good for dry and very dry skin types

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.
overview_summary: Visibly improves the appearance of wrinkles - Delivers 24 hours of intense hydration - Rich, velvety cream texture - Good for dry and very dry skin types

Name: Shiseido Men Total Revitalizer Cream
Description: A high performance anti-aging cream formulated with Rice Bran Technology that helps improve five skin aging concerns for men including wrinkles, sagging, dullness, roughness and loss of firmness.
product_title: Shiseido Men Total Revitalizer Cream
how_to_use:
- Use every morning and night after cleansing and/or shaving face.
- Take a pearl-sized drop onto fingertips and smooth evenly over the face.
overview:
A high performance anti-aging cream formulated with Rice Bran Technology that helps improve five skin aging concerns for men including wrinkles, sagging, dullness, roughness and loss of firmness.

- 48-hour hydration*

- Visibly improves roughness in 4 weeks**

- Ideal for normal to dry skin types

- Non-sticky texture that absorbs quickly

- Paraben-free, mineral-oil free.

- Non-comedogenic, Dermatologist-tested.

*Clinically tested by 24 participants.

**Tested by 32 men, ages 33-57.
overview_summary: - 48-hour hydration* - Visibly improves roughness in 4 weeks** - Ideal for normal to dry skin types - Non-sticky texture that absorbs quickly - Paraben-free, mineral-oil free.

Name: Benefiance WrinkleResist24 Pure Retinol Express Smoothing Eye Mask
Description: A set of powerful, Pure Retinol under eye masks that reduce visible wrinkles in just 15 minutes.*
product_title: Benefiance WrinkleResist24 Pure Retinol Express Smoothing Eye Mask
Text:
Pure Retinol: Helps provide immediate anti-wrinkle benefits.
WrinkleResist24 Technology: Delivers intense moisturizing and firming benefits with Super Bio-Hyaluronic Acid and Hydroxyproline.
Squalane: Hydrates and protects skin's moisture barrier while smoothing fine lines.

INGREDIENTS: WATER (AQUA)･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAETHYLHEXANOATE･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･GLYCERIN･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･PEG-60 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PHENOXYETHANOL･ALCOHOL･CARBOMER･SODIUM CITRATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･BHT･SQUALANE･XANTHAN GUM･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･RETINOL･POLYSORBATE 20･CITRIC ACID･TRISODIUM EDTA･MAGNESIUM ASCORBYL PHOSPHATE･BUTYLPHENYL METHYLPROPIONAL･SAPINDUS MUKUROSSI PEEL EXTRACT (SAPINDUS MUKUROSSI)･LIMONENE･LINALOOL･UNCARIA GAMBIR EXTRACT (UNCARIA GAMBIR)･CITRONELLOL･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･PAEONIA SUFFRUTICOSA ROOT EXTRACT･GERANIOL･BENZYL BENZOATE･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･HYDROXYPROLINE･CHLORELLA VULGARIS EXTRACT･BETA-CAROTENE (CI 75130)･
how_to_use:
- Apply after cleansing and before applying serum or moisturizer.
- Take the tray out of the packette and pick up each mask, one at a time.
- Affix the narrower side of the mask to the inner corner of the eye and smooth out so the larger end covers the outer corner of your eye. Repeat on the other side.
- Leave on for 15 minutes then gently peel off. Using light pressure, gently massage the remaining essence into the skin around your eyes. Any essence remaining in the packette can be applied around the mouth for additional smoothing.
- Use as needed, recommended 2-3 times per week
results: 100% said it improves dryness of the eye area skin
overview:
A set of powerful, Pure Retinol under eye masks that reduce visible wrinkles in just 15 minutes.*

With state of the art Japanese micro-infusion technology, these individually-wrapped, stretchy eye masks deliver Pure Retinol to instantly hydrate and smooth the look of eye area wrinkles in as little as one application. These masks can also be used to address smile lines around the mouth.

- Reduces the appearance of wrinkles in just 15 minutes*

- Can also be used to address smile lines around the mouth

- Instantly rejuvenates and refreshes the eye area

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.

- 2017 Allure Best of Beauty Winner

*Consumer tested by 102 women.
overview_summary: A set of powerful, Pure Retinol under eye masks that reduce visible wrinkles in just 15 minutes.* With state of the art Japanese micro-infusion technology, these individually-wrapped, stretchy eye masks

WrinkleResist24 Technology: Delivers intense moisturizing and firming benefits with Super Bio-Hyaluronic Acid and Hydroxyproline.
Squalane: Hydrates and protects skin's moisture barrier while smoothing fine lines.

INGREDIENTS: WATER (AQUA)･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAETHYLHEXANOATE･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･GLYCERIN･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･PEG-60 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PHENOXYETHANOL･ALCOHOL･CARBOMER･SODIUM CITRATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･BHT･SQUALANE･XANTHAN GUM･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･RETINOL･POLYSORBATE 20･CITRIC ACID･TRISODIUM EDTA･MAGNESIUM ASCORBYL PHOSPHATE･BUTYLPHENYL METHYLPROPIONAL･SAPINDUS MUKUROSSI PEEL EXTRACT (SAPINDUS MUKUROSSI)･LIMONENE･LINALOOL･UNCARIA GAMBIR EXTRACT (UNCARIA GAMBIR)･CITRONELLOL･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･PAEONIA SUFFRUTICOSA ROOT EXTRACT･GERANIOL･BENZYL BENZOATE･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･HYDROXYPROLINE･CHLORELLA VULGARIS EXTRACT･BETA-CAROTENE (CI 75130)･
how_to_use:
- Apply after cleansing and before applying serum or moisturizer.
- Take the tray out of the packette and pick up each mask, one at a time.
- Affix the narrower side of the mask to the inner corner of the eye and smooth out so the larger end covers the outer corner of your eye. Repeat on the other side.
- Leave on for 15 minutes then gently peel off. Using light pressure, gently massage the remaining essence into the skin around your eyes. Any essence remaining in the packette can be applied around the mouth for additional smoothing.
- Use as needed, recommended 2-3 times per week
results: 100% said it improves dryness of the eye area skin
overview:
A set of powerful, Pure Retinol under eye masks that reduce visible wrinkles in just 15 minutes.*

With state of the art Japanese micro-infusion technology, these individually-wrapped, stretchy eye masks deliver Pure Retinol to instantly hydrate and smooth the look of eye area wrinkles in as little as one application. These masks can also be used to address smile lines around the mouth.

- Reduces the appearance of wrinkles in just 15 minutes*

- Can also be used to address smile lines around the mouth

- Instantly rejuvenates and refreshes the eye area

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.

- 2017 Allure Best of Beauty Winner

*Consumer tested by 102 women.
overview_summary: A set of powerful, Pure Retinol under eye masks that reduce visible wrinkles in just 15 minutes.* With state of the art Japanese micro-infusion technology, these individually-wrapped, stretchy eye masks

Name: Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Cream
Description: Our best-selling, daily anti-aging face cream deeply hydrates and visibly corrects wrinkles in just 2 weeks.*
product_title: Benefiance Wrinkle Smoothing Cream
Text:
KOMBU-Bounce Complex: Green, Brown, and Red Algae plus Chlorella Extract fortify skin's barrier to help prevent and minimize the appearance of wrinkles.
Turmeric Extract: Offers potent antioxidant and soothing properties to help minimize wrinkles and improve skin elasticity.
Niacinamide: Fortifies skin's barrier and smooths skin's texture.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･SD ALCOHOL 40-B (ALCOHOL DENAT.)･GLYCERIN･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･NIACINAMIDE･CYCLOHEXASILOXANE･CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･DIMETHICONE･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･METHYL METHACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER･HYDROGENATED PALM OIL･AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/VP COPOLYMER･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･POLYSORBATE 60･PEG-30 PHYTOSTEROL･PHENOXYETHANOL･DIMETHICONE/VINYL DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER･BATYL ALCOHOL･ALCOHOL･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･ERYTHRITOL･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･CARBOMER･ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･CAFFEINE･DISODIUM EDTA･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･TOCOPHEROL･SAPINDUS MUKOROSSI PEEL EXTRACT･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･LINALOOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･LIMONENE･CITRONELLOL･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･GERANIOL･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･CITRUS JUNOS SEED EXTRACT･HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･EUCHEUMA SERRA/GRATELOUPIA SPARSA/SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/ULVA LINZA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･CURCUMA LONGA (TURMERIC) RHIZOME EXTRACT･SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･CHLORELLA VULGARIS EXTRACT･SILICA･
how_to_use:
- Apply in the morning and evening, as the last step of your skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the 5 points of your face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream from the center outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck, and sweep the cream upward to your jawline.
overview:
Our best-selling, daily anti-aging face cream deeply hydrates and visibly corrects wrinkles in just 2 weeks.*

Get fast wrinkle-diminishing results with this daily moisturizer. KOMBU-Bounce Complex (Green, Brown, and Red Algae plus Chlorella Extract) helps correct existing wrinkles, as antioxidant-rich Turmeric Extract soothes and improves elasticity. Skin feels smooth and resilient with 24-hour moisture.

- Visibly improves the appearance of wrinkles in just 2 weeks*

- Deeply hydrates for 24 hours

- Silky, smooth cream texture

- Good for normal and combination skin types

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

*Tested by 33 women.
overview_summary: Visibly improves the appearance of wrinkles in just 2 weeks* - Deeply hydrates for 24 hours - Silky, smooth cream texture - Good for normal and combination

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･SD ALCOHOL 40-B (ALCOHOL DENAT.)･GLYCERIN･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･NIACINAMIDE･CYCLOHEXASILOXANE･CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･DIMETHICONE･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･METHYL METHACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER･HYDROGENATED PALM OIL･AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/VP COPOLYMER･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･POLYSORBATE 60･PEG-30 PHYTOSTEROL･PHENOXYETHANOL･DIMETHICONE/VINYL DIMETHICONE CROSSPOLYMER･BATYL ALCOHOL･ALCOHOL･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･ERYTHRITOL･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･CARBOMER･ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･CAFFEINE･DISODIUM EDTA･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･TOCOPHEROL･SAPINDUS MUKOROSSI PEEL EXTRACT･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･LINALOOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･LIMONENE･CITRONELLOL･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･GERANIOL･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･CITRUS JUNOS SEED EXTRACT･HDI/TRIMETHYLOL HEXYLLACTONE CROSSPOLYMER･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･EUCHEUMA SERRA/GRATELOUPIA SPARSA/SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/ULVA LINZA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･CURCUMA LONGA (TURMERIC) RHIZOME EXTRACT･SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･CHLORELLA VULGARIS EXTRACT･SILICA･
how_to_use:
- Apply in the morning and evening, as the last step of your skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the 5 points of your face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream from the center outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck, and sweep the cream upward to your jawline.
overview:
Our best-selling, daily anti-aging face cream deeply hydrates and visibly corrects wrinkles in just 2 weeks.*

Get fast wrinkle-diminishing results with this daily moisturizer. KOMBU-Bounce Complex (Green, Brown, and Red Algae plus Chlorella Extract) helps correct existing wrinkles, as antioxidant-rich Turmeric Extract soothes and improves elasticity. Skin feels smooth and resilient with 24-hour moisture.

- Visibly improves the appearance of wrinkles in just 2 weeks*

- Deeply hydrates for 24 hours

- Silky, smooth cream texture

- Good for normal and combination skin types

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

*Tested by 33 women.

Name: SHISEIDO Facial Cotton
Description: 100% natural, super-soft cotton pads for gentle exfoliation, makeup removal, cleansing and toning.
product_title: SHISEIDO Facial Cotton
how_to_use:
To apply softener or essence,
- Pour softener or essence onto the cotton pad after cleansing.
- Wrap the cotton around the inner middle finger, between the index and ring fingers.
- Starting from the center of the face, use outward strokes to smooth softener:
- across the forehead
- from nose to cheeks
- around your lips
- upward from your chest to neck
- under your chin
To remove eye makeup,
- Pour makeup remover onto 3 cotton pads - one for each eye and a third for your eyelashes.
- Rest a cotton pad over each lid and hold it in place for a few seconds. Then gently wipe downward and off skin.
- Place the remaining cotton pad onto the lashes of each eye. Hold it in place for a few seconds to break down the mascara, then wipe from the base to the tip of your eyelashes, starting from outer to inner corner and back again. Repeat on your other eye.
- Follow with cleanser.
overview:
100% natural, super-soft cotton pads for gentle exfoliation, makeup removal, cleansing and toning.

Each square contains a blend of 123,000 cotton fibers, woven into 28 layers with high moisture-absorbing and releasing properties for less wasted product. Adds a gentle exfoliation benefit to improve skin roughness. Specially crafted to maintain its shape so that fibers don't fluff or stick to face.

- 100% natural, soft cotton for softener application and makeup removal

- A blend of long and medium fibers are designed for maximum absorption and release

- Fibers don't fluff or stick to face

- Adds a gentle exfoliation benefit to improve skin roughness
overview_summary: 100% natural, soft cotton for softener application and makeup removal - A blend of long and medium fibers are designed for maximum absorption and release - Fibers

Name: White Lucent Illuminating Micro-Spot Serum
Description: A brightening serum that helps reduce the look of dark spots, uneven skin tone and dullness. 89% noticed lighter dark spots and brighter skin in just 1 week.*
product_title: White Lucent Illuminating Micro-Spot Serum
Text:
SAKURA-Bright Complex: Features highly concentrated 4MSK for an increased brightening effect and White Sand Lily extract which helps skin become resistant to dark spot appearance, while targeting current discoloration.
ReNeura Technology+™: Features Natsume and Active Response Powder Ashitaba to help improve skin receptivity to awaken and maintain the effectiveness of your treatment over time.

"INGREDIENTS: WATER (AQUA/EAU)・BUTYLENE GLYCOL・GLYCERIN・DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL・POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE・DIMETHICONE・BEHENYL ALCOHOL・TRIETHYLHEXANOIN・DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE・TALC・BATYL ALCOHOL・DIISOSTEARYL MALATE・PHENOXYETHANOL・PEG-6・PEG-32・BEHENIC ACID・PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE・PEG-10 DIMETHICONE・SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE・DISODIUM EDTA・TOCOPHERYL ACETATE・PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER・PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE・SILICA・SODIUM CITRATE・ALUMINA・POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE・SUCCINOGLYCAN・PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER・DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE・2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID・XANTHAN GUM・TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)・ALCOHOL・FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)・CAFFEINE・SODIUM METABISULFITE・CITRIC ACID・LINALOOL・TOCOPHEROL・CITRONELLOL・GERANIOL・ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT・CRATAEGUS MONOGYNA FLOWER EXTRACT・LIMONENE・CELLULOSE・PANCRATIUM MARITIMUM EXTRACT・REHMANNIA CHINENSIS ROOT EXTRACT・ARTEMISIA PRINCEPS LEAF EXTRACT・PRUNUS YEDOENSIS LEAF EXTRACT・ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT・PYROLA INCARNATA EXTRACT・POTENTILLA ERECTA ROOT EXTRACT・
how_to_use:
- Use morning and evening after softener, pumping twice to dispense formula onto the palm of your hand.
- Place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose and chin) and smooth over the face, starting with the wider areas like the cheeks and forehead and moving from the center of the face outwards. Massage onto skin until fully absorbed.
overview:
A brightening serum that helps reduce the look of dark spots, uneven skin tone and dullness. 89% noticed lighter dark spots and brighter skin in just 1 week.*

Our exclusive SAKURA-Bright System and ReNeura Technology+™ strengthens skin's natural support to help target the appearance of dark spots. See a powerful brightening effect for radiant results. This scientifically advanced formula helps reduce the look of dark spots, uneven skin tone and dullness. Reveals a smooth, bright complexion with a luminous finish.

- Rapidly improves the look of dark spots, dullness and uneven skin tone

- Provides 24-hour moisture

- Smooth, non-sticky texture

- Good for all skin types

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

*Consumer tested by 96 women.
overview_summary: Rapidly improves the look of dark spots, dullness and uneven skin tone - Provides 24-hour moisture - Smooth, non-sticky texture - Good for all skin types -

"INGREDIENTS: WATER (AQUA/EAU)・BUTYLENE GLYCOL・GLYCERIN・DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL・POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE・DIMETHICONE・BEHENYL ALCOHOL・TRIETHYLHEXANOIN・DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE・TALC・BATYL ALCOHOL・DIISOSTEARYL MALATE・PHENOXYETHANOL・PEG-6・PEG-32・BEHENIC ACID・PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE・PEG-10 DIMETHICONE・SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE・DISODIUM EDTA・TOCOPHERYL ACETATE・PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER・PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE・SILICA・SODIUM CITRATE・ALUMINA・POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE・SUCCINOGLYCAN・PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER・DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE・2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID・XANTHAN GUM・TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)・ALCOHOL・FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)・CAFFEINE・SODIUM METABISULFITE・CITRIC ACID・LINALOOL・TOCOPHEROL・CITRONELLOL・GERANIOL・ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT・CRATAEGUS MONOGYNA FLOWER EXTRACT・LIMONENE・CELLULOSE・PANCRATIUM MARITIMUM EXTRACT・REHMANNIA CHINENSIS ROOT EXTRACT・ARTEMISIA PRINCEPS LEAF EXTRACT・PRUNUS YEDOENSIS LEAF EXTRACT・ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT・PYROLA INCARNATA EXTRACT・POTENTILLA ERECTA ROOT EXTRACT・
how_to_use:
- Use morning and evening after softener, pumping twice to dispense formula onto the palm of your hand.
- Place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose and chin) and smooth over the face, starting with the wider areas like the cheeks and forehead and moving from the center of the face outwards. Massage onto skin until fully absorbed.
overview:
A brightening serum that helps reduce the look of dark spots, uneven skin tone and dullness. 89% noticed lighter dark spots and brighter skin in just 1 week.*

Our exclusive SAKURA-Bright System and ReNeura Technology+™ strengthens skin's natural support to help target the appearance of dark spots. See a powerful brightening effect for radiant results. This scientifically advanced formula helps reduce the look of dark spots, uneven skin tone and dullness. Reveals a smooth, bright complexion with a luminous finish.

- Rapidly improves the look of dark spots, dullness and uneven skin tone

- Provides 24-hour moisture

- Smooth, non-sticky texture

- Good for all skin types

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

*Consumer tested by 96 women.
overview_summary: Rapidly improves the look of dark spots, dullness and uneven skin tone - Provides 24-hour moisture - Smooth, non-sticky texture - Good for all skin types -

Name: Essential Energy Hydrating Day Cream Broad Spectrum SPF 20
Description: Awaken soft, supple skin with this SPF gel-cream featuring Ginseng Root Extract and our proprietary Hyaluronic Acid to deliver deep, intense hydration so skin is protected and ready for makeup. Sensitive skin-friendly, it also minimizes the appearance of pores and fine lines.
product_title: Essential Energy Hydrating Day Cream Broad Spectrum SPF 20
how_to_use:
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the 5 points of the face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck, and sweep the cream upward from throat to jawline.
- Apply daily as the last step in your morning skincare routine.
overview:
Awaken soft, supple skin with this SPF gel-cream featuring Ginseng Root Extract and our proprietary Hyaluronic Acid to deliver deep, intense hydration so skin is protected and ready for makeup. Sensitive skin-friendly, it also minimizes the appearance of pores and fine lines.

BENEFITS
- Deep, intense hydration that lasts 24-hours*

- Broad-spectrum SPF 20 protection

- Encourages skin's natural production of Hyaluronic Acid

- Sensitive skin-friendly. Ideal for all skin types.

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Free of Mineral Oil

*Tested by 22 women.
overview_summary: BENEFITS - Deep, intense hydration that lasts 24-hours* - Broad-spectrum SPF 20 protection - Encourages skin's natural production of Hyaluronic Acid - Sensitive skin-friendly. - Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

product_title: Essential Energy Hydrating Day Cream Broad Spectrum SPF 20
how_to_use:
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot the cream on the 5 points of the face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face. Apply an additional pearl-sized amount to your neck, and sweep the cream upward from throat to jawline.
- Apply daily as the last step in your morning skincare routine.
overview:
Awaken soft, supple skin with this SPF gel-cream featuring Ginseng Root Extract and our proprietary Hyaluronic Acid to deliver deep, intense hydration so skin is protected and ready for makeup. Sensitive skin-friendly, it also minimizes the appearance of pores and fine lines.

BENEFITS
- Deep, intense hydration that lasts 24-hours*

- Broad-spectrum SPF 20 protection

- Encourages skin's natural production of Hyaluronic Acid

- Sensitive skin-friendly. Ideal for all skin types.

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Free of Mineral Oil

*Tested by 22 women.
overview_summary: BENEFITS - Deep, intense hydration that lasts 24-hours* - Broad-spectrum SPF 20 protection - Encourages skin's natural production of Hyaluronic Acid - Sensitive skin-friendly. - Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

Name: Future Solution LX Legendary Enmei Ultimate Renewing Cream
Description: A luxurious face cream that reveals supple and rejuvenated skin in just 1 week.*
product_title: Future Solution LX Legendary Enmei Ultimate Renewing Cream
Text:
Legendary Enmei Complex (comprised of Enmei Herb Extract, Skingenecell 1P, Vitamin C, and Green Treasured Silk Extract): A proprietary ingredient that helps protect skin from damage and improves visible signs of aging.
SublimActive (comprised of Camellia Seed Extract): Helps support the natural cycle of cellular turnover.
Niacinamide: Helps support skin's barrier while visibly smoothing  texture.

INGREDIENTS:WATER(AQUA/EAU)･GLYCERIN･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE･NIACINAMIDE･SQUALANE･TRIISOSTEARIN･DIMETHICONE･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･PENTAERYTHRITYL TETRAETHYLHEXANOATE･PETROLATUM･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･CARNOSINE･PIPERIDINEPROPIONIC ACID･HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE･STEARYL ALCOHOL･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･BEHENETH-20･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PHENOXYETHANOL･MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX(CERA MICROCRISTALLINA/CIRE MICROCRISTALLINE)･PHYTOSTERYL MACADAMIATE･BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER･SILICA･CITRIC ACID･CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE･TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･ACRYLAMIDE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE COPOLYMER･SODIUM CITRATE･TRISODIUM EDTA･POLYVINYL ALCOHOL･BETAINE･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･XANTHAN GUM･ISOHEXADECANE･BHT･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･HYDROGENATED VEGETABLE OIL･POLYSORBATE 80･SODIUM METABISULFITE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･LINALOOL･ALCOHOL･BUTYLPHENYL METHYLPROPIONAL･LIMONENE･SORBITAN OLEATE･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･BENZYL BENZOATE･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･MELISSA OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT･RUBUS SUAVISSIMUS (RASPBERRY) LEAF EXTRACT･GARCINIA MANGOSTANA BARK EXTRACT(GARCINIA MANGOSTANA)･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･TOCOPHEROL･PINUS SYLVESTRIS CONE EXTRACT･CAMELLIA JAPONICA SEED EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED SILK･KAEMPFERIA GALANGA ROOT EXTRACT･PRUNUS PERSICA (PEACH) LEAF EXTRACT･NELUMBO NUCIFERA GERM EXTRACT･
how_to_use:
- Apply as the last step in your skincare routine.
- Use the spatula to scoop two pearl-sized amounts, then dot on the five points of the face: forehead, nose, chin, and both cheeks.
- Gently smooth the cream outward over your face.
overview:
A luxurious face cream that reveals supple and rejuvenated skin in just 1 week.*

The ultimate face cream for visibly renewed skin, bringing it to its most beautiful. This luxurious moisturizer targets multiple signs of aging to reveal supple and rejuvenated skin in just 1 week*.

Formulated with Legendary Enmei Complex and SublimActive to help support the natural cycle of cellular turnover, this face cream visibly renews skin. Twelve highly effective ingredients, including Peach Leaf, Green Tea, and Sakura Leaf Extracts, target multiple signs of aging for a more beautiful, vibrant and radiant look.

- Reveals supple and rejuvenated skin

- Enhances skin's vibrancy and renews definition

- Provides 24-hour moisture

- Dermatologist-tested

*Consumer tested by 113 women.
overview_summary: A luxurious face cream that reveals supple and rejuvenated skin in just 1 week.* The ultimate face cream for visibly renewed skin, bringing it to its most beautiful.

Name: Vital Perfection LiftDefine Radiance Face Mask
Description: A high-performance sheet mask uniquely formulated to deliver a simultaneous lifting and firming effect.
product_title: Vital Perfection LiftDefine Radiance Face Mask
Text:
Watercress Extract supports skin's natural production of collagen, strengthens approach to firming and targets smile lines.
	4MSK and Vitamin C Ethyl inhibits the production of melanin, which causes dark spots, and removes accumulated melanin from deep within.
	White Lily Extract purifies and detoxifies, soothing the skin against irritations while also providing a conditioning and moisturizing effect.
	KURENAI-TruLift Complex with Benibana flower strengthens and energizes the skin for a visibly lifted appearance.
	ReNeura Technology++ features Phytoconnect, helps prolong the efficacy of the treatment.


Mask 1:
INGREDIENTS:Water(Aqua/Eau)･Dipropylene Glycol･Butylene Glycol･Squalane･Glycerin･PEG-20･Trehalose･Potassium Methoxysalicylate･Lauryl Betaine･PEG/PPG-14/7 Dimethyl Ether･Tocopheryl Acetate･Xanthan Gum･Rosa Damascena Flower Water･Caffeine･Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil･Lilium Candidum Bulb Extract･Angelica Acutiloba Root Extract･Angelica Keiskei Leaf/Stem Extract･Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract･Lamium Album Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract･Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract･Inositol･Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Flower Extract･Ziziphus Jujuba Fruit Extract･Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract (Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract)･Nasturtium Officinale Leaf/Stem Extract･Bupleurum Falcatum Root Extract･Isostearic Acid･Triethylhexanoin･Potassium Hydroxide･Carbomer･PEG-30 Phytosterol･Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer･Alcohol･Disodium EDTA･Glucosamine HCl･Tocopherol･Cinnamomum Cassia Bark Extract･Phenoxyethanol･Sodium Benzoate･Fragrance (Parfum)･Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes･Limonene･Hexyl Cinnamal･Citrus Aurantium Peel Oil･Citronellol･Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Peel Oil･Linalyl Acetate･ <M142599-712>

Mask 2:
INGREDIENTS:Water(Aqua/Eau)･Glycerin･Sodium Polyacrylate･Butylene Glycol･Cellulose Gum･ Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil･Carbomer･Rosa Damascena Flower Water･Caffeine･Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil･Angelica Keiskei Leaf/Stem Extract･Lamium Album Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract･Inositol･Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Flower Extract･Ziziphus Jujuba Fruit Extract･ Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract (Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract)･Tartaric Acid･ Disodium EDTA･Aluminum Glycinate･Hydroxypropylcellulose･Aluminum Hydroxide･Alcohol･ Tocopherol･Cinnamomum Cassia Bark Extract･Phenoxyethanol･Fragrance (Parfum)･Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes･Limonene･Hexyl Cinnamal･Citrus Aurantium Peel Oil･Citronellol･Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Peel Oil･Linalyl Acetate･ <M142603-712>
how_to_use:
- Use after cleansing and before moisturizer.
- Take Mask 1 (for entire face) out of the pouch and gently unfold it.
- Adjust the positionings of the eyes and mouth and apply so it fits along the jawline.
- Take Mask 2 (for jawline) out of the pouch and remove the protective film.
- Place the indented edge along the lower lip.
- Stretch both sides and hang the mask openings over the ears.
- Remove masks after approximately 10 minutes.
- Gently blend remaining essence into the skin and lightly press it over the entire face.
overview:
A high-performance sheet mask uniquely formulated to deliver a simultaneous lifting and firming effect.

This 2-piece treatment mask tones the face and jawline as it visibly improves contours and dullness in just 10 minutes (after one application)*. One mask covers the face area and a second mask targets the chin and neck areas.

*Tested over 8 weeks on 112–117 women, aged 45–59, in France.
overview_summary: A high-performance sheet mask uniquely formulated to deliver a simultaneous lifting and firming effect. One mask covers the face area and a second mask targets the chin and neck areas.

- Place the indented edge along the lower lip.
- Stretch both sides and hang the mask openings over the ears.
- Remove masks after approximately 10 minutes.
- Gently blend remaining essence into the skin and lightly press it over the entire face.
overview:
A high-performance sheet mask uniquely formulated to deliver a simultaneous lifting and firming effect.

This 2-piece treatment mask tones the face and jawline as it visibly improves contours and dullness in just 10 minutes (after one application)*. One mask covers the face area and a second mask targets the chin and neck areas.

*Tested over 8 weeks on 112–117 women, aged 45–59, in France.
overview_summary: A high-performance sheet mask uniquely formulated to deliver a simultaneous lifting and firming effect. One mask covers the face area and a second mask targets the chin and neck areas.

Name: Vital Perfection LiftDefine Radiance Face Mask
Description: A high-performance sheet mask uniquely formulated to deliver a simultaneous lifting and firming effect.
product_title: Vital Perfection LiftDefine Radiance Face Mask
Text:
Watercress Extract supports skin's natural production of collagen, strengthens approach to firming and targets smile lines.
	4MSK and Vitamin C Ethyl inhibits the production of melanin, which causes dark spots, and removes accumulated melanin from deep within.
	White Lily Extract purifies and detoxifies, soothing the skin against irritations while also providing a conditioning and moisturizing effect.
	KURENAI-TruLift Complex with Benibana flower strengthens and energizes the skin for a visibly lifted appearance.
	ReNeura Technology++ features Phytoconnect, helps prolong the efficacy of the treatment.


Mask 1:
INGREDIENTS:Water(Aqua/Eau)･Dipropylene Glycol･Butylene Glycol･Squalane･Glycerin･PEG-20･Trehalose･Potassium Methoxysalicylate･Lauryl Betaine･PEG/PPG-14/7 Dimethyl Ether･Tocopheryl Acetate･Xanthan Gum･Rosa Damascena Flower Water･Caffeine･Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil･Lilium Candidum Bulb Extract･Angelica Acutiloba Root Extract･Angelica Keiskei Leaf/Stem Extract･Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract･Lamium Album Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract･Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract･Inositol･Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Flower Extract･Ziziphus Jujuba Fruit Extract･Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract (Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract)･Nasturtium Officinale Leaf/Stem Extract･Bupleurum Falcatum Root Extract･Isostearic Acid･Triethylhexanoin･Potassium Hydroxide･Carbomer･PEG-30 Phytosterol･Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer･Alcohol･Disodium EDTA･Glucosamine HCl･Tocopherol･Cinnamomum Cassia Bark Extract･Phenoxyethanol･Sodium Benzoate･Fragrance (Parfum)･Tetramethyl Acetyloctahydronaphthalenes･Limonene･Hexyl Cinnamal･Citrus Aurantium Peel Oil･Citronellol･Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Peel Oil･Linalyl Acetate･ <M142599-712>

Name: Deep Cleansing Foam
Description: A foaming cleanser that deeply cleanses pores for oily and blemish-prone skin.
product_title: Deep Cleansing Foam
Text:
Signature Japanese Ingredients:
Kirishima Mineral Spring Water: Helps supplement skin's essential minerals.
Rice Germ Oil: Softens and wraps skin in a veil of moisture.
Sebum-Absorbing Powder & Cleansing Granules: Help cleanse pores and smooth skin.

INGREDIENTS: WATER (AQUA/EAU)･STEARIC ACID･PEG-8･MYRISTIC ACID･GLYCERIN･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･LAURIC ACID･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･SORBITOL･BEESWAX(CERA ALBA/CIRE D'ABEILLE)･SODIUM LAURYL GLYCOL CARBOXYLATE･SODIUM METHYL COCOYL TAURATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･MICROCRYSTALLINE CELLULOSE･DISODIUM EDTA･WATER (AQUA)･MENTHOL･ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) GERM OIL･TALC･ETHYLCELLULOSE･LINALOOL･GERANIOL･CITRONELLOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･ACRYLATES COPOLYMER･ULTRAMARINES (CI 77007)･PAEONIA ALBIFLORA ROOT EXTRACT･SILICA･BETAINE･SILK POWDER(SERICA/POUDRE DE SOIE)･DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE･TETRASODIUM EDTA･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･SODIUM LAURYL SULFATE･BENZOIC ACID･TOCOPHEROL･
how_to_use:
- Use daily, in the morning and evening as the first step in your skincare routine.
- Wet skin with lukewarm water. Dispense a pearl-sized amount of cleanser onto dampened hands and rub hands together to create a lather.
- Massage over face with gentle circular motions, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.
overview:
A foaming cleanser that deeply cleanses pores for oily and blemish-prone skin.

A sebum-absorbing foaming cleanser infused with effective ingredients to deeply cleanse pores and polish away roughness, helping to remove oil. This purifying cleanser balances skin, prepping it for further skincare treatment.

Signature Japanese ingredients, sebum-absorbing powder and cleansing granules, provide oil-removing benefits. This cleanser is ideal for skin prone to blemishes, breakouts, roughness and blocked pores.

- Deeply cleanses pores and polishes away roughness for smooth, radiant looking skin

- Good for oily and blemish-prone skin types

- Dermatologist-tested
overview_summary: A sebum-absorbing foaming cleanser infused with effective ingredients to deeply cleanse pores and polish away roughness, helping to remove oil.

A sebum-absorbing foaming cleanser infused with effective ingredients to deeply cleanse pores and polish away roughness, helping to remove oil. This purifying cleanser balances skin, prepping it for further skincare treatment.

Signature Japanese ingredients, sebum-absorbing powder and cleansing granules, provide oil-removing benefits. This cleanser is ideal for skin prone to blemishes, breakouts, roughness and blocked pores.

- Deeply cleanses pores and polishes away roughness for smooth, radiant looking skin

- Good for oily and blemish-prone skin types

- Dermatologist-tested
overview_summary: A sebum-absorbing foaming cleanser infused with effective ingredients to deeply cleanse pores and polish away roughness, helping to remove oil.

Name: Deep Cleansing Foam
Description: A foaming cleanser that deeply cleanses pores for oily and blemish-prone skin.
product_title: Deep Cleansing Foam
Text:
Signature Japanese Ingredients:
Kirishima Mineral Spring Water: Helps supplement skin's essential minerals.
Rice Germ Oil: Softens and wraps skin in a veil of moisture.
Sebum-Absorbing Powder & Cleansing Granules: Help cleanse pores and smooth skin.

INGREDIENTS: WATER (AQUA/EAU)･STEARIC ACID･PEG-8･MYRISTIC ACID･GLYCERIN･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･LAURIC ACID･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･SORBITOL･BEESWAX(CERA ALBA/CIRE D'ABEILLE)･SODIUM LAURYL GLYCOL CARBOXYLATE･SODIUM METHYL COCOYL TAURATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･MICROCRYSTALLINE CELLULOSE･DISODIUM EDTA･WATER (AQUA)･MENTHOL･ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) GERM OIL･TALC･ETHYLCELLULOSE･LINALOOL･GERANIOL･CITRONELLOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･ACRYLATES COPOLYMER･ULTRAMARINES (CI 77007)･PAEONIA ALBIFLORA ROOT EXTRACT･SILICA･BETAINE･SILK POWDER(SERICA/POUDRE DE SOIE)･DIPOTASSIUM GLYCYRRHIZATE･TETRASODIUM EDTA･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･SODIUM LAURYL SULFATE･BENZOIC ACID･TOCOPHEROL･
how_to_use:
- Use daily, in the morning and evening as the first step in your skincare routine.
- Wet skin with lukewarm water. Dispense a pearl-sized amount of cleanser onto dampened hands and rub hands together to create a lather.
- Massage over face with gentle circular motions, then rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

Name: Vital Perfection LiftDefine Radiance Serum
Description: An advanced lifting and firming serum that visibly improves dullness and firmness in 4 weeks.*
product_title: Vital Perfection LiftDefine Radiance Serum
Text:
Watercress Extract: Supports skin's natural production of collagen, to help firm and target smile lines.
4MSK and Vitamin C: Targets dark spots and helps even skin tone.
White Lily Extract: Provides a conditioning and moisturizing effect.
KURENAI-TruLift Complex (with Benibana Flower): Helps to strengthen and energize skin for a visibly lifted appearance.
ReNeura Technology++ (features Phytoconnec): Helps prolong the efficacy of the treatment.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･DIMETHICONE･GLYCERIN･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･MALTITOL･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･POLYVINYL ALCOHOL･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PHENOXYETHANOL･TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE･BATYL ALCOHOL･BEHENIC ACID･PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･PEG-10 DIMETHICONE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･DISODIUM EDTA･MYRISTYL MYRISTATE･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER WATER･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･SODIUM CITRATE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･ALCOHOL･CAFFEINE･CITRIC ACID･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･LIMONENE･HEXYL CINNAMAL･LINALOOL･TOCOPHEROL･GLUCOSAMINE HCl･CITRONELLOL･LILIUM CANDIDUM BULB EXTRACT･SODIUM METABISULFITE･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･OLEA EUROPAEA (OLIVE) LEAF EXTRACT･LAMIUM ALBUM FLOWER/LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･INOSITOL･CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) FLOWER EXTRACT･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･CELLULOSE･NASTURTIUM OFFICINALE LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･CINNAMOMUM CASSIA BARK EXTRACT･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･
how_to_use:
- Use morning and evening after cleansing and softening skin.
- Pump the dispenser once and slowly massage onto face and neck.
overview:
An advanced lifting and firming serum that visibly improves dullness and firmness in 4 weeks.*

Discover a more youthful look in 4 weeks.** Experience tightened, lifted and revitalized skin radiance with this highly effective serum for face and neck. This multi-benefit serum delivers quick lifting, firming, and contouring results with a lightweight, non-greasy texture. Skin appears radiant and rejuvenated.

- Addresses the look of sagging, loss of firmness, and uneven skin tone for visibly tighter, more radiant skin

- Provides 24-hour moisture

- Paraben-free

- Dermatologist-tested

*Clinically tested by 38 women.

*Consumer tested by 118 women.

overview:
An advanced lifting and firming serum that visibly improves dullness and firmness in 4 weeks.*

Discover a more youthful look in 4 weeks.** Experience tightened, lifted and revitalized skin radiance with this highly effective serum for face and neck. This multi-benefit serum delivers quick lifting, firming, and contouring results with a lightweight, non-greasy texture. Skin appears radiant and rejuvenated.

- Provides 24-hour moisture

- Paraben-free

- Dermatologist-tested

*Clinically tested by 38 women.

*Consumer tested by 118 women.

Name: Bio-Performance Skin Filler Serums
Description: Revolutionary night and day serum system to visibly plump and firm skin with our proprietary Japanese Hyaluronic Acid.
product_title: Bio-Performance Skin Filler Serums
Text:
Shrunken Bio-Hyaluronic Acid: Created through MolecuShift Technology, the world's first technology to successfully shrink the size of Hyaluronic Acid molecules and revert them back to their original size, without changing their structure. This allows the Hyaluronic Acid molecules to penetrate more easily without decreasing any of its advantages to plump and firm skin.
Red Clover Extract: Known to improve skin barrier function.
Chai Hu Extract: Known to promote Collagen and Hyaluronic Acid production for firming benefits. 
Cinnamon Extract: Helps optimize skin's natural purification process.

Bio-Performance Infill Serum:
INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･ALCOHOL DENAT.･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･MAGNESIUM CHLORIDE･GLYCERIN･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･SODIUM HYALURONATE･PEG-6･PEG-32･HYDROXYETHYL UREA･LAURYL BETAINE･LACTIC ACID･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･PEG-150･PPG-13-DECYLTETRADECETH-24･TRIETHANOLAMINE･SODIUM CITRATE･DISODIUM EDTA･CITRIC ACID･AMMONIUM LACTATE･TOCOPHEROL･PHENOXYETHANOL･SODIUM BENZOATE･

Bio-Performance Full Expansion Serum:
INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･DIMETHICONE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･ALCOHOL･GLYCERIN･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･SILICA･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･ALPHA-GLUCAN OLIGOSACCHARIDE･AMINOPROPYL DIMETHICONE･TRIFOLIUM PRATENSE (CLOVER) FLOWER EXTRACT (TRIFOLIUM PRATENSE FLOWER EXTRACT)･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOTEXTRACT･BATYL ALCOHOL･HYDROGENATED PALM OIL･BEHENIC ACID･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) KERNEL OIL･PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･PEG-10 DIMETHICONE･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) OIL･TOCOPHEROL･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･SODIUM METABISULFITE･CINNAMOMUM CASSIA BARK EXTRACT･CITRIC ACID･PHENOXYETHANOL･
how_to_use:
- Apply before moisturizer. When using with other serums, apply Bio-Performance Skin Filler Serums as the last serum before your moisturizer.
- In the evening, pump Infill Serum once onto fingertips and smooth evenly over face and neck.
- In the morning, pump Full Expansion Serum once onto fingertips and smooth evenly over face and neck.
- For Refills: Save the pumps and caps from your original bottles. Insert the pump into the refill, then close cap.
overview:
Revolutionary night and day serum system to visibly plump and firm skin with our proprietary Japanese Hyaluronic Acid.

Rapidly diminish the signs of time with our breakthrough MolecuShift Technology, which first shrinks and then enlarges Hyaluronic Acid molecules to volumize the skin from within.

Visibly plump and firm skin in two steps:

Step 1: Evening: Infill Serum delivers shrunken Hyaluronic Acid molecules to be more effectively absorbed into skin.

Step 2: Morning: Full Expansion Serum expands Hyaluronic Acid molecules back to their original size leaving skin even more hydrated, plump, and firm.

- Visibly improves the look of wrinkles, fine lines, and loss of firmness

- Helps skin gradually accumulate Hyaluronic Acid, a key component of skin, for long-lasting effects

- May be used in place of or in conjunction with injectable fillers to complement results

- Dermatologist-tested

- Bottles, minus the cap, are 20% plant-derived

- Refills help reduce plastic waste by up to 74% compared with a regular product
overview_summary: Step 2: Morning: Full Expansion Serum expands Hyaluronic Acid molecules back to their original size leaving skin even more hydrated, plump, and firm.
