Name: Bio-Performance Skin Filler Serums
Description: Revolutionary night and day serum system to visibly plump and firm skin with our proprietary Japanese Hyaluronic Acid.
product_title: Bio-Performance Skin Filler Serums
Text:
Shrunken Bio-Hyaluronic Acid: Created through MolecuShift Technology, the world's first technology to successfully shrink the size of Hyaluronic Acid molecules and revert them back to their original size, without changing their structure. This allows the Hyaluronic Acid molecules to penetrate more easily without decreasing any of its advantages to plump and firm skin.
Red Clover Extract: Known to improve skin barrier function.
Chai Hu Extract: Known to promote Collagen and Hyaluronic Acid production for firming benefits. 
Cinnamon Extract: Helps optimize skin's natural purification process.

Bio-Performance Infill Serum:
INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･ALCOHOL DENAT.･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･MAGNESIUM CHLORIDE･GLYCERIN･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･SODIUM HYALURONATE･PEG-6･PEG-32･HYDROXYETHYL UREA･LAURYL BETAINE･LACTIC ACID･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･PEG-150･PPG-13-DECYLTETRADECETH-24･TRIETHANOLAMINE･SODIUM CITRATE･DISODIUM EDTA･CITRIC ACID･AMMONIUM LACTATE･TOCOPHEROL･PHENOXYETHANOL･SODIUM BENZOATE･

Bio-Performance Full Expansion Serum:
INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･DIMETHICONE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･ALCOHOL･GLYCERIN･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･SILICA･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･ALPHA-GLUCAN OLIGOSACCHARIDE･AMINOPROPYL DIMETHICONE･TRIFOLIUM PRATENSE (CLOVER) FLOWER EXTRACT (TRIFOLIUM PRATENSE FLOWER EXTRACT)･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOTEXTRACT･BATYL ALCOHOL･HYDROGENATED PALM OIL･BEHENIC ACID･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) KERNEL OIL･PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･PEG-10 DIMETHICONE･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) OIL･TOCOPHEROL･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･SODIUM METABISULFITE･CINNAMOMUM CASSIA BARK EXTRACT･CITRIC ACID･PHENOXYETHANOL･
how_to_use:
- Apply before moisturizer. When using with other serums, apply Bio-Performance Skin Filler Serums as the last serum before your moisturizer.
- In the evening, pump Infill Serum once onto fingertips and smooth evenly over face and neck.
- In the morning, pump Full Expansion Serum once onto fingertips and smooth evenly over face and neck.
- For Refills: Save the pumps and caps from your original bottles. Insert the pump into the refill, then close cap.
overview:
Revolutionary night and day serum system to visibly plump and firm skin with our proprietary Japanese Hyaluronic Acid.

Rapidly diminish the signs of time with our breakthrough MolecuShift Technology, which first shrinks and then enlarges Hyaluronic Acid molecules to volumize the skin from within.

Visibly plump and firm skin in two steps:

Step 1: Evening: Infill Serum delivers shrunken Hyaluronic Acid molecules to be more effectively absorbed into skin.

Step 2: Morning: Full Expansion Serum expands Hyaluronic Acid molecules back to their original size leaving skin even more hydrated, plump, and firm.

- Visibly improves the look of wrinkles, fine lines, and loss of firmness

- Helps skin gradually accumulate Hyaluronic Acid, a key component of skin, for long-lasting effects

- May be used in place of or in conjunction with injectable fillers to complement results

- Dermatologist-tested

- Bottles, minus the cap, are 20% plant-derived

- Refills help reduce plastic waste by up to 74% compared with a regular product
overview_summary: Step 2: Morning: Full Expansion Serum expands Hyaluronic Acid molecules back to their original size leaving skin even more hydrated, plump, and firm.

Name: Essentials Perfect Cleansing Oil
Description: A lightweight, hydrating facial cleansing oil that thoroughly dissolves waterproof and hard to remove makeup, sunscreen and impurities.
product_title: Essentials Perfect Cleansing Oil
Text:
Squalane: Hydrates and protects skin's moisture barrier.
Grape Seed Oil: Helps improve skin roughness and dullness.
INGREDIENTS: SQUALANE・ETHYLHEXYL PALMITATE・CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE・PEG-20 GLYCERYL TRIISOSTEARATE・WATER(AQUA/EAU)・BUTYLENE GLYCOL・ALCOHOL DENAT.・TOCOPHEROL・FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)・VITIS VINIFERA (GRAPE) SEED OIL・BHT・
how_to_use:
- Use in the evening as the first step in your skincare routine.
- Pump twice into the palm of your hand and massage onto wet or dry skin using gentle, circular motions.
- Rinse thoroughly with cold or lukewarm water.
results: 95% felt that skin maintains its moisture after using the oil
overview:
A lightweight, hydrating facial cleansing oil that thoroughly dissolves waterproof and hard to remove makeup, sunscreen and impurities.

This multi-tasking cleansing oil quickly melts away waterproof makeup while maintaining skin's moisture. Can be used on wet or dry skin and rinses clean for an incredibly soft and non-greasy, dewy finish. Use on its own or as the first step of a double cleansing routine.

- Rapidly lifts away dirt and makeup, even waterproof formulas

- Gently protects skin's moisture

- Non-greasy, dewy finish

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.
overview_summary: Rapidly lifts away dirt and makeup, even waterproof formulas - Gently protects skin's moisture - Non-greasy, dewy finish - Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.

Name: Urban Environment Urban Environment Fresh-Moisture Sunscreen SPF 40
Description: A daily moisturizing face sunscreen that protects against harmful UVA/UVB rays with broad-spectrum SPF 42 while hydrating and visibly plumping skin.
product_title: Urban Environment Urban Environment Fresh-Moisture Sunscreen SPF 40
Text:
Hyaluronic Acid: Delivers, attracts, and retains moisture.
	Pearl Light Powder: Reflects more red light to make uneven skin tone and dullness less noticeable.


ACTIVE INGREDIENTS: 
Purpose Avobenzone 2.3% ･････ Sunscreen 
Homosalate 10.0% ･････Sunscreen 
Octisalate 5.0% ･････ Sunscreen 
Octocrylene 5.0% ･････ Sunscreen 

INACTIVE INGREDIENTS: Water･Butylene Glycol･Dipropylene Glycol･Glycerin･SD Alcohol 40-B･Caprylyl Methicone･Silica･Glyceryl Diisostearate･PEG/PPG-14/7 Dimethyl Ether･Beheneth-20･Behenyl Alcohol･C30-45 Alkyl Methicone･Trehalose･Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Beheneth-25 Methacrylate Crosspolymer･Xanthan Gum･Ascorbyl Tetraisopalmitate･Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate･ Sodium Hyaluronate･Sanguisorba Officinalis Root Extract･Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract･Garcinia Mangostana Bark Extract･Perilla Ocymoides Leaf Extract･Spirulina Platensis Extract･C30-45 Olefin･ Bis-PEG-18 Methyl Ether Dimethyl Silane･Stearyl Alcohol･Disodium EDTA･Potassium Hydroxide･ BHT･Carbomer･Alcohol･Sodium Metabisulfite･Mica･Synthetic Fluorphlogopite･Tocopherol･SodiumCitrate･Phenoxyethanol･Chlorphenesin･Fragrance･Titanium Dioxide･ <M151058-811>
how_to_use:
- Apply daily, as the last step in your morning skincare routine—before makeup application.
- Smooth evenly and generously over face and neck, at least 15 minutes before sun exposure.
- Wear alone or under makeup.
overview:
A daily moisturizing face sunscreen that protects against harmful UVA/UVB rays with broad-spectrum SPF 42 while hydrating and visibly plumping skin.

More than a sunscreen, this sunscreen protects skin from harmful UV rays plus pollution and maintains skin's moisture for 12 hours. This everyday cream deeply moisturizes with a dewy, radiant finish. Ideal for dry skin types.

- Lightweight, daily SPF 42 cream deeply moisturizes skin

- Protects against UVA/UVB rays

- Dewy, radiant finish

- 2 hours of lasting hydration

- Water-resistant for 40 minutes

- Free of oxybenzone & octinoxate

- Paraben-free

- Non-comedogenic

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.
overview_summary: Lightweight, daily SPF 42 cream deeply moisturizes skin - Protects against UVA/UVB rays - Dewy, radiant finish - 2 hours of lasting hydration - Water-resistant for 40

overview:
A daily moisturizing face sunscreen that protects against harmful UVA/UVB rays with broad-spectrum SPF 42 while hydrating and visibly plumping skin.

More than a sunscreen, this sunscreen protects skin from harmful UV rays plus pollution and maintains skin's moisture for 12 hours. This everyday cream deeply moisturizes with a dewy, radiant finish. Ideal for dry skin types.

- Lightweight, daily SPF 42 cream deeply moisturizes skin

- Protects against UVA/UVB rays

- Dewy, radiant finish

- 2 hours of lasting hydration

- Water-resistant for 40 minutes

- Free of oxybenzone & octinoxate

- Paraben-free

- Non-comedogenic

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.

Description: A gentle water-based cleanser that whisks away the impurities, makeup, and oil that can clog pores and lead to imperfections. Maintains skin’s natural balance. Leaves skin feeling refreshed.
product_title: Refreshing Cleansing Water
how_to_use: - Press pump 3 times to saturate a cotton pad and wipe gently over face.
overview:
A gentle water-based cleanser that whisks away the impurities, makeup, and oil that can clog pores and lead to imperfections. Maintains skin’s natural balance. Leaves skin feeling refreshed.

- pH-balanced formulation.

- Combats the appearance of oily skin.

- Hydrates and cleanses the skin without drying or tightness.

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-Comedogenic. Alcohol-Free. Oil-Free.

Name: Shiseido Men Total Revitalizer Eye Cream
Description: A high performance anti-aging eye cream formulated with Rice Bran Technology that helps improve five skin aging concerns for men including wrinkles, sagging, dullness, roughness and loss of firmness.
product_title: Shiseido Men Total Revitalizer Eye Cream
how_to_use:
- Apply as the last step of morning and evening skincare routine.
- Use a small amount on the finger and smooth around the eye bone area.
- Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse eyes immediately with cold or lukewarm water. Consult an ophthalmologist if any uncomfortable sensation remains in the eyes.
overview:
A high performance anti-aging eye cream formulated with Rice Bran Technology that helps improve five skin aging concerns for men including wrinkles, sagging, dullness, roughness and loss of firmness.

- 48-hour hydration*

- Visibly improves dark circles in 4 weeks*

- For all skin types

- Rich texture that absorbs quickly

- Paraben-free, mineral-oil free.

- Non-comedogenic, Ophthalmologist-tested.

*Clinically tested by 24 participants.

*Tested by 32 men, ages 35-56.
overview_summary: - 48-hour hydration* - Visibly improves dark circles in 4 weeks* - For all skin types - Rich texture that absorbs quickly - Paraben-free, mineral-oil free. - Non-comedogenic, Ophthalmologist-tested.

Name: Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Express Eye Mask
Description: A retinol eye mask that visibly lifts and firms around the eyes in just 1 week.*
product_title: Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Express Eye Mask
Text:
Pure Retinol supports the skin's natural production of hyaluronic acid for greater resilience against signs of aging and fatigue.
	MATSU-ProSculpt Complex with Matsu Extract helps to encourage microcirculation** to target the appearance of undereye bags and signs of fatigue.
	KURENAI-TruLift Complex with Benibana Flower strengthens and energizes the skin for a visibly lifted appearance.
	ReNeura Technology++ features Phytoconnect, helps prolong the efficacy of the treatment.
	VP8 Technology helps defend skin with targeted ingredients, including olive root, tea, and angelica root extracts, to visibly correct signs of aging.


**In vitro.

INGREDIENTS:Water(Aqua/Eau)･Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate･Butylene Glycol･Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone･Glycerin･Dipropylene Glycol･Potassium Methoxysalicylate･PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil･Phenoxyethanol･Carbomer･Xanthan Gum･Methylparaben･Trisodium EDTA･Polyvinyl Alcohol･Tocopheryl Acetate･VP/VA Copolymer･Rosa Damascena Flower Water･Potassium Hydroxide･Sodium Citrate･BHT･Squalane･Alcohol･Caffeine･Polysorbate 20･Retinol･Citric Acid･Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil･Fragrance (Parfum)･PEG/PPG-14/7 Dimethyl Ether･Tocopherol･Angelica Acutiloba Root Extract･Angelica Keiskei Leaf/Stem Extract･Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract･Sanguisorba Officinalis Root Extract･Lamium Album Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract･Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract･Inositol･Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Flower Extract･Pinus Sylvestris Cone Extract･Ziziphus Jujuba Fruit Extract･Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract (Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract)･Eucheuma Serra/Grateloupia Sparsa/Saccharina Angustata/Ulva Linza/Undaria Pinnatifida Extract･Saccharina Angustata/Undaria Pinnatifida Extract･Bupleurum Falcatum Root Extract･Coix Lacryma-Jobi Ma-yuen Seed Extract･ <M143199-702>
how_to_use:
- Use 2-3 times a week as your final skincare step.
- Apply moisturizer before the eye mask.
- Peel open from the bottom left.
- Position the triangular corner below the inner corner of the eye and the rounded end along the outer corner.
- For daytime, follow with sunscreen to ensure the effectiveness of the retinol.
- The sheet is reversible with no front or back. Store face up.
- Do not store packets standing on edge. Use immediately after opening. Use each mask piece only once.
- Leave the mask on for 10 minutes.
overview:
A retinol eye mask that visibly lifts and firms around the eyes in just 1 week.*

This retinol under eye mask visibly lifts and firms in just 1 week.* Immediately see a more radiant eye area, while helping target dark circles, undereye bags and signs of fatigue.

Exclusive MATSU-ProSculpt Complex helps to target the look of age-related puffiness in the eye area. KURENAI-TruLift Complex and ReNeura Technology++™ strengthen skin's natural support, while visibly lifting and firming. For even greater results, use with Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Eye Cream before application of mask.

New sheet shape covers broader areas around the eyes to target multiple concerns, while the cotton blend material helps hold and release more essence to the skin.

- Visibly lifts and firms around the eyes

- Targets dark circles, undereye bags and signs of fatigue

- Good for all skin types

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist tested.

*Consumer tested by 104 women.
overview_summary: A retinol eye mask that visibly lifts and firms around the eyes in just 1 week.* This retinol under eye mask visibly lifts and firms in just 1 week.* Immediately

Name: Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Express Eye Mask
Description: A retinol eye mask that visibly lifts and firms around the eyes in just 1 week.*
product_title: Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Express Eye Mask
Text:
Pure Retinol supports the skin's natural production of hyaluronic acid for greater resilience against signs of aging and fatigue.
	MATSU-ProSculpt Complex with Matsu Extract helps to encourage microcirculation** to target the appearance of undereye bags and signs of fatigue.
	KURENAI-TruLift Complex with Benibana Flower strengthens and energizes the skin for a visibly lifted appearance.
	ReNeura Technology++ features Phytoconnect, helps prolong the efficacy of the treatment.
	VP8 Technology helps defend skin with targeted ingredients, including olive root, tea, and angelica root extracts, to visibly correct signs of aging.


**In vitro.

INGREDIENTS:Water(Aqua/Eau)･Pentaerythrityl Tetraethylhexanoate･Butylene Glycol･Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone･Glycerin･Dipropylene Glycol･Potassium Methoxysalicylate･PEG-60 Hydrogenated Castor Oil･Phenoxyethanol･Carbomer･Xanthan Gum･Methylparaben･Trisodium EDTA･Polyvinyl Alcohol･Tocopheryl Acetate･VP/VA Copolymer･Rosa Damascena Flower Water･Potassium Hydroxide･Sodium Citrate･BHT･Squalane･Alcohol･Caffeine･Polysorbate 20･Retinol･Citric Acid･Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil･Fragrance (Parfum)･PEG/PPG-14/7 Dimethyl Ether･Tocopherol･Angelica Acutiloba Root Extract･Angelica Keiskei Leaf/Stem Extract･Olea Europaea (Olive) Leaf Extract･Sanguisorba Officinalis Root Extract･Lamium Album Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract･Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract･Inositol･Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Flower Extract･Pinus Sylvestris Cone Extract･Ziziphus Jujuba Fruit Extract･Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract (Rosmarinus Officinalis Leaf Extract)･Eucheuma Serra/Grateloupia Sparsa/Saccharina Angustata/Ulva Linza/Undaria Pinnatifida Extract･Saccharina Angustata/Undaria Pinnatifida Extract･Bupleurum Falcatum Root Extract･Coix Lacryma-Jobi Ma-yuen Seed Extract･ <M143199-702>
how_to_use:
- Use 2-3 times a week as your final skincare step.
- Apply moisturizer before the eye mask.
- Peel open from the bottom left.
- Position the triangular corner below the inner corner of the eye and the rounded end along the outer corner.
- For daytime, follow with sunscreen to ensure the effectiveness of the retinol.
- The sheet is reversible with no front or back. Store face up.
- Do not store packets standing on edge. Use immediately after opening. Use each mask piece only once.
- Leave the mask on for 10 minutes.
overview:
A retinol eye mask that visibly lifts and firms around the eyes in just 1 week.*

This retinol under eye mask visibly lifts and firms in just 1 week.* Immediately see a more radiant eye area, while helping target dark circles, undereye bags and signs of fatigue.

Exclusive MATSU-ProSculpt Complex helps to target the look of age-related puffiness in the eye area. KURENAI-TruLift Complex and ReNeura Technology++™ strengthen skin's natural support, while visibly lifting and firming. For even greater results, use with Vital Perfection Uplifting and Firming Eye Cream before application of mask.

New sheet shape covers broader areas around the eyes to target multiple concerns, while the cotton blend material helps hold and release more essence to the skin.

- Visibly lifts and firms around the eyes

- Targets dark circles, undereye bags and signs of fatigue

- Good for all skin types

- Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist tested.

*Consumer tested by 104 women.
overview_summary: A retinol eye mask that visibly lifts and firms around the eyes in just 1 week.* This retinol under eye mask visibly lifts and firms in just 1 week.* Immediately

Name: Treatment Softener
Description: A light, dewy softener that targets sebum and refines skin.
product_title: Treatment Softener (for normal and combination to oily skin)
Text:
Signature Japanese Ingredients:
Kirishima Mineral Spring Water: Helps supplement skin's essential minerals.
Yomogi Extract: Helps prevents skin roughness and promotes healthy-looking, radiant skin. 
InternalPowerResist technology (featuring ImuCalm Compound™): Helps to strengthen the skin barrier while Hamamelis Extract provides an antioxidant effect.


INGREDIENTS:WATER(AQUA/EAU)･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･SD ALCOHOL 40-B (ALCOHOL DENAT.)･GLYCERIN･DIGLYCERIN･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･PEG-20･HYDROGENATED DIMER DILINOLEYL PEG-44/POLY(1,2-BUTANEDIOL)-15 DIMETHYL ETHER･PHENOXYETHANOL･METHYLPARABEN･CARBOMER･WATER (AQUA)･ERYTHRITOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･DISODIUM EDTA･ALCOHOL･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･LINALOOL･SAPINDUS MUKOROSSI PEEL EXTRACT･SODIUM METABISULFITE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･MAGNESIUM CHLORIDE･THEANINE･CALCIUM CHLORIDE･SERINE･HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL) LEAF EXTRACT･ZINGIBER AROMATICUS EXTRACT･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･TOCOPHEROL･ARTEMISIA PRINCEPS LEAF EXTRACT･
how_to_use:
- After cleansing, pump 3 times to saturate a Shiseido Facial Cotton pad and wipe gently over face.
- Recommend Pairings: Deep Cleansing Foam
overview:
A light, dewy softener that targets sebum and refines skin.

A light, dewy skin softener enriched with effective ingredients to remove sebum and refine skin. Skin is left feeling fresh, even and radiant, making it receptive to further skincare treatment.

Exclusive InternalPowerResist technology helps to strengthen and defend skin while signature Japanese ingredients provide oil-removing benefits. This softener is ideal for oily, normal, and combination skin types.

- Visibly smooths and refines skin

- Helps improve skin's radiance and clarity

- Good for normal, combination, and oily skin types

- Provides 24-hour moisture

- Dermatologist-tested

Description: A gentle, dual-phase makeup remover that immediately dissolves waterproof and long-wearing eye makeup and lipstick. Leaves skin feeling fresh and smooth without any oily sensation. Removes all makeup with ease, including waterproof mascara.
product_title: Essentials Instant Eye and Lip Makeup Remover
how_to_use: - Shake well. Saturate a cotton pad and hold in place over eye area or lips. Wipe away gently.

Name: Extra Rich Cleansing Milk
Description: A gentle cleanser that protects moisture for soft, dewy skin.
product_title: Extra Rich Cleansing Milk
Text:
Signature Japanese Ingredients:
Kirishima Mineral Spring Water: Helps supplement skin's essential minerals.
Rice Germ Oil: Softens and wraps skin in a veil of moisture.
Japanese Yuzu Seed Extract: Helps improve skin's moisture.

INGREDIENTS: WATER (AQUA/EAU)･SODIUM METHYL COCOYL TAURATE･COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE･PEG-2 LAURATE･GLYCOL DISTEARATE･PROPYLENE GLYCOL LAURATE･GLYCERIN･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･POLYQUATERNIUM-10･PHENOXYETHANOL･SODIUM BENZOATE･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･CITRIC ACID･WATER (AQUA)･ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) GERM OIL･DISODIUM EDTA･LINALOOL･GERANIOL･CITRONELLOL･ALCOHOL･BETAINE･YELLOW 6 (CI 15985)･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･CITRUS JUNOS SEED EXTRACT･TOCOPHEROL･RED 33 (CI 17200)･HYDROLYZED SILK･
how_to_use:
- Use daily, in the morning and evening as the first step in your skincare routine.
- Push the pump 2-3 times to dispense cleanser into the palm of hand and gently smooth over the skin. Add small amounts of cold or lukewarm water to lather well and cleanse the skin. Rinse thoroughly.
overview:
A gentle cleanser that protects moisture for soft, dewy skin.

Clinically proven to protect skin's moisture*, this gentle cleanser is infused with effective ingredients that deeply moisturize and balance skin, prepping it for further skincare treatement.

Japanese Yuzu Seed Extract provides moisturizing benefits, making this cleanser ideal for dry and very dry skin types.

- Gently cleanses for soft, hydrated skin

- Good for dry, very dry, and sensitive skin types

- Dermatologist-tested

*Clinically tested by 32 women.
overview_summary: Gently cleanses for soft, hydrated skin - Good for dry, very dry, and sensitive skin types - Dermatologist-tested *Clinically tested by 32 women.

Name: Waso SATOCANE Pore Purifying Scrub Mask
Description: This clay face mask contains vegetal exfoliants to micro-buff away dead cells and prevent clogged pores, revealing skin that feels baby-smooth. Non-drying, mud-like texture with soft scrubbing agents creates a relaxing home facial experience that feels comfortable on skin.
product_title: Waso SATOCANE Pore Purifying Scrub Mask
Text:
Satokibi, Japanese Sugarcane from Miyakojima: Prevents sebum degradation, a key cause of clogged pores.
Mineral Clay: Absorbs excess sebum and minimizes the appearance of pores and blackheads.
Betaine (Vegetal Exfoliant): Gently removes dead skin cells and promote skin’s natural turnover without irritation.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･KAOLIN･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･ZINC OXIDE･BETAINE･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･BENTONITE･PEG-20 GLYCERYL TRIISOSTEARATE･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･STEARYL ALCOHOL･MICROCRYSTALLINE CELLULOSE･PHENOXYETHANOL･PYRUS MALUS (APPLE) FRUIT WATER･ALCOHOL･TRISODIUM EDTA･CHROMIUM OXIDE GREENS (CI 77288)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) OIL･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF OIL (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF OIL)･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･CITRUS DEPRESSA PEEL EXTRACT･SALVIA OFFICINALIS (SAGE) OIL･SACCHARUM OFFICINARUM (SUGAR CANE) EXTRACT･
how_to_use:
- Apply after cleansing, onto towel-dryed skin.
- Take two cherry-sized amounts and spread evenly on face, avoiding eyes and lips.
- Leave on for 5 minutes. Gently massage with wet hands and rinse.
- Recommended to use twice a week for best results.
overview:
This clay face mask contains vegetal exfoliants to micro-buff away dead cells and prevent clogged pores, revealing skin that feels baby-smooth. Non-drying, mud-like texture with soft scrubbing agents creates a relaxing home facial experience that feels comfortable on skin.

- 21% less visible pores and blackheads in a single use*

- Leaves skin smoother and softer immediately*

- Helps prevent future clogged pores

- Outer cap is made of 30% upcycled rice husk**. Tube is made of 10% sugarcane-derived polyethylene.

- Vegan. Cruelty-free. Fragrance-free.

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

*Clinically tested by 20 women.

**Cap contains natural materials that may change color or texture over time. This does not affect product quality.

We are not able to ship this product to Washington State.
overview_summary: 21% less visible pores and blackheads in a single use* - Leaves skin smoother and softer immediately* - Helps prevent future clogged pores - Outer cap is

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･KAOLIN･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･ZINC OXIDE･BETAINE･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･BENTONITE･PEG-20 GLYCERYL TRIISOSTEARATE･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･STEARYL ALCOHOL･MICROCRYSTALLINE CELLULOSE･PHENOXYETHANOL･PYRUS MALUS (APPLE) FRUIT WATER･ALCOHOL･TRISODIUM EDTA･CHROMIUM OXIDE GREENS (CI 77288)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･CITRUS AURANTIUM DULCIS (ORANGE) OIL･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF OIL (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF OIL)･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･CITRUS DEPRESSA PEEL EXTRACT･SALVIA OFFICINALIS (SAGE) OIL･SACCHARUM OFFICINARUM (SUGAR CANE) EXTRACT･
how_to_use:
- Apply after cleansing, onto towel-dryed skin.
- Take two cherry-sized amounts and spread evenly on face, avoiding eyes and lips.
- Leave on for 5 minutes. Gently massage with wet hands and rinse.
- Recommended to use twice a week for best results.
overview:
This clay face mask contains vegetal exfoliants to micro-buff away dead cells and prevent clogged pores, revealing skin that feels baby-smooth. Non-drying, mud-like texture with soft scrubbing agents creates a relaxing home facial experience that feels comfortable on skin.

- 21% less visible pores and blackheads in a single use*

- Leaves skin smoother and softer immediately*

- Helps prevent future clogged pores

- Outer cap is made of 30% upcycled rice husk**. Tube is made of 10% sugarcane-derived polyethylene.

- Vegan. Cruelty-free. Fragrance-free.

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

*Clinically tested by 20 women.

**Cap contains natural materials that may change color or texture over time. This does not affect product quality.

We are not able to ship this product to Washington State.

Name: Bio-Performance Skin Filler Serums
Description: Revolutionary night and day serum system to visibly plump and firm skin with our proprietary Japanese Hyaluronic Acid.
product_title: Bio-Performance Skin Filler Serums
Text:
Shrunken Bio-Hyaluronic Acid: Created through MolecuShift Technology, the world's first technology to successfully shrink the size of Hyaluronic Acid molecules and revert them back to their original size, without changing their structure. This allows the Hyaluronic Acid molecules to penetrate more easily without decreasing any of its advantages to plump and firm skin.
Red Clover Extract: Known to improve skin barrier function.
Chai Hu Extract: Known to promote Collagen and Hyaluronic Acid production for firming benefits. 
Cinnamon Extract: Helps optimize skin's natural purification process.

Bio-Performance Infill Serum:
INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･ALCOHOL DENAT.･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･MAGNESIUM CHLORIDE･GLYCERIN･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･SODIUM HYALURONATE･PEG-6･PEG-32･HYDROXYETHYL UREA･LAURYL BETAINE･LACTIC ACID･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･PEG-150･PPG-13-DECYLTETRADECETH-24･TRIETHANOLAMINE･SODIUM CITRATE･DISODIUM EDTA･CITRIC ACID･AMMONIUM LACTATE･TOCOPHEROL･PHENOXYETHANOL･SODIUM BENZOATE･

Bio-Performance Full Expansion Serum:
INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･DIMETHICONE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･ALCOHOL･GLYCERIN･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･SILICA･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･ALPHA-GLUCAN OLIGOSACCHARIDE･AMINOPROPYL DIMETHICONE･TRIFOLIUM PRATENSE (CLOVER) FLOWER EXTRACT (TRIFOLIUM PRATENSE FLOWER EXTRACT)･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOTEXTRACT･BATYL ALCOHOL･HYDROGENATED PALM OIL･BEHENIC ACID･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) KERNEL OIL･PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･PEG-10 DIMETHICONE･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) OIL･TOCOPHEROL･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･SODIUM METABISULFITE･CINNAMOMUM CASSIA BARK EXTRACT･CITRIC ACID･PHENOXYETHANOL･
how_to_use:
- Apply before moisturizer. When using with other serums, apply Bio-Performance Skin Filler Serums as the last serum before your moisturizer.
- In the evening, pump Infill Serum once onto fingertips and smooth evenly over face and neck.
- In the morning, pump Full Expansion Serum once onto fingertips and smooth evenly over face and neck.
- For Refills: Save the pumps and caps from your original bottles. Insert the pump into the refill, then close cap.
overview:
Revolutionary night and day serum system to visibly plump and firm skin with our proprietary Japanese Hyaluronic Acid.

Rapidly diminish the signs of time with our breakthrough MolecuShift Technology, which first shrinks and then enlarges Hyaluronic Acid molecules to volumize the skin from within.

Visibly plump and firm skin in two steps:

Step 1: Evening: Infill Serum delivers shrunken Hyaluronic Acid molecules to be more effectively absorbed into skin.

Step 2: Morning: Full Expansion Serum expands Hyaluronic Acid molecules back to their original size leaving skin even more hydrated, plump, and firm.

- Visibly improves the look of wrinkles, fine lines, and loss of firmness

- Helps skin gradually accumulate Hyaluronic Acid, a key component of skin, for long-lasting effects

- May be used in place of or in conjunction with injectable fillers to complement results

- Dermatologist-tested

- Bottles, minus the cap, are 20% plant-derived

- Refills help reduce plastic waste by up to 74% compared with a regular product
overview_summary: Step 2: Morning: Full Expansion Serum expands Hyaluronic Acid molecules back to their original size leaving skin even more hydrated, plump, and firm.

Name: Complete Cleansing Microfoam
Description: A light, instant foaming cleanser that softens skin.
product_title: Complete Cleansing Microfoam
Text:
Signature Japanese Ingredients:
Kirishima Mineral Spring Water: Helps supplement skin's essential minerals.
Rice Germ Oil: Softens and wraps skin in a veil of moisture.
InternalPowerResist technology (featuring ImuCalm Compound™): Helps to strengthen the skin barrier while Hamamelis Extract provides an antioxidant effect.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･GLYCERIN･SODIUM LAURETH SULFATE･COCAMIDOPROPYL BETAINE･PEG-8 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･SODIUM METHYL COCOYL TAURATE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･ALCOHOL DENAT.･SODIUM CITRATE･SODIUM BENZOATE･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･CITRIC ACID･DISODIUM EDTA･BHT･LINALOOL･ORYZA SATIVA (RICE) GERM OIL･ALCOHOL･TOCOPHEROL･HAMAMELIS VIRGINIANA (WITCH HAZEL) LEAF EXTRACT･BETAINE･HYDROLYZED SILK･

- Push the pump 2-3 times to dispense foam into the palm of hand and gently smooth over the skin to cleanse.
- Rinse thoroughly.

A light, instant foaming cleanser that softens skin.

Rice Germ Oil softens and moisturizes while exclusive InternalPowerResist technology helps strengthen and defend skin from environmental pollutants. Good for all skin types, this light and airy foam leaves skin feeling smooth and hydrated, with enhanced clarity..

Description: A silky-smooth powder infused with Japanese botanical ingredients to set makeup for a sheer luminous finish and lasting wear. Includes an ultra-soft powder puff made in Japan that uses long fibers to hold the powder for the perfect application to skin.
product_title: Future Solution LX Total Radiance Loose Powder
how_to_use: - Remove the sticker from the inner lid. Take an appropriate amount of powder onto the puff. Smooth the puff lightly over the face and blend carefully into the skin.
overview:

Name: Future Solution LX Legendary Enmei Ultimate Brilliance Eye Cream
Description: Luxurious eye cream targets dullness, dark circles, sagging, wrinkles, and muscle tension.
product_title: Future Solution LX Legendary Enmei Ultimate Brilliance Eye Cream
Text:
Legendary Enmei Complex: a proprietary anti-aging ingredient compromised of Legendary Enmei Herb and Green Treasured Silk, slows down the appearance of visible signs of aging, and inhibits the reduction of antioxidant factors.
Camellia Seed Extract: known to help support the natural cycle of cellular turnover.
Akoya Pearl Shell Extract: reduces skin dullness and soothes skin.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･GLYCERIN･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･ALCOHOL･DIMETHICONE･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･PHYTOSTERYL/OCTYLDODECYL LAUROYL GLUTAMATE･HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･XANTHAN GUM･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･CITRUS DEPRESSA PEEL EXTRACT･IRIS FLORENTINA ROOT EXTRACT･EUCHEUMA SERRA/GRATELOUPIA SPARSA/SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/ULVA LINZA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･TYPHA ANGUSTIFOLIA SPIKE EXTRACT･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED SILK･CAMELLIA JAPONICA SEED EXTRACT･RETINYL PALMITATE･SACCHARINA ANGUSTATA/UNDARIA PINNATIFIDA EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･NASTURTIUM OFFICINALE LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED CONCHIOLIN PROTEIN･BATYL ALCOHOL･BEHENIC ACID･HYDROGENATED PALM OIL･PEG-60 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･PEG-10 DIMETHICONE･MICA･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) KERNEL OIL･DIMETHYLACRYLAMIDE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE CROSSPOLYMER･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) OIL･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･DISODIUM EDTA･SILICA･LINALOOL･LIMONENE･CITRONELLOL･GERANIOL･ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE･ALPHA-ISOMETHYL IONONE･SODIUM METABISULFITE･BENZYL BENZOATE･CINNAMOMUM CASSIA BARK EXTRACT･TOCOPHEROL･ZEA MAYS (CORN) OIL･BHT･CITRIC ACID･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･
how_to_use:
- Use the narrow end of the tool to scoop cream and place on fingertip.
- Dab on five areas (inner corners, under eyes, outer corners, eyelids, above and between the eyebrows) around each eye and smooth with fingers.
- Blend cream into skin by circling fingers around eyes 3 times. Then, massage around the entire area 3 times.
How to use tool:
- Massage the area between the eyebrows using circular motions.
- Glide tool from under the eyebrows upward toward the hairline. Repeat across the entire area 2-3 times.
- Glide tool from the upper eyelids to the temples and from the lower eyelids to the temples. Repeat on each side 1-2 times. Glide gently and smoothly, without force.
- Press the 5 acupressure points.
overview:
Luxurious eye cream targets dullness, dark circles, sagging, wrinkles, and muscle tension.

This anti-aging eye cream revives and brightens eyes, targets the appearance of dullness, dark circles, sagging, wrinkles, and tension between the eyebrows. Formulated with our rare Legendary Enmei Complex and SublimActive to support the natural cycle of cellular turnover. This luxurious moisturizing eye cream absorbs smoothly and renews the skin around the eyes with a blend of rare ingredients that target multiple signs of aging, help strengthen the skin's barrier, and help promote collagen production. Bring the ultimate brilliance to eyes for a timeless luminosity and vibrant, youthful-looking eyes. Features a Magatama eye massager, made out of high-grade porcelain, to further soothe and relax muscles around the eyes.

- Targets dullness, dark circles, sagging, wrinkles, and muscle tension

- Lightweight, moisturizing texture leaves a luminous and vibrant look around the eyes

- Includes a Magatama eye massager tool

- Non-comedogenic. Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested.
overview_summary: Targets dullness, dark circles, sagging, wrinkles, and muscle tension - Lightweight, moisturizing texture leaves a luminous and vibrant look around the eyes - Includes a Magatama eye

how_to_use:
- Use the narrow end of the tool to scoop cream and place on fingertip.
- Dab on five areas (inner corners, under eyes, outer corners, eyelids, above and between the eyebrows) around each eye and smooth with fingers.
- Blend cream into skin by circling fingers around eyes 3 times. Then, massage around the entire area 3 times.
How to use tool:
- Massage the area between the eyebrows using circular motions.
- Glide tool from under the eyebrows upward toward the hairline. Repeat across the entire area 2-3 times.
- Glide tool from the upper eyelids to the temples and from the lower eyelids to the temples. Repeat on each side 1-2 times. Glide gently and smoothly, without force.
- Press the 5 acupressure points.

Name: Waso SHIKULIME Gel-to-Oil Cleanser
Description: This gentle cleanser starts as a cushiony gel texture to grab onto impurities and transforms into a silky oil to remove even waterproof makeup, without stripping skin of its essential moisture. Skin feels fresh, balanced, and revitalized with a radiant finish.
product_title: Waso SHIKULIME Gel-to-Oil Cleanser
Text:
Shikuwasa, Japanese Lime from Okinawa: Supports skin’s moisture barrier to promote a healthy look.
Safflower Oil & Grape Seed Oil: Dissolves makeup and sebum while providing moisture.
how_to_use:
Use daily, in the morning and evening as the first step in your skincare routine.
- Apply without wetting hands or face.
- Squeeze a cherry-sized drop onto fingertips and massage over dry face to remove makeup and impurities.
- Rinse thoroughly with cool or lukewarm water.
overview:
This gentle cleanser starts as a cushiony gel texture to grab onto impurities and transforms into a silky oil to remove even waterproof makeup, without stripping skin of its essential moisture. Skin feels fresh, balanced, and revitalized with a radiant finish.

- Effortlessly removes impurities and waterproof makeup.

- Reveals ultra clean, radiant skin.

- Leverages the gentleness of a gel base with the cleansing power of an oil base.

- Maintains moisture and does not leave skin feeling tight or dry.

- Outer cap is made of 30% upcycled rice husk*. Tube is made of 10% sugarcane-derived polyethylene.

- Vegan. Cruelty-free. Fragrance-free.

- Dermatologist-tested. Opthamologist-tested.

*Cap contains natural materials that may change color or texture over time. This does not affect product quality.
overview_summary: This gentle cleanser starts as a cushiony gel texture to grab onto impurities and transforms into a silky oil to remove even waterproof makeup, without stripping skin of its essential

- Squeeze a cherry-sized drop onto fingertips and massage over dry face to remove makeup and impurities.
- Rinse thoroughly with cool or lukewarm water.
overview:
This gentle cleanser starts as a cushiony gel texture to grab onto impurities and transforms into a silky oil to remove even waterproof makeup, without stripping skin of its essential moisture. Skin feels fresh, balanced, and revitalized with a radiant finish.

- Effortlessly removes impurities and waterproof makeup.

- Reveals ultra clean, radiant skin.

- Leverages the gentleness of a gel base with the cleansing power of an oil base.

- Maintains moisture and does not leave skin feeling tight or dry.

- Outer cap is made of 30% upcycled rice husk*. Tube is made of 10% sugarcane-derived polyethylene.

- Vegan. Cruelty-free. Fragrance-free.

- Dermatologist-tested. Opthamologist-tested.

*Cap contains natural materials that may change color or texture over time. This does not affect product quality.

Text:
Legendary Enmei Complex (comprised of Enmei Herb Extract, Skingenecell 1P, Vitamin C, and Green Treasured Silk Extract): A proprietary ingredient that helps protect skin from damage and improves visible signs of aging.
Niacinamide: Helps support skin's barrier while visibly smoothing texture.

- Use in the morning and evening after cleansing and softening skin.
- Press the pump once to dispense the product onto palm and smooth over the entire face.
overview:
A luxurious face serum that visibly improves skin's quality.

This luxurious face serum is formulated with the Enmei Herb, hand-picked from Japan's lush nature on Tenshanichi, the most auspicious day of the Japanese calendar. Treasured Green Silk encourages the vitalizing forces that renew beautiful looking skin. A combination of traditional Japanese aesthetics, breakthrough technology, and ancient botanical wonders make this serum the most precious for improving skin quality.

- Visibly improves skin's quality

- Enhances skin's luminosity, brightness, and evenness

- Provides 24-hour moisture

Name: Ultimune Future Power Shot
Description: See and feel ultimate resilience like you've never experienced before. This lightweight, fast-absorbing intensive treatment contains 15x the concentration of Ultimune Power Infusing Concentrate's key ingredients to help strengthen skin's defenses and protect skin from environmental damage. Achieve healthy, vibrant looking skin with enhanced radiance and smoothness.
product_title: Ultimune Future Power Shot
Text:
15x concentration of Ultimune Power Infusing Concentrate's key ingredients (Reishi Mushroom, Iris Root, Fermented Roselle Extract): Enhances skin's defenses to help resist environmental damage.
Tsubaki Seed Extract: Rich in antioxidants to help strengthen skin's defenses.

INGREDIENTS: WATER(AQUA/EAU)･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･DIGLYCERIN･PEG-6･PEG-32･BEHENETH-20･COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX(COPERNICIA CERIFERA CERA/CIRE DE CARNAUBA)･PHENOXYETHANOL･PEG-400･PEG-20 GLYCERYL ISOSTEARATE･VP/VA COPOLYMER･POLYVINYL ALCOHOL･CARBOMER･CHLORPHENESIN･PPG-13-DECYLTETRADECETH-24･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･XANTHAN GUM･ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER WATER･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE･ALCOHOL･SILICA･DISODIUM EDTA･SODIUM POLYACRYLATE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･TREMELLA FUCIFORMIS POLYSACCHARIDE･LINALOOL･TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891)･SODIUM CARBOXYMETHYL BETA-GLUCAN･GINKGO BILOBA LEAF EXTRACT･LIMONENE･TIN OXIDE･SANGUISORBA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT･GERANIOL･LACTOBACILLUS/HIBISCUS SABDARIFFA FLOWER FERMENT FILTRATE･ORIGANUM MAJORANA LEAF EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF OIL (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF OIL)･HOUTTUYNIA CORDATA EXTRACT･TOCOPHEROL･IRIS FLORENTINA ROOT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA JAPONICA SEED EXTRACT･GANODERMA LUCIDUM (MUSHROOM) STEM EXTRACT･PERILLA OCYMOIDES LEAF EXTRACT･
how_to_use:
- Use twice a week or whenever your skin has been under extra stress or needs an extra boost.
- Apply after cleansing and softening, in place of Ultimune Power Infusing Concentrate. Continue to use Ultimune Power Infusing Concentrate as your daily serum, on days when not using Ultimune Power Shot.
- Push bottom button to dispense and smooth evenly over face.
overview:
See and feel ultimate resilience like you've never experienced before. This lightweight, fast-absorbing intensive treatment contains 15x the concentration of Ultimune Power Infusing Concentrate's key ingredients to help strengthen skin's defenses and protect skin from environmental damage. Achieve healthy, vibrant looking skin with enhanced radiance and smoothness.

- Boosts skin's radiance, smoothness, and resilience

- Defends from environmental aggressors

- Lightweight texture absorbs quickly

- Suitable for all skin types

- Paraben-free. Mineral-oil free.

- Non-comedogenic. Dermatologist-tested.

- Use twice a week or whenever your skin has been under extra stress or needs an extra boost.
- Apply after cleansing and softening, in place of Ultimune Power Infusing Concentrate. Continue to use Ultimune Power Infusing Concentrate as your daily serum, on days when not using Ultimune Power Shot.
- Push bottom button to dispense and smooth evenly over face.
overview:
See and feel ultimate resilience like you've never experienced before. This lightweight, fast-absorbing intensive treatment contains 15x the concentration of Ultimune Power Infusing Concentrate's key ingredients to help strengthen skin's defenses and protect skin from environmental damage. Achieve healthy, vibrant looking skin with enhanced radiance and smoothness.

- Boosts skin's radiance, smoothness, and resilience

- Defends from environmental aggressors

- Lightweight texture absorbs quickly

- Suitable for all skin types

- Paraben-free. Mineral-oil free.

- Non-comedogenic. Dermatologist-tested.

Name: Future Solution LX Infinite Treatment Primer SPF 30
Description: This primer instantly smooths away pores and corrects the look of dullness and uneven tone while providing 8-hour hydration*. The formula is crafted to deliver a pearlescent glow that replicates the luster of pearls. Skin is protected from UV rays with broad-spectrum SPF 30 protection as well as external stressors like pollution.
product_title: Future Solution LX Infinite Treatment Primer SPF 30
Text:
NACREOUS LAYER TECHNOLOGY: cares for the skin with multiple layers of protection against air pollution. Black Tea Extract in the formulation prevents damage from oxidation.
PEARL DIFFUSION TECHNOLOGY: creates a multi-dimensional radiant finish for a naturally luminous appearance and glow from all angles. This is achieved with prismatic light reflection, similar to the multi-layer structure of a pearl.
SCULTELLARIA BAICALENSIS EXTRACT: controls excess sebum for long-lasting makeup wear and finish. 

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS:  Purpose ENSULIZOLE 1.0%  ･････ Sunscreen OCTINOXATE 3.9%  ･････ Sunscreen TITANIUM DIOXIDE 4.1%  ･････ Sunscreen INACTIVE INGREDIENTS:WATER･DIMETHICONE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･ISOHEXADECANE･SD ALCOHOL 40-B･ZEA MAYS (CORN) STARCH･PEG-9 POLYDIMETHYLSILOXYETHYL DIMETHICONE･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･SILICA･TRIISOSTEARIN･DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE･CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE･XYLITOL･ERYTHRITOL･TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE･TREHALOSE･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･SCUTELLARIA BAICALENSIS ROOT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED CONCHIOLIN PROTEIN･ROSA ROXBURGHII FRUIT EXTRACT･GOLD･TRIETHANOLAMINE･ISOSTEARIC ACID･ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE･STEARIC ACID･DISODIUM EDTA･ALCOHOL･CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE･BHT･HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE･TOCOPHEROL･POLYSILICONE-2･TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE･SODIUM CITRATE･TIN OXIDE･BARIUM SULFATE･CITRIC ACID･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE･TITANIUM DIOXIDE･MICA･IRON OXIDES･
how_to_use:
- Use as the last step of your skincare routine.
- Take one pearl-sized drop onto your fingertip and blend smoothly into skin.
- Avoid contact with eyes. If contact with eyes occurs, rinse immediately with water.
overview:
This primer instantly smooths away pores and corrects the look of dullness and uneven tone while providing 8-hour hydration*. The formula is crafted to deliver a pearlescent glow that replicates the luster of pearls. Skin is protected from UV rays with broad-spectrum SPF 30 protection as well as external stressors like pollution.

- 8-hour hydration*

- Creates an even, smooth complexion by correcting the look of pores and unevenness

- Leaves a pearlescent finish for naturally lustrous skin that looks lit from within

- Prolongs makeup wear by suppressing the production of excess sebum

- Oxidation-inhibiting effect

- Dewy, light texture spreads smoothly and feels comfortable

- Non comedogenic. Dermatologist-tested.

*Clinically tested by 24 women, ages 18-64
overview_summary: - 8-hour hydration* - Creates an even, smooth complexion by correcting the look of pores and unevenness - Leaves a pearlescent finish for naturally lustrous skin that looks lit from

Skin is protected from UV rays with broad-spectrum SPF 30 protection as well as external stressors like pollution.

- 8-hour hydration*

- Creates an even, smooth complexion by correcting the look of pores and unevenness

- Leaves a pearlescent finish for naturally lustrous skin that looks lit from within

- Prolongs makeup wear by suppressing the production of excess sebum

- Oxidation-inhibiting effect

- Dewy, light texture spreads smoothly and feels comfortable

- Non comedogenic. Dermatologist-tested.

*Clinically tested by 24 women, ages 18-64

product_title: Future Solution LX Infinite Treatment Primer SPF 30
Text:
NACREOUS LAYER TECHNOLOGY: cares for the skin with multiple layers of protection against air pollution. Black Tea Extract in the formulation prevents damage from oxidation.
PEARL DIFFUSION TECHNOLOGY: creates a multi-dimensional radiant finish for a naturally luminous appearance and glow from all angles. This is achieved with prismatic light reflection, similar to the multi-layer structure of a pearl.
SCULTELLARIA BAICALENSIS EXTRACT: controls excess sebum for long-lasting makeup wear and finish. 

ACTIVE INGREDIENTS:  Purpose ENSULIZOLE 1.0%  ･････ Sunscreen OCTINOXATE 3.9%  ･････ Sunscreen TITANIUM DIOXIDE 4.1%  ･････ Sunscreen INACTIVE INGREDIENTS:WATER･DIMETHICONE･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･ISOHEXADECANE･SD ALCOHOL 40-B･ZEA MAYS (CORN) STARCH･PEG-9 POLYDIMETHYLSILOXYETHYL DIMETHICONE･DIPHENYLSILOXY PHENYL TRIMETHICONE･SILICA･TRIISOSTEARIN･DISTEARDIMONIUM HECTORITE･CETYL ETHYLHEXANOATE･XYLITOL･ERYTHRITOL･TRIMETHYLSILOXYSILICATE･TREHALOSE･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･2-O-ETHYL ASCORBIC ACID･PRUNUS SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･ANGELICA ACUTILOBA ROOT EXTRACT･SCUTELLARIA BAICALENSIS ROOT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･SODIUM ACETYLATED HYALURONATE･ISODONIS JAPONICUS LEAF/STALK EXTRACT･HYDROLYZED CONCHIOLIN PROTEIN･ROSA ROXBURGHII FRUIT EXTRACT･GOLD･TRIETHANOLAMINE･ISOSTEARIC ACID･ALUMINUM HYDROXIDE･STEARIC ACID･DISODIUM EDTA･ALCOHOL･CALCIUM ALUMINUM BOROSILICATE･BHT･HYDROGEN DIMETHICONE･TOCOPHEROL･POLYSILICONE-2･TRIETHOXYCAPRYLYLSILANE･SODIUM CITRATE･TIN OXIDE･BARIUM SULFATE･CITRIC ACID･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE･TITANIUM DIOXIDE･MICA･IRON OXIDES･
how_to_use:
- Use as the last step of your skincare routine.
- Take one pearl-sized drop onto your fingertip and blend smoothly into skin.
- Avoid contact with eyes. If contact with eyes occurs, rinse immediately with water.

Name: Vital Perfection Concentrated Supreme Cream
Description: A rich, comprehensive anti-aging cream that defies the look of progressive skin sagging. 90% saw more lifted, firmer and even-toned skin with improved sagging in 2 weeks.*
product_title: Vital Perfection Concentrated Supreme Cream
Text:
Exclusive Sculpturist Technology powered by Burnet Extract improves the appearance of skin sagging.
2x concentration of SafflowerRED™, exclusively grown in Japan, supports collagen network and intensively boosts multiple age-defying effects to help lift, firm and make skin more even-toned.
Ginseng Root Extract, known to help boost natural collagen production, leaves skin firmer and brighter while strengthening skin’s moisture barrier.
Ziziphus Jujuba Fruit Extract helps to improve elasticity and firmness while addressing hyperpigmentation.
Caffeine, an antioxidant, helps energize the skin and reduce dullness.
Squalane hydrates and supports skin’s moisture barrier while smoothing fine lines.
Vitamin E helps maintain skin barrier and defend against pollutants and environmental stressors.  

WATER(AQUA/EAU)･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･DIMETHICONE･ALCOHOL･PROPANEDIOL･PHYTOSTERYL MACADAMIATE･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･SILICA･SQUALANE･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･CETEARYL ALCOHOL･PEG-100 STEARATE･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER WATER･CAFFEINE･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･SAPINDUS MUKOROSSI PEEL EXTRACT･CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) FLOWER EXTRACT･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･CRATAEGUS MONOGYNA FLOWER EXTRACT･SANGUISORBA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT･LAMIUM ALBUM FLOWER/LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･PANAX GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･INOSITOL･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･PYROLA INCARNATA EXTRACT･POTENTILLA ERECTA ROOT EXTRACT･CHLORELLA VULGARIS EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER･STEARYL ALCOHOL･SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER･COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX(COPERNICIA CERIFERA CERA/CIRE DE CARNAUBA)･HYDROGENATED PALM OIL･ISOHEXADECANE･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) KERNEL OIL･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) OIL･POLYSORBATE 80･SORBITAN TRISTEARATE･DISODIUM EDTA･SUCCINOGLYCAN･SODIUM CITRATE･SORBITAN OLEATE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･CITRIC ACID･LIMONENE･TOCOPHEROL･HEXYL CINNAMAL･LINALOOL･CITRONELLOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･ALPINIA SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･
how_to_use:
- Apply morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin).
- Smooth gently over the face, starting in the larger areas such as the cheeks and forehead. Spread from the center of the face outward, and then along the jawline.
- Apply upward pressure along the jawline with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat 6 times.
- Hold four fingers together, placing the pointer fingers along the nasolabial folds (laugh lines).
- Move upward toward the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds open, with palms flat on the cheeks. Lift, and repeat 6 times.
For Refill:
- Open the cap. Hold the jar with one hand and use the other to gently pull out the refill by holding the two tabs.
- Insert the new refill, pushing it firmly into the jar.
- Discard the inner sticker and close the cap firmly.
overview:
A rich, comprehensive anti-aging cream that defies the look of progressive skin sagging. 90% saw more lifted, firmer and even-toned skin with improved sagging in 2 weeks.*

This daily face moisturizer works on comprehensive anti-aging benefits leaving skin looking more sculpted, lifted, firmer and even-toned. Exclusive Sculpturist Technology powered by Burnet Extract improves the appearance of skin sagging. Now available in a refill size.

- 90% saw more lifted, firmer and even-toned skin with improved sagging in 2 weeks.*

- Exclusive Sculpturist Technology powered by Burnet Extract visibly improves skin sagging

- Rich, velvety cream texture

- Provides 24-hour moisture

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

- Paraben-free

*Consumer tested by 110 individuals.

WATER(AQUA/EAU)･BUTYLENE GLYCOL･GLYCERIN･TRIETHYLHEXANOIN･DIMETHICONE･ALCOHOL･PROPANEDIOL･PHYTOSTERYL MACADAMIATE･PPG-3 DIPIVALATE･GLYCERYL STEARATE SE･SILICA･SQUALANE･HYDROGENATED POLYDECENE･CETEARYL ALCOHOL･PEG-100 STEARATE･BEHENYL ALCOHOL･PEG/PPG-14/7 DIMETHYL ETHER･POTASSIUM METHOXYSALICYLATE･HYDROGENATED POLYISOBUTENE･TOCOPHERYL ACETATE･PEG/PPG-17/4 DIMETHYL ETHER･ROSA DAMASCENA FLOWER WATER･CAFFEINE･LAVANDULA ANGUSTIFOLIA (LAVENDER) OIL･SAPINDUS MUKOROSSI PEEL EXTRACT･CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) FLOWER EXTRACT･ANGELICA KEISKEI LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･CRATAEGUS MONOGYNA FLOWER EXTRACT･SANGUISORBA OFFICINALIS ROOT EXTRACT･LAMIUM ALBUM FLOWER/LEAF/STEM EXTRACT･PANAX GINSENG ROOT EXTRACT･CAMELLIA SINENSIS LEAF EXTRACT･INOSITOL･ZIZIPHUS JUJUBA FRUIT EXTRACT･PYROLA INCARNATA EXTRACT･POTENTILLA ERECTA ROOT EXTRACT･CHLORELLA VULGARIS EXTRACT･ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS (ROSEMARY) LEAF EXTRACT (ROSMARINUS OFFICINALIS LEAF EXTRACT)･BUPLEURUM FALCATUM ROOT EXTRACT･BUTYROSPERMUM PARKII (SHEA) BUTTER･STEARYL ALCOHOL･SODIUM ACRYLATE/SODIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYL TAURATE COPOLYMER･COPERNICIA CERIFERA (CARNAUBA) WAX(COPERNICIA CERIFERA CERA/CIRE DE CARNAUBA)･HYDROGENATED PALM OIL･ISOHEXADECANE･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) KERNEL OIL･ELAEIS GUINEENSIS (PALM) OIL･POLYSORBATE 80･SORBITAN TRISTEARATE･DISODIUM EDTA･SUCCINOGLYCAN･SODIUM CITRATE･SORBITAN OLEATE･SODIUM METAPHOSPHATE･CITRIC ACID･LIMONENE･TOCOPHEROL･HEXYL CINNAMAL･LINALOOL･CITRONELLOL･SODIUM METABISULFITE･ALPINIA SPECIOSA LEAF EXTRACT･PHENOXYETHANOL･FRAGRANCE (PARFUM)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77491)･IRON OXIDES (CI 77492)･
how_to_use:
- Apply morning and evening, after cleansing.
- Take 2 pearl-sized drops with the enclosed spatula and place on 5 areas of the face (cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin).
- Smooth gently over the face, starting in the larger areas such as the cheeks and forehead. Spread from the center of the face outward, and then along the jawline.
- Apply upward pressure along the jawline with both thumbs, starting below the chin and ending below the ears. Repeat 6 times.
- Hold four fingers together, placing the pointer fingers along the nasolabial folds (laugh lines).
- Move upward toward the temples, pulling the nasolabial folds open, with palms flat on the cheeks. Lift, and repeat 6 times.
For Refill:
- Open the cap. Hold the jar with one hand and use the other to gently pull out the refill by holding the two tabs.
- Insert the new refill, pushing it firmly into the jar.
- Discard the inner sticker and close the cap firmly.

Name: Vital Perfection Concentrated Supreme Cream
Description: A rich, comprehensive anti-aging cream that defies the look of progressive skin sagging. 90% saw more lifted, firmer and even-toned skin with improved sagging in 2 weeks.*
product_title: Vital Perfection Concentrated Supreme Cream
Text:
Exclusive Sculpturist Technology powered by Burnet Extract improves the appearance of skin sagging.
2x concentration of SafflowerRED™, exclusively grown in Japan, supports collagen network and intensively boosts multiple age-defying effects to help lift, firm and make skin more even-toned.
Ginseng Root Extract, known to help boost natural collagen production, leaves skin firmer and brighter while strengthening skin’s moisture barrier.
Ziziphus Jujuba Fruit Extract helps to improve elasticity and firmness while addressing hyperpigmentation.
Caffeine, an antioxidant, helps energize the skin and reduce dullness.
Squalane hydrates and supports skin’s moisture barrier while smoothing fine lines.
Vitamin E helps maintain skin barrier and defend against pollutants and environmental stressors.

Name: Facial Cotton Mini Size
Description: Each square contains a blend of 123,000 cotton fibers, woven into 28 layers with high moisture-absorbing and releasing properties for less wasted product. Adds a gentle exfoliation benefit to improve skin roughness. Specially crafted to maintain its shape so that fibers don't fluff or stick to face.
product_title: Facial Cotton Mini Size
how_to_use:
To apply softener,
- Pour softener onto the cotton pad after cleansing.
- Wrap the cotton around the inner middle finger, between the index and ring fingers.
- Starting from the center of the face, use outward strokes to smooth softener:
- across the forehead
- from nose to cheeks
- around your lips
- upward from your chest to neck
- under your chin
To remove eye makeup,
- Pour makeup remover onto 3 cotton pads - one for each eye and a third for your eyelashes.
- Rest a cotton pad over each lid and hold it in place for a few seconds. Then gently wipe downward and off skin.
- Place the remaining cotton pad onto the lashes of each eye. Hold it in place for a few seconds to break down the mascara, then wipe from the base to the tip of your eyelashes, starting from outer to inner corner and back again. Repeat on your other eye.
- Follow with cleanser.
overview:
Each square contains a blend of 123,000 cotton fibers, woven into 28 layers with high moisture-absorbing and releasing properties for less wasted product. Adds a gentle exfoliation benefit to improve skin roughness. Specially crafted to maintain its shape so that fibers don't fluff or stick to face.

- 100% natural, soft cotton for softener application and makeup removal

- A blend of long and medium fibers are designed for maximum absorption and release

- Fibers don’t fluff or stick to face

- Adds a gentle exfoliation benefit to improve skin roughness

- 40 sheets per pack
overview_summary: 100% natural, soft cotton for softener application and makeup removal - A blend of long and medium fibers are designed for maximum absorption and release - Fibers

Name: Ultimate Sun Protection Lotion WetForce for Sensitive Skin and Children SPF 50+ Sunscreen
Description: Shiseido’s Ultimate Sun Protection now formulated especially for sensitive skin and children’s skin. This mineral-based, UV high protection sunscreen free from chemical sunscreen agents, fragrance, alcohol, parabens and has a texture gentle enough for the most delicate sensitive skin. The low-irritant formula also features Shiseido's exclusive WetForce technology, so it becomes even more powerful when the applied area is exposed to water or perspiration for 15 minutes.
product_title: Ultimate Sun Protection Lotion WetForce for Sensitive Skin and Children SPF 50+ Sunscreen
how_to_use: - To activate WetForce Technology, expose the applied area to water or perspiration for 15 minutes.
overview:
Shiseido’s Ultimate Sun Protection now formulated especially for sensitive skin and children’s skin. This mineral-based, UV high protection sunscreen free from chemical sunscreen agents, fragrance, alcohol, parabens and has a texture gentle enough for the most delicate sensitive skin. Dermatologist-tested. Ophthalmologist-tested. Non-comedogenic.

Name: Refreshing Cleansing Sheets
Description: Convenient, ultra-soft, 100% cotton cleansing sheets that maintain skin’s natural balance while whisking away the impurities, makeup and oil that can clog pores and lead to imperfections. Quick. Easy. Instantly refreshing. Perfect for on-the-go.
product_title: Refreshing Cleansing Sheets
how_to_use: - Wipe gently over face to cleanse skin. Reseal flap after each use.
overview:
Convenient, ultra-soft, 100% cotton cleansing sheets that maintain skin’s natural balance while whisking away the impurities, makeup and oil that can clog pores and lead to imperfections. Quick. Easy. Instantly refreshing. Perfect for on-the-go.

- pH-balanced formulation.

- Fresh scent to help reinvigorate and soothe skin.

- Packaging allows for compactness and easy resealing, maintaining the quality of the sheets.

- 30 single-use sheets per package

- Dermatologist-tested. Non-Comedogenic. Alcohol-Free. Oil-Free
